name: Private apartment within our home & easy parking!
summary: Our mid-century/modern vibe apartment is sunlit & private.  You can listen to vinyl & chill out in your space or jump on the public transit a block & a 1/2 away & go anywhere you'd like in the city or farther.
space: Our lovely mid-century/modern vibe apartment is sunlit & has its own private bathroom with recently remodeled shower.  You will be staying in a home that is over 100 years old; with that comes the quirks & original details you might expect from an older home - if you are interested in a sleek, modern, brand new place, our home is probably not for you!  However, if you have an affinity for older, vintage pieces & they charm you, this might be your place :)  You can listen to vinyl & mellow out in our fun, vintage mid century modern chairs &/or jump on the public transit & be anywhere you'd like in the city!  If this is your first airbnb experience we are super happy to be hosting you, however, please make sure to read on & read thoroughly all of the entire description for the specifics staying in our airbnb & EXACTLY where we are located (not near touristy destinations!!) Airbnb is not a hotel & it's good to know how Airbnb works if you are new!) (& if you are an old hat, read on for al

name: Unique, Private Retro SF Space
summary: Enjoy your San Francisco stay in the sunny Bayview district. 420 friendly space is on bottom garage level of home. Private entrance, backyard seating, queen bed, microwave, fridge, wifi, bathroom w/shower, free easy street parking, laundry. Close to SFO & T train
space: A lot of effort was put into making this a serene space for people visiting San Francisco to escape to. Since we are huge music lovers and San Francisco has a rich musical history, we decided to give a nod to rock n roll in the room’s design. Elements include vintage rock posters, a 45” record turned napkin dispenser, and framed one-of-a-kind photographs of musicians. What the room doesn’t include is NOISE:)  The yard Is part of the appeal of staying with us. It's got plenty of outdoor seating and room to relax in and lots of sun weather permitting. The space is One large room, rather than a full apartment, since there are convenient amenities but not a full kitchen. You enter through our garage, so when you first step inside, you're in the rustic garage level laundry area, and from there you enter the space itself, which is all yours and completely private.  3 People Maximum but if you have a larger group... We limit the number of people in the guest space to 3 people. IF you have a l

name: Quiet Room in Our Friendly Home
summary: Private room for up to two guests in our home includes access to our shared bathroom, kitchen, dining room, living room, laundry, free parking and wi-fi. Famous SF destinations easily accessible by local buses. Good restaurants within walking distance. Non-smoking.
space: Our home is a typical 2-bedroom San Francisco row house built over 75 years ago. We live on a quiet street in the Southeast part of the city.  The bedroom is very comfortable for up to two people. We do not consider requests for bookings of more than two people.

name: Lovely house, sunny bedrooms, free parking garden
summary: Hello. My cute little home is located in the sunniest neighborhood in San Francisco. It is near public transit, the freeway and SFO airport. There is a lovely garden and all the amenities of modern living: a big refrigerator, stove/oven, washer/dryer, hair dryer, wifi, iron, microwave, coffee machine and rice cooker.
space: Great weather, a nice backyard, a driveway parking spot, close to public transit, Smart TV, fresh interior paint and new bamboo floors. Open kitchen/dining area, a beautiful garden for coffee/tea or BBQ.

name: Beautiful Balcony, 2 Rooms, 3 Beds, Free Parking
summary: Spend the day in SF & the evening under the stars on your breathtaking balcony!  Comes w/ 2 rooms, TV w/ free Netflix, full kitchen (fridge, microwave, stove/oven, dishes), 2 bathrooms (shared w/ other guests), free/easy street parking, easy access from SFO (14min drive) and to downtown SF (15min drive, 3min walk to T Muni line to downtown). The smaller second room (comes with a full futon) is connected to and accessed through the larger front room (comes w/ queen bed & twin loft bed).
space: Please note that while your rooms are 100% private with a lock on it that only you will have, you will be sharing the kitchen and two bathrooms with three other Airbnb rooms.  This is part of the fun though as you can meet different people from around the world who are staying here with you.  Access to the kitchen and bathrooms is usually fine as most people spend the majority of their time out and about in the city, but sometimes during peak travel times you may feel the house being a little more full.  So to be very clear, you will see several other Airbnb guests in the home who are living close to you (the nature of such a dense city as San Francisco) and sharing the kitchen and bathrooms, but as you can see in the reviews that my guests have loved their time here as people are usually very friendly and respectful.  You're two bedrooms are connected, and you will need to go through one to get to the other from the balcony or to the kitchen and bathrooms (as seen in the pictures).  Y

name: Mid Century Meets Southern Hospitality in Bayview
summary: Make some fresh breakfast waffles in the waffle maker, take the T Line to famous Union Square for an action-packed afternoon, then come home to local pizza. This bright, modern pad features soft coral tones, cozy linens, and warm wooden furniture for a homey feel. Perfect for business as well as families.
space: Our lovely ground floor guest flat is an ideal retreat for travelers visiting both San Francisco and other areas down the peninsula. It has quick and easy access to both public transportation (the T line) and highways (101 and 280), as well as an easy drive to wine country, East Bay, or North Bay (Sausalito area). It has two bedrooms, a living room area, full kitchen and single bath. You also have your own separate entrance. Features: Full Kitchen with all the fun appliances you might need! Including: microwave, full refrigerator and freezer, Keurig coffee machine (we'll provide the coffee!), toaster, food processor (if we are missing something you might like, just message us and we will see if we can provide it!) Two big bedrooms - each with a extra comfy queen bed and multiple pillow types. There are also full closets in each room with hangers. Each room also has dressers for unpacking. Living Room area with big comfy sofa (which has a pull-out queen bed with pillow top for extra gue

name: Huge Beauty, 3 Beds, Full Kitchen & Free Parking
summary: Don't find just any room; book one in the heart of SF that you'll enjoy!  Your room has three full beds (each with memory foam mattresses),  space heater & fan, & large flat screen TV w/ Netflix. You have total usage of the kitchen (fridge, stove, oven, microwave, etc.) and two full bathrooms (shared w/ other guests). Easy, keyless self check-in. You'll have free/easy street parking, be a quick 14 min drive from SFO & downtown, 3 min walk to T train (which goes directly downtown).
space: Please note that while your room is 100% private with a lock on it that only you will have, you will be sharing the kitchen and two bathrooms with three other Airbnb rooms.  This is part of the fun though as you can meet different people from around the world who are staying here with you.  Access to the kitchen and bathrooms is usually fine as most people spend the majority of their time out and about in the city, but sometimes during peak travel times you may feel the house being a little more full.  So to be very clear, you will see several other Airbnb guests in the home who are living close to you (the nature of such a dense city as San Francisco) and sharing the kitchen and bathrooms, but as you can see in the reviews that my guests have loved their time here as people are usually very friendly and respectful.  Your large room has a lot of space!  As mentioned earlier, all of the full beds have a memory foam mattress on it to make your stay very comfortable. You also have a space

name: Beautifully remodeled 3 bedrooms in SF!
summary: A rare, recently remodeled, 3BR/2bath! This unit is fun, new and combines classic SF charm and modern touches. The space is designed for easy and comfortable stay!
space: With easy access to both public transportation and highways, this unit is ideal for travelers in both San Francisco and the peninsula.   Features: Three bedrooms - each with a comfy queen bed  Living area - with TV, Roku and AppleTV for streaming your favorite content  Kitchen - equipped with variety of  appliances including microwave, range, dishwasher and a coffee machine. Necessities for eating and basic cooking are available.     Bathroom and shower with provided towels Dining area - for fun meals and new memories Washer & Dryer - private washer & dryer located in the balcony Miscellaneous - extra towels, linen, iron & ironing board, hair dryer and other necessities available in unit

name: Beautiful Charming Garden Hideaway
summary: Our Private Entrance,  GARDEN HIDEAWAY features a Lush Garden setting  with outdoor seating, a Private deck that leads to your beautiful two-room suite.  A Brilliant queen bed and a queen sofa sleeper, private bath,Flat Screen Cable TV, wi-fi,Fridge,Coffee Maker, Tea Kettle, and a Welcome Basket of Goodies...........A True San Francisco  Welcome!
space: Our garden level, private entrance, two-room suite has a small private deck with beautiful cushioned seating and access to our lush garden with outdoor sofa seating.  A high, redwood  privacy fence provides peace and comfort. You are welcomed by a bottle of Wine, or Lagers  and Snacks!  STREET PARKING  surrounding our house is FREE and UNMETERED.  Part of city life, is patience when parking lol.  Just be patient and you will find a spot.   Simply watch for street cleaning days . There is NO PARKING IN DRIVEWAY, except for Loading and Unloading. We work at different hours in day and night, and need to get our cars in and out often. Thank you.   The main bedroom features a wonderful queen size bed, with amazing  mattress, 44inch Flatscreen TV (cable included).  Your suite also has a completely private bath with shower.    The main living room offers a beautiful leather queen sized sofa sleeper with extra orthopedic, memory foam mattress, microwave, keurig coffee maker, tea kettle,  a sma

name: Cozy, private suite with separate entrance.
summary: Private, cozy suite with a bedroom, living room, kitchen area, and bathroom. We have just about everything you need to make this your home away from home in our wonderful city.
space: The private suite is located in a typical San Francisco single-family home. We live upstairs, and you'll be in the downstairs suite. We have two young girls, so you may hear footsteps. It's just a fact of life in a crowded city. The upshot is that they go to bed quite early.  The downstairs suite is new -- about a year old. Construction completed in late 2016. You enter through the common main gate just as we do. At that point, one door leads upstairs and the other door leads downstairs. Past the laundry area downstairs (one of two laundry areas), there is another lockable door that grants access into the private suite.  We strive to provide as much as we can to make you feel comfortable staying in our home. To that end, in the bedroom, we provide a very firm Beautyrest mattress, new high quality bedding, brand new hotel feel pillows, antique wood nightstands, a solid wood side table, a new bedside touch lamp; in the living room --  there is a new Pottery Barn couch, a TV, a radio ster

name: Epic Views and Easy Parking - guest bedroom
summary: My place is away from the noise, pollution and hustle of downtown. You will sleep well, and may wake up to birdsong. It's convenient for the airport, has easy parking and yet you can be downtown in 15-20 minutes. You will enjoy beautiful views, friendly hosts and our loving dogs. My place is great for couples or families with children with a car.
space: Our family home was designed by local artists. From the antique-car-hood awning to the San Francisco Hyde Street Cable Car cable railing in the stairs, every feature is unique. High ceilings, walls of windows, and broad open spaces give this house a light and open feel and panoramic view of the city rare in a town where space tends to run sparse. Occasionally there is a second listing in this home for the master bedroom on the third floor, which is slightly larger. The title of the second listing is "Enjoy space, quiet, views and easy parking". My home is best for visitors with a car, or using Uber, Lyft or Taxis. Public transit is possible but slow from my home. The neighborhood is very residential, with the highest rates of home ownership in the city. There are nice restaurants nearby, but you will probably want to drive to them rather than walk. We use 100% renewable electricity.

name: Private room & study with lots of space
summary: Welcome to my house in Beautiful Bayview! I am about 15 minutes from the airport and  Downtown San Francisco. I’m 2.6 miles from the Chase Center, 3.4 miles from Oracle Park and 3.6 miles from Moscone Center. This room is spacious and extremely comfortable.   You will have a lot of room to breath, relax and get a great night's sleep. The adjacent room may also be occupied by a guest so please be courteous by keeping the noise down. I  welcome people from all countries, backgrounds, and cultures.
space: I am listing my beautiful room on Airbnb.  In this city, the rooms are tiny and my house has a lot of space and you can actually breath in this room.  This is the size of 1.5 rooms, as you have a small, cute study area as well.  You have a lock on the main door, so this is a private space for you.  I have hardwood floors throughout my place, so great for those with allergies.  I have 1.5 bathrooms that are shared.  There is one full bathroom with a shower  on the same level as the bedrooms and a small half-bath just past the kitchen.  You have access to both bathrooms.  In the morning from 5:30 am to 6:30 am, the showers are usually occupied.

name: Priv Room, TV w/ Netflix, Kitchen, Great Parking
summary: This is a cozy private room w/ a full bed (and optional twin air mattress upon request) and flat screen TV w/ free Netflix. You get to use kitchen during your stay (fridge, microwave, stove/oven, dishes, coffee, etc.) and 2 bathrooms (kitchen & bathrooms shared w/ other guests). You'll have free/easy street parking, be a quick 14 min drive from SFO, 3 min walk to T train (which takes you downtown and AT&T Park), and a 13 min drive to downtown and AT&T Park.  You'll be in the heart of it all! :)
space: Please note that while your rooms are 100% private with a lock on it that only you will have, you will be sharing the kitchen and two bathrooms with three other Airbnb rooms.  This is part of the fun though as you can meet different people from around the world who are staying here with you.  Access to the kitchen and bathrooms is usually fine as most people spend the majority of their time out and about in the city, but sometimes during peak travel times you may feel the house being a little more full.  So to be very clear, you will see several other Airbnb guests in the home who are living close to you (the nature of such a dense city as San Francisco) and sharing the kitchen and bathrooms, but as you can see in the reviews that my guests have loved their time here as people are usually very friendly and respectful.  Also please note that the skylight above you is the only window access in this room. We live in one of the best areas in San Francisco for parking. Most places you'll ne

name: Spacious two-bedroom in San Francisco Victorian
summary: Hi Everyone! I am renting a large stand alone two bedroom apartment in the lower level of my house. Built in 1900 this classic San Francisco Victorian has plenty of charm but recent renovations give it a modern feel and all of the comforts that you hope for while traveling. The apartment is perfectly located to access the City or the peninsula - it's a 15 minute drive from the airport and a short ride away from downtown.
space: The apartment is quite large and has two bedrooms (each with a comfortable king bed), a living/dining room, a kitchen, and a full bathroom. It is furnished throughout with high quality, interesting pieces that make the space homey and comfortable. Being an avid traveler myself, I added all of the conveniences I hope for when away from home. Desks to work from in both bedrooms, a large flat screen TV with Netflix. even the small details like surge protectors on the night stands were thought out. The wifi is extremely fast (150 Mbps down) and there is strong coverage across the entire apartment. The kitchen i s fully stocked, fresh linens and toiletries are provided, and there is even a washer and dryer for your exclusive use. All in all it's a lovely space perfect for your trip to San Francisco.

name: Home SUITE Home
summary: The suite is conveniently located steps away from major bus lines and minutes from some of the best SF has to offer!! Located in sunny Silver Terrace neighborhood of San Francisco only a ten minute cab ride  to the airport and ten more to the heart of the city.  Close aproximity to freeways keeps cab ride fares low!
space: Enjoy your very own newly rennovated private suite.  The suite is bright and airy.   There's a quaint kitchen which is equipped with all the necessities to make a great meal (e.g. coffee maker, burner top, and toaster oven).  A built-in table with swivel bar stools is across the way for a cozy sit down dining experience.   The suite is outfitted with a queen Tempurpedic mattress for optimal sleeping comfortability.   There is also a sofa which can be converted to a bed.  I provide all the linens for the bed as well as the sofa sleeper.   I have a flat screen Tv that can be connected to the internet with the use of your laptop.  I do not have cable Tv. The bathroom is tucked behind a barn door for complete privacy.  There's a frameless standing shower big enough for 2 people, vanity with plenty of counter space, and large walk-in closet.  I provide hand soap, blow dryer, towels, and toilet paper.   I believe you will really enjoy the space that I have created.  Happy travels!

name: Cozy Private Room&Bathroom in Bayview Heights! :)
summary: We offer a private room with its own bathroom in the Bayview Heights district of San Francisco. There is conveniently a train two blocks away that takes you straight to Downtown.
space: We are living in a four bedroom home on top of a hill in San Francisco. Our home has a great view of The City from the living room; it is also walking distance from the bus stop that takes you directly to Downtown San Francisco. You will have a comfortable, clean private room-- with a queen bed, futon, dresser, TV, and closet-- and a full private bathroom. The room is also the only room on the floor along with the living room and kitchen whereas all other bedrooms are on the higher floor-therefore, there is lots of privacy :)

name: Affordable Room in San Francisco
summary: FREE Street PARKING! 15 min from downtown SF, a home away from home. Affordable private room with 2 twin beds in SF in a peaceful neighborhood and gorgeous views of the SF Bay. Very friendly and accommodating host with a touch of Filipino hospitality. Come, visit San Francisco!
space: This home has been remodeled and updated. Private room is good for 2 guests. Your room has two twin beds for your restful sleep, linens provided, a mirrored closet and head of bed, your own Samsung cable connected TV, salt lamp for night’s dim light, portable heater that keeps the room warm, free wireless internet, and a telephone line with unlimited calls anywhere in North America, including Canada and Mexico. The bathroom is next to your room. Bathroom is shared in the house. It has shower, towels, soap/bath gels. Cameras/CCTV are installed outside the house and one inside the house facing the hallway for security.  ****** Usual check-in time is between 3:00 PM - 7:00 PM and is flexible if there is no guest checking-out from this listing on the day of your check-in. There are times you can check-in as early as 7AM provided that I don’t have a guest checking-out on the day of your check-in or I have a cleaner who can clean right away. Please ask. Check-out time is on or before 12:00 n

name: Chic, sun-drenched studio with views & parking
summary: Boho-chic, sun-drenched studio anchored in the Bayview district. The fully furnished, 600 sq. ft. studio offers expansive city, hill, and Bay Bridge views.   The king-sized bed and full-sized sofa bed accommodate three. A garage spot fits a compact-sized car. Nearby transportation (Muni T-Line, Bayshore Caltrain stop, Hwy 101 & I-280) simplify exploring the city, traveling to the airport, commuting to Silicon Valley, visiting the UCSF medical center, or attending Chase center concerts.
space: Perched in the Silver Terrace, this bright and airy unit gets great light throughout the day and offers magic hour sunsets in the evening.  Designed to provide distinct areas to enjoy, the bedroom area keeps a king-sized bed, purple velvet reading chair, chest of drawers, and view of nature.  The sitting area offers a sofa that converts into a full-sized bed. If you tire of the view, the sitting area's TV informs and entertains.  From the sitting area, you can step out into your private balcony. Here, you can enjoy the breeze and songbirds nesting in the eucalyptus tree. The kitchen is fully equipped. Store your goodies in the apartment-sized fridge. Use the oven, stove or microwave to cook or warm up meals. Serve over the bar.  The bar lit by these mellow yellow 1960s lights, always pleases. It sits three. And the space, of course, wouldn't be complete, without its pink tiled private bathroom. Please note we do not allow smoking anywhere on the premise.

name: Happy & Sunny Bayview Living - South Bedroom ❤️
summary: Hey! Make yourself comfortable, and welcome to my home here in the historic Bayview, San Francisco. I live in the master bedroom with my girlfriend Tiffany, and there are 2 private bedrooms available: this room and North (https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: Making sure people have a good time is my  mission, so let me know what your mission is in SF and I'll try my best to make recommendations. I enjoy sharing good coffee with my guests, we got french press or espresso. Help yourself to cereal, milk, eggs. Your bathroom has a heated bidet, it's rather amazing.  Please let me know if you need more blankets or prefer the thermostat turned up.

name: Wing of San Francisco(旧金山之翼)2 Rooms for 1–5people
summary: WoSF位于旧金山市东南区的中西合璧2房1厅1卫浴大阳台整套房;单独出入口;宁静安全社区;免费提供停车位和早餐等｡驾车2分钟上101高速公路,距旧金山机场13分钟车程,20分钟到Downtown,邻近公车站餐厅超市等,交通购物方便快捷. Located at the southeast part of SF, WoSF is a Chinese styled interior home including two warm & bright bedrooms, classic blue white porcelain themed living room & dining space, and a big deck perfect for relaxation. We welcome a group of 1 – 5 people, provide FREE BREAKFAST& PARKING SPOT. 2 min driving to 101/280Fwy;13 min to SFO; 20 min to Downtown. 10 min to the Chase Center.
space: WoSF(旧金山之翼/窝舒服)是充满中国风的美式独立屋家庭旅馆,位于旧金山市区阳光灿烂的东南部风景区湾景岗半山腰,两房一厅一卫浴整套出租给同一批客人,最多可住五人｡开车两分钟上101高速公路,13分钟内南可去往旧金山国际机场和硅谷圣荷西,北可去往280高速､旧金山市中心和渔人码头等名胜景点｡走路两个街口有公交车站29路去往旧金山市大州大､金门公园､列治文区域和海边;两个街口可坐公交轻轨电车T-Line直达UCSF､巨人队(Giants)球场Oracle Park､NBA金州勇士队新球场New Golden State Warriors Chase Center､加州火车站Cal-Train Bay Shore Station､海傍大道､旧金山市中心Downtown购物区和金融区,Cable Car叮当车站,市政厅金顶大楼City Hall,及同性恋社区Castro等热门景点｡步行8分钟San Bruno街上有8(8AX)､9､9R路车分别去往渔人码头､中国城,Downtown等｡海内外客人自助旅游､探亲访友､出差开会前来住宿皆宜｡相对于旧金山市中心很难泊车及费用高昂,本民宿可提供一个停车位,适合自驾车或使用Uber､Lyft等租车方式游玩,公交系统也十分方便快捷｡本民宿特别提供为客人早到或迟走行李存取的超值服务｡请向房东咨询详情｡本民宿并不在旧金山市中心,不靠近任何热门景点,豆腐青菜各有所爱,如果您不喜欢我的民宿位置,恳请您不要预订!!! WoSF welcomes up to 5 guests and is located on the sunny and quiet side of San Francisco. The rooms are airy and comfortable with Chinese culture decorations and instrument decors, Blue-and-White porcelains themed furniture and Chinese brush paintings all throughout the house. There are many trees and parks in the area. We are NOT located at central San Francisco NOR

name: Relaxing and private, with views!
summary: Welcome to my cute, cosy, and quiet guest suite situated on the ground floor of my home in the sunny and diverse Bayview district of San Francisco. Look out your living room window to gorgeous city views that stretch to the bay. Make yourself some coffee in the morning, then head out to explore. Just 2 blocks to the local train to downtown SF.  If you're looking for all the conveniences of home, go ahead and book! I'm also a very friendly and nice host! :)  SF Registration: STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: Come back to your own space to relax after enjoying the city.  My guest suite has a kitchenette and comfy living room with lots of seating for 4 to watch free Netflix or Amazon Prime on a 32" TV if you want to stay home for the evening. The separate bedroom has lots of closet space and a comfortable queen size bed. The bathroom has a spacious shower with good water pressure and all the towels and basic toiletries you'll need.

name: Private Suite with Sunny Bedroom
summary: Feel at home in the sunniest part of SF! This private two-room suite has a separate entrance, parking, sunny bedroom w/ a memory foam mattress, private bath, and a living space w/kitchenette. Two blocks from the Muni-T direct to downtown; also close to Caltrain.
space: Our private suite has its own entrance and is complete with a kitchenette, living space, full bath, and a sun-drenched bedroom. The bedroom has an amazingly comfortable, full size memory foam mattress and a garden view. The kitchenette and living space are combined with a cozy leather chair for relaxing and a cafe table for dining. In the kitchenette you will find a small refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, tea kettle, dishes and utensils. In addition to the suite, guests will have access to the garden. Snacks will also be available. Wi-Fi is included and is very high speed! Parking available upon request.

name: Queen Bedroom w/ Best of Everything
summary: We have a lovely room with a  queen bed. Our place has the best of everything- minutes to downtown, minutes to the airport, very quiet, free breakfast. It has lots of natural sunlight. The location is perfect for travelers as well as business people.
space: I provide a private clean, furnished bedroom. The queen bed can fit up to 2 people.  The bedroom is located next to our kitchen and bathroom.  It is large and very sunny as you have 2 large windows.  There is a large TV that has many cable TV channels in the bedroom.  We are a family of 3- husband, wife ( who is from Greece ) and our son who goes to the best high school in SF and plays soccer.  Easy Public transportation to San Francisco financial district, the  embarcadero, pier 39, union square, etc. We are  warm and  friendly hosts. I offer coffee/tea/cereal/yogurt/ granola  for breakfast .  I know the city pretty well, and can guide you to get from point A to point B, suggest great restaurants, places to see, etc.  I also have a private beautiful backyard.  I provide clean towels, soap, queen  bed, breakfast, and Free On Street Parking (the on street  parking is easy in our area, most locations in SF  you need a parking pass when parking for more than 2 hours,  for our  location yo

name: ★ Gorgeous California Hideout ★ In Hot New Bayview
summary: Welcome to our #BayviewBnb, your home away from home in San Francisco! Here you’ll experience a quintessential San Francisco neighborhood. A diverse, tight-knit community, brimming with locally-owned restaurants and warehouses full of hidden teasures.  Enjoy panoramic views of the city and Bay, walk along the bayside trails, or sip coffee at a local cafe. Our newly-renovated 2 bed/2 bath unit with living room is perfect for traveling families, businesspeople, or a group of your best friends!
space: In San Francisco, the sun can often be hard to find through all the fog, but in Bayview you’re in luck! The neighborhood is known as San Francisco’s sunniest.  San Francisco has the world's best combination of natural beauty (water, vineyards, redwood forests, headlands, and hills), museums and attractions, incredible food, craft coffee, beer, and cocktails, and of course, California wine! When you book, we'll have great recommendations for you for places to eat and things to do.  We put extra care into creating the coziest experience for your visit with comfortable bedrooms and a living room equipped with WiFi, a smart TV (with Netflix and HBO), games, books, Bluetooth speakers, and a kitchenette for your enjoyment. Our Airbnb is sandwiched between two elementary schools, one of which has a newly-remodeled public playground and outdoor fitness station, as well as public picnic tables and grills for BBQing.   You can get downtown in 20-30 minutes via Muni train, car/Uber, or by jogging

name: Bernal Heights Architect's Retreat
summary: Want to stay a few nights in an architect's home? Stay in style and see what's on the boards too! Bernal Heights is a great place to stay while visiting SF. The guest room is on the main floor along with the living room, dining room, and the kitchen. The guest bath is behind the kitchen with access to the garden. The bathroom is not accessed directly from the guest bedroom. Although listed as a "private" bath, during business hours weekdays my staff may use this room. Added fire pit to garden!
space: Possession of a San Francisco Short -Term Rental Registration Certificate certifies that the registration certificate holder has agreed to comply with the terms of the San Francisco Short-Term Residential Rental Ordinance (San Francisco Administrative code section 41A). This ordinance does not require an inspection of the unit by the City for potential building, housing, fire, or other code violations. Cozy, quiet, kitchen just painted in December 2017, fire pit with outdoor lounge added in the Summer of 2016.

name: Stylish Spacious Garden Master Bedroom w/ en Suite
summary: Studio (ground floor garage access) with a private bath, lush private patio.  Bernal Hts is a hip village within San Francisco. With a choice of some of the hippest bars, restaurants, and parks Bernal's location has not only the convenience of an urban hub, but it has very easy access to public transport. The studio is always professionally cleaned. Expect down pillows and a down comforter and quality Parachute or Brooklinen bedding. **Entrance to bldg is shared - Entrance to the apt is private.
space: The Place Whether your stay is for business or pleasure, you are sure to feel right at home in this one-of-a-kind spacious and stylish master suite with gorgeous private garden/patio in Bernal Heights. Lounge in the living room area or enjoy some fresh air in the private backyard before soaking your stresses away in the full bathroom’s walk-in shower. Enjoy the spacious bedroom area and snuggle beneath the covers of the cozy Queen bed. Linger in the morning and catch up on your favorite shows and movies on the sleeping loft’s flat-screen Samsung TV! The Location Located in Bernal Heights near Mission, Noe Valley and Glen Park, there is plenty to see and do in the area. Start the day off on the right foot with a stroll around Bernal Heights Park or Holly Park less than half a mile away. Grab a cup of coffee and breakfast Panini at Café St George or Cafe 78, but don’t forget to bring your laptop and take advantage of the free WiFi! Spend the day checking out the area’s nearby shops with

name: Grand and Cozy 1920's SF Studio
summary: Come enjoy our large studio in San Francisco's charming and convenient Bernal Heights! You'll enjoy your own cozy and private lodging with a romantic gas fireplace, wood and stone floors and artistic decor. You will be close to world class views of San Francisco and it's beautiful bay. Bus lines are close by and and parking is very easy!
space: Our complete description follows this city generated notice: SAN FRANCISCO SHORT-TERM RESIDENTIAL RENTAL REGISTRATION NUMBER: STR-920.   Possession of a San Francisco Short-Term Rental Registration Certificate certifies that the registration certificate holder has agreed to comply with the terms of the San Francisco Short-Term Residential Rental Ordinance (San Francisco Administrative Code 41A). This ordinance does not require an inspection of the unit by the City for potential Building, Housing, Fire, or other Code violations. THIS BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT was once a corner store. It has been tastefully remodeled to make a very comfortable living space. It consists of one very large room with a sleeping area sectioned off by curtains. It also has an attractive bathroom and a closet. There are areas for sleeping, dining, cooking, working and relaxing. The kitchenette has  a fridge, two burners, a microwave, toaster oven, coffee maker and filtered water on tap, as well as all the kitchenware

name: Stylish, cozy, private studio in Bernal Heights
summary: Our downstairs studio is like a hotel room with its own entrance, a kitchenette, bathroom and a comfy bed. Our home is close to public transportation and lots of shops, restaurants and parks. It is near the lively Mission district and quaint Cortland Ave. There is easy access to 80, 101 and 280 if you're driving south or east. Its best for 1 or 2 people, but might be able to accommodate a couple with 1 child.  A small dog would be okay, but there is no outdoor area.
space: The studio is about the size of a small hotel room, with a queen size bed, smart TV you can watch your own streaming service on, breakfast table and chair, a side chair.  There is a closet for your use.   The kitchenette includes an under-counter refrigerator, sink, and microwave, as well as an electric kettle and a French press coffee maker.  We provide coffee and tea for you to make yourself.  There are glasses, mugs, plates and bowls.  There is silverware, a can opener, a bottle opener.  We provide granola, oatmeal and some light snacks or breakfast items. The shower and toilet are each behind a wall for privacy, and there is a heavy curtain separating the bathroom from the studio.  There is a door for the toilet.  However, the bathroom is not a completely separate room, so the studio is best for people who are comfortable with one another. Our studio is cozy and quiet, and with the curtain pulled to cover the glass entry door, it is quite private.  There is no outdoor space.  There

name: Quick HopSkipJump to SF Sights on Nearby Transit!
summary: Please read: Bright apt., 1st floor of our yr 2000 home in quaint SF neighborhood. High ceiling, kitchenette+wet bar, near delectable eateries+transit.    To downtown = $2.50 in 8" on BART! (4 stops = Powell;  6 stops = waterfront, last SF stop). Impeccably clean 475 sq-ft studio has its own entrance through the *garage,* its own bath, its own 20x20 garden, all you need to enjoy our city by the Bay! BART to SFO = $9.50+ 6-min. walk here. Not a basement apt! Only *friendly* guests here, please.
space: This spacious, light and roomy, modern garden studio on the first floor (*garage and garden level*) of our three-story full-time residence has a private entrance, a private bath, your own 20x20 colorful private garden just through the French doors, and a well-equipped kitchenette.  The sunny west-facing suite is spacious with a high ceiling, a bistro table and chairs, a desk, upgraded WiFi, a hosted (no charge) minibar with a kitchenette, a mirrored closet, and uncluttered decor.  We use high thread count, 100% cotton sheets with down-alternative comforters and duvet covers.  We pride ourselves in our white-glove cleaning standards and use bleach products to sanitize the bathroom. We may need to enter the laundry room to clean out the dryer vent before we do laundry in our garage.  This is in the hallway leading to the garden suite.

name: Holladay Home (w/parking)
summary: Holladay Home is a cozy one bedroom delux suite in Bernal Heights.  It is a quiet place but close to the action.  San Francisco and Bernal Heights in particular are known for the beautiful views but that means hills.  You will love it here.
space: This rental is located on a quiet street but so close to all the action. You can feel safe leaving you car in front of my house (you get the spot in front of the garage so it will always be free). Inside you will find a fully renovated space. You will have one bedroom with a queen bed and a door. In the common space is a queen sized bed and fold out queen futon to comfortably sleep 6 (TO CLARIFY: while we do offer 6 sleeping places we recommend this only for families with children or very short stays as the space is better for a max of 4 people).  There is a beautiful Japanese sliding door that separates the space so you can have some privacy from the front door if you like (a good friend of mine built the door by hand out of Canadian Cedar so they smell nice and are a personal treasure of mine).  Amenities You will have a mini fridge, microwave, and toaster oven, coffee maker and electric tea kettle. There is no official kitchen so you will need to use the bathroom sink to wash dishes

name: Large room with private full bath. Welcome to SF!
summary: Locals have tried naming this neighborhood but most accurately I am between Noe Valley, Bernal Heights and the Mission.  You will be convenient to buses and the J-Church Street Car, BART and highways 80 and 101 as well as the 280 freeway.  There are many  well-renowned as well as popular restaurants and bars nearby. As well as Mitchell's ice cream and various bakeries! I love hosting! Welcome! Best for couple or single. I have hosted adults with children, but that gets a tad cramped.
space: Pillow-top queen mattress with high thread count cotton sheets as well as a variety of pillow types.  I'm happy to share what I know (and love!) about San Francisco, and happy to give total privacy too. While AirBnB lists me in Bernal Heights, it is more accurate to say that I am in between Noe Valley, Bernal Heights and the Mission. BART: Less than a 10 minute walk MUNI: J Church Street Car Line two long blocks away MUNI Bus Lines 14, 24, 36 and 49 between two and four blocks away. Very easy off of 80/101 or 280 I've opened my home to people from around the world and across the U.S.! I look forward to welcoming you!  Please note lower than typical ceiling heights, plus there is a beam running the width of the room. There are NO cooking facilities available. No toaster oven, no microwave not even a coffee maker. Most guests enjoy sampling the variety of Café and restaurants within two or three blocks.

name: Nicely remodeled room, free parking in Bernal
summary: Welcome to our newly renovated home in Bernal Heights.  Queen size bed and private bathroom. Parking off the street is free and easy. Cable HDTV and internet are included.
space: Mini refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, small heater in the room, for your comfort.

name: Private-BD/Shared-BTH in 2-BD/2-BTH TwnHse
summary: Townhouse is clean, quiet, well appointed, w/private patio. Two separate guest room listings available to book 7 max.  15-minute drive to SFO Airport & downtown. Free street parking in front of the building.  City bus stop outside front door; 15-minute bus to BART, 25-minute bus to downtown.  Farmers Market Saturdays, 2-block walk. name: Beautiful Garden Room & Magical Garden/Views in SF
summary: Discover the best of San Francisco atop beautiful Bernal Heights. The summit of Bernal Hill is a short walk from our door providing breathtaking vistas of our city. This colorful spacious room sleeps three and has a shared bath.  A unique home with magical, park like gardens. Relax in our garden oasis and enjoy stunning City, Golden Gate Bridge and skyline views.  Walking distance to excellent restaurants, markets and unique stores. Very EASY PARKING and bus access.  10 minutes bus ride to BART!
space: This is a spacious private room with shared bath in a unique, colorful San Francisco, Bernal Heights home with plenty of street parking!  A fifteen minute walk away from the vibrant Latino Mission District or Bernal's lovely Cortland Avenue which offers a fabulous choice of excellent restaurants, markets and unique stores.   The home opens onto a magical, park-like garden with many terraces where guests can enjoy views of San Francisco, watch the birds, listen to the relaxing sounds of the "WaterContraptions" or just enjoy a cup of tea or a glass of wine. The Garden Room is a colorful and spacious room and has a comfortable full size bed and a single bed and of course opens on to the magical garden!   There are two shared bathrooms in the house available to guests, each has a shower and one has a tub.  Our eclectic indoor/outdoor living area/chill space has a kitchenette with a fridge (stocked with simple breakfast items), kettle, coffee maker, microwave, crock pot and toaster oven plu

name: Live like a local in detached private cozy studio.
summary: A Detached bright studio with full bath & kitchenette in an authentic SF neighborhood. Bernal Heights is quaint and quiet with amazing views. At just over 100 sq ft, experience tiny living in our cozy space. It has a queen Murphy bed that pulls over a large couch, a private full bathroom, and a kitchenette. Studio is detached from the main house with a private entrance.
space: Although we are not located in the tourist zone, we are a short ride away. Close to freeways, bus lines, restaurants, cafes and shops. Our bright, sunny small studio (just over 100sq ft) is detached from the main house with its own separate entrance. It's up 12 steps from street level behind a locked gate. The studio is fully equipped with everything you need to make your stay comfortable -- from a queen Murphy bed with a couch to a mini kitchen and full bathroom. There's guest WiFi and a 42-inch HDTV with hundreds of basic cable channels. There's an AppleTV for streaming Netflix, or you can connect your now device via ChromeCast or AirPlay. The kitchen area has a nice wooden breakfast bar for eating or planning your day out. The two wooden stools tuck underneath the table and there's an electrical outlet above the table for recharging your devices. The table is on sliding rails so it can be moved to make more room when the bed is fully extended. The mini kitchen has a sink, induction

name: Sue's Place
summary: Registration number: STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Sue's Place is in Bernal Heights - a very inviting and attractive real neighborhood with an exquisite park with extraordinary views of the city and great restaurants two blocks away. Easy transportation connections.
space: Sue's Place is a warm and welcoming home with a private bedroom at the top of scenic Bernal Heights, a friendly community/village in the Mission that includes coffeeshops, organic food grocery, bookstore, wineshop, fab restaurants ( Peruvian, Nepalese, Japenese, Californian, etc.). There is a hiking trail from the top of the street to Bernal Park with lofty views of San Francisco. The airport is 15 minutes away and Downtown is 15 minutes away. Public transportation is accessible. Healthy breakfasts and wifi are available. There is a hot tub in the garden for your use. Private bathroom

name: Private room and Private bath.
summary: The is located on the first level of the house, it is private bedroom with a private bathroom.  It is like a studio with lots of privacy. It has wifi connection.
space: Located in the vibrant Bernal Heights neighborhood I'm offering a double bedroom with private bathroom on its own floor in a turn of the last century house.  Use of the shared kitchen and adjoining dining area is welcome. The private bathroom is new with a tub and shower. The house is on a quite street just steps away from the amenities of Cortland Avenue.  Cortland Ave. is a tree lined street has everything one might need . There are excellent restaurants, gourmet bakeries, cafes and bars with outdoor patios, a book store, gift shops, banks, a wine shop, a library and playground just to name a few. The 24 Divisadero bus line passes along Cortland. This line is a great way to see the city. It passes through the heart of town hitting many major points of interest and connects to everything. It passes through to the Mission, Noe Valley, the Castro, the Height, the Western Addition, up and over Pacific Heights and down to the bay and the Marina Green. Glorious! A great resource to the tou

name: Awesome n cute  Bernal/ Mission rm  1 or 2 people
summary: Great  private room in 2 bdrm cottage. Garden view. Double bed, kitchen, wifi,  awesome amazing  garden with pond. Shared full kitchen, bath and living room. Within walking distance to many trendy and local faves- restaurants, pubs n clubs! Walk to charming Cortland Ave, Bernal Heights +Mission St. -vibrant culture- world famous burritos! 10 min trendy Valencia corridor.. Excellent transport links downtown, airport & Silicon Valley. Great room for long term stays!
space: Private room in a cottage in Bernal - Mission area. Great location and excellent transport links. Private beautiful garden area. Full kitchen-coffee and tea provided. Lots of plants. WIFI to hook up your laptop. The cottage is a friendly creative space with cool artistic and musical tendencies. Famous Valencia corridor and Mission St loaded with restaurants, clubs and interesting shops. Best burritos in all SF! Corner store 2 min away. Safeway, Walgreens 5 min away. Street parking available nearby. Easy close public transport to all over SF, 20 min downtown, and freeways nearby to explore. Quickest freeway link to Silicon Valley and San Jose.  This is a great cottage and great location.

name: Bernal Heights - Le Refuge
summary: Lovely bright and comfortable one bedroom apartment with tiled floors and garden access. Sleeps two comfortably with couch available for another guest. Located on a quiet street, with easy access to parks, public transport, and local restaurants.
space: Welcome to Bernal Heights! This cozy refuge is the perfect place to relax and rejuvenate, or get some work done in a quiet and sunny space.

name: Charming bedroom in Bernal Heights
summary: Located in beautiful bernal heights, next to the very popular Mission district,  has easy access to public transportation. If driving no problem, freeway is easily accessible from here. Many cute cozy restaurants await you in bernal heights.

name: Apartment across from Precita Park!
summary: Our spacious one bedroom with exclusive use of a kitchen, living room and bathroom is located in 'Redfin's' hottest 2014 neighborhood in America. Located directly on Precita Park and less than a block away from Precita Park Cafe, it is a comfortable retreat from the bustle of the Mission.

name: Jasper's Studio
summary: A cozy bedroom with a private entrance, your own bathroom and patio. Located in San Francisco's Bernal heights, 5 minute walk from Cortland street shops, restaurants, bars, grocery store, & more.  Free street parking & close to the 24 and 67 Bus lines, the 67 takes you directly to 24th street BART.
space: A nice, comfortable room  with a private patio in a quiet neighborhood in the basement level of a 3 story house. The brand new bed converts into two single beds or can be pushed together to form a king. The house is on a slope so your window gets lots of natural sunlight.

name: Bernal Heights Gem near SF Mission
summary: Private room in this home in San Francisco's hottest neighborhood, according to red fin and the New York Times. It's very techie friendly and has tons of nightlife and urban hiking potential. My promise to you is quality bedding with a very clean and comfortable place. My goal is always to assure your comfort.
space: Stay in San Francisco in the heart of the Hottest Neighborhood in the USA! according to (website hidden)! Yes, Bernal Heights, our little hidden gem, has become a star. What you get: A private room in a spacious Bernal Heights House on a tree-lined street in a safe, quiet, beautiful, conveniently located neighborhood. House has well cared for hardwood floors, oriental rugs throughout and is very clean, and has a lot of character. Bathroom is shared with respectable housemates. The spacious bedroom has a walk in closet and bay windows.  It's furnished with art deco era bedroom set with matching desk. WIFI is very strong and fast in the bedrooms. PLEASE NOTE that Bernal Heights is not at all touristy. It's not for everyone. It's an urban area with lots of nightlife, music and drinking/eating options. BUT it is NOT a touristy area at all. If that is what you're after than please look elsewhere. The MISSION and BERNAL are urban centers and are not always clean and perfect like Fisherman's

name: Garden View Room with Private Bath
summary: Peaceful garden view bedroom with a private bath in a sunny Edwardian home.  Stay at this quiet Bernal Heights retreat and stroll up the slope to enjoy the shops and restaurants of Cortland Avenue!
space: Your bedroom has French doors that open onto a restful and serene backyard patio.  Enjoy sitting with your morning coffee in the sun or under the patio umbrella, watching the butterflies.  Freshly washed sheets and towels are included. Right next to your bedroom in the hallway is your private bathroom with a bathtub/shower combination and a skylight.

name: BERNAL HEIGHTS 600 Sqft Private Studio/Bath/Patio
summary: The studio is close to Cortland Ave and the Mission District with a 94% walk ability score.  Five minute walk to many restaurants, bars, cafes & parks and 15 minutes from SFO airport. Private entrance & patio. Rental features a Queen  bed with Tuft & Needle mattress, private soaking tub, full shower & heated floors. Small fridge, microwave & toaster in unit (no full kitchen);complimentary coffee & snacks. Free street parking. Our place is great for couples, solo adventurers & business travelers.
space: The studio is close to Cortland Ave and the Mission District with a 94% walkability score.  Five minute walk to many restaurants, bars, cafes & parks and 15 minutes from SFO airport. Private entrance & patio. The rental features a Queen size bed w new Tuft & Needle 5 star rated mattress and private soaking tub & full shower with heated floors. Small refrigerator, microwave and toaster in unit; complimentary coffee/espresso, fruit & snacks. Free street parking. Our place is great for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers. 600 sq ft with private entrance and full bath with shower and tub. Small refrigerator in studio. Queen size bed with an option for a full size, sofa pull out with memory foam pad, as well. Studio and private bath access, along with sunny patio where entrance is located. Entry through French Doors on first level of home. My husband and I are in sales and work in the city. One of us should be readily available to answer any questions you have during your stay.

name: Quiet Bernal Heights cottage studio
summary: Hide away in our quiet, secluded back cottage with separate access. There's a full bathroom with a deep soaking tub, a queen bed, sofa (fold-out to full bed), love seat (fold-out to a cot), table and chairs.
space: The cottage front yard is our back yard, but we're up a floor and rarely use the back area, so you basically have your own private patio.  With queen bed, full-size fold-out couch, and cot-size fold-out loveseat, you could fit 5 adults, but it would be pretty cozy (cramped).  The space is about 400 sq ft, so more comfortable for up to a two adults and a child or two, depending on how small. You can make your own coffee and tea, there's a fridge, sink, toaster oven. The full bathroom has a deep soaking tub.  Towels, sheets, pillows, blankets and quilts are included. There is a space heater which takes a minute to get to temperature, but can be left on and heats up the well-insulated space nicely. There is no TV.  There is wifi, and a solar-powered blue-tooth enabled speaker.

name: Private patio & hilltop views
summary: Modern one-bed apartment with garden terrace and designer finishes. Steps away from The Mission and Precita Park. Sweeping views of the Bay, bridges and cityscape from atop Bernal Hill, just outside your front door.
space: This is the perfect San Francisco getaway!  Live like a local in this modern one-bedroom condo perched on it's own little crest on top of Bernal Hill.  Nestled among the trees, you will enjoy a perfect blend of privacy and natural light to capture dramatic vantage points of the hillside cityscapes.  Street-level private entrance. Fully equipped eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and butcher block counter tops.  Mix of concrete and Brazilian walnut wood floors.  Designer bathroom with glass stall shower.   Small office nook with glass top desk and computer monitor. Relax on your own garden patio landscaped with exotic succulents and native verdure.  Bistro table, lounge furniture, and gourmet gas BBQ grill. Comfy queen size bed with memory foam mattress. 44" HD flat screen LCD TV and hi-fi sound system for your personal music device.  Private laundry and storage room with your own washer and dryer. Cable TV and high-speed wifi included.

name: Mission District Views from Private Floor with Attached Bath
summary: From local spa-quality bath products to "smart room" light controls, thoughtful in-room amenities hit every detail to make this room the perfect place for Guests who prefer quality and want more than the average stay.
space: Your room and attached bathroom occupy the entire first floor. You get as much privacy as you like and can access the common areas of the house on the second floor. The space features well-crafted furnishings using solid wood, marble, and steel. (Just because you’re a visitor doesn’t mean your room should feel temporary.) After a day in the City, slumber in a foam-top, queen-sized bed outfitted with 100% cotton sheets and down comforter/pillows. Of course, synthetic options are also available. Watch the City from the comfort of your own chair and bedroom windows. There’s also a desk to get some work emails out. A large wool rug adds warmth to the room’s solid hardwood floors. In addition to the full closet with wood hangers and a luggage tray, efficient storage in the room provide plenty of space for your belongings. The in-room TV is 46 inches and has its own AppleTV with Netflix, Hulu and HBO included. Plug in and recharge with smartphone cables at the ready on both nightstands. Get

name: Spacious Quiet Rm w/Private Ensuite Bath in Castro
summary: A quiet safe space for quiet guests. Modern, cozy, room w/private en suite bathroom in Corona Heights/Castro. Perfectly located - just up the hill from the Castro, far enough away from hustle and bustle yet convenient & short walk. Perfect for single people, business travel, or couple: mini-fridge, Keurig, oatmeal, snacks. Large room, queen bed, cozy decor, plush rug. LGBTQI run/friendly. Free street parking, no time limit. Two cats - one friendly, one aloof. NOTE: no kitchen/living room access.
space: **This is a quiet home best suited for quiet guests. If you prefer late nights out or loud music/behavior, my place isn't for you!** My Corona Heights/Castro home features a larger-than-a-hotel master suite -- you have your own private bathroom - and includes some extras to make  your experience a little more luxurious!  QUICK FACTS ABOUT YOUR STAY -- Your own PRIVATE bathroom attached to your bedroom -- only you have access (I have my own) -- Large, quiet room in the back of the house, away from street noise   -- Extremely comfortable queen sized mattress bed (For those who use the metric system, that's 152 cm x 203 cm) -- Keurig coffee maker in the room -- small electric kettle to make tea and heat water for oatmeal breakfast  -- mini refrigerator in the room for your drinks, leftover food from dinners out, etc.  -- Plenty of street parking - no time limits (e.g., no 2-hour limit like most other neighborhoods in SF!) -- Free wifi -- 5 min. walk to Castro/public transportation; centra

name: Room w/ a View in the Castro!
space: When you are in SF stay in the heart of the Castro with me and my cat! There is a single bedroom in an Edwardian condo here with your name on it! I am three blocks to Castro and 18th and only two blocks to Dolores Park.The J Church  will connect you with downtown, the Embarcadero and all over the city.Cafe Flore, Philz, Harvey's, Midnight Sun, Toad's Hall, Le Marais Bakery one block down the street for croissants and lattes...However, every morning you are welcome to make yourself coffee or tea. Help yourself.  If you buy groceries and wish to store it in the frig, feel free. There is a TV in your room and WiFi access. Basically you are on your own but I am happy to offer any advice/suggestions/recommendations when you are here. I work from home most of the time. (I am a recruiter....I help companies find their top PR and Corporate Communications people) There is only one bathroom in the flat so THIS ROOM IS BEING RENTED OUT TO SINGLE TRAVELERS ONLY. NO COUPLES.. Again, this room is me
