name: Charming Private Castro Studio
summary: Our cozy and comfortable studio offers a perfect retreat for visitors and couples in the heart of San Francisco. Located on a hilly street just three blocks from the historic Castro district, guests enjoy easy access to all public transit for exploring our wonderful city!
space: Our studio is charming and cozy, offering guests a comfortable place to rest and relax after a day visiting the city. It has its own private entrance, which allows guests to come and go at their leisure. The studio ideally sleeps 1 or 2 people in the queen-size bed, measures 450 square-feet (40 square-meters), and looks onto our garden. There is a patio outside with a table and chairs for your enjoyment.  Please note: It should be noted that the studio has a Japanese-style tiered floor plan with an elevated bed. That means there are 6 stairs to go up and down to access the bed nook, which may inconvenience some older guests. Additionally, please note that the studio is on the ground/garden level. If you have questions or concerns about this please take a good look at the photos and email me. The studio includes: - Private side door entrance - Comfortable Queen-size bed, linens provided - Wireless internet - Our neighborhood guide to help guests find great restaurants, cafes and places

name: Stunning SF Bay View in The Castro
summary: Relax on the balcony and take in the view of downtown San Francisco and the East Bay all from the gay friendly neighborhood of the Castro.  You'll find quiet in your private room and the recently renovated bathroom offers both shower and tub.
space: What I love most about the apartment is the quiet, yet smack in the middle of the city.  If you like plants and tropical fish, you'll enjoy the living room. You'll have exclusive use of the full bathroom and are welcome to hang out in the living room and balcony.  Arrangements can be made for kitchen use during your stay as well. I'll be available each day and will spend some time acclimating you to the apartment and neighborhood when you arrive.  Have a special request?  Let me know.  The apartment is perched right above The Castro with only a 10 minute walk to shops, nightlife and The Castro street MUNI station.  One of my favorite things to do is take one of the many walking paths that zigzag across the hills from The Castro to Twin Peaks.   The nearest bus line is only 2 blocks from the apartment although I prefer to walk to The Castro street MUNI station about 10 minutes away for more convenient service.  Street parking is comparatively easier in my neighborhood with spots usually

name: Perfectly located Castro
summary: 1895 Victorian flat w/ 12 ft ceilings. (No Long Term Rentals or couples) Close to Mission, & 2.5 blocks from Castro theater. MUNI is 3 blocks away. Room is small and cosy, and great value for one of the most expensive neighborhoods in the US!
space: We live in an 1895 Victorian top flat with 12 foot ceilings on the best block in San Francisco.  Our calendar is always up to date. Location Location Location~ Our home is close to the Mission, Lower Haight, and 2.5 blocks from the Castro theater.  The underground is 3 blocks away, with a street car even closer.  The room is small and cosy, but a great price for one of the most expensive neighborhoods in the US! Please fill out your profile if you are interested~and make sure to arrange a time to meet prior to your arrival, I lead a busy lifestyle, work full time, and wouldn't want to miss anyone! Check in is at 5 and we are 37 steps up from street level.  Restaurants are plentiful and beautiful Dolores Park is quite close.  Your room has a twin day bed 75 inches long with a desk and a solid door. The room is 9.25 feet by 8 feet. Amenities include wireless and a gorgeous full kitchen.  We have one cat that enjoys company almost as much as we do and a sweet rescue pooch. Our flat gets m

name: Castro Guest Suite With Continental Breakfast
summary: A perfect hotel alternative, our fully furnished suite is a private retreat complete with queen-sized Tempur-Pedic bed, high-quality linens and towels, tranquil garden, in-suite continental breakfast items (food & beverage included in the suite's refrigerator) and spa-like luxury bathroom. Close to major public transit. Easy on-street parking (some restrictions apply).
space: Located on the lower level of the owners' attractive 1938 home, the guest suite offers:  •  A private entrance to our fully and tastefully furnished bedroom and bath suite •  Fully adjustable, queen-size Tempur-Pedic bed with Boll & Branch linens •  Luxury hotel-quality bathroom with high thread count towels, radiant heat floor, Toto high tech toilet with bidet, rain head shower and views of the private patio (guests love our bathroom!) •  42" Plasma TV and DVD player with surround sound and over 100 channels of programming, including HBO and Showtime •  Refrigerator, coffee maker and electric tea kettle (no microwave, kitchen or kitchen privileges) •  In-suite continental breakfast food and beverage—like locally made banana bread, organic orange juice, coffee, tea, fresh fruit, goat cheese and rice crackers •  Free wireless high-speed internet access •  Unlimited use of our beautifully landscaped, tranquil garden with a pond—perfect for morning coffee before a day of sightseeing or wo

name: Castro Classic Victorian w/ Views
summary: Our inviting home has the look and feel of San Francisco. Hardwood floors and original molding are among the small touches that give it the classic feel that tells city dwellers they're home. Blocks from the Castro MUNI, you can walk most anywhere.
space: Classic San Francisco top floor flat with stunning views of the city, San Francisco Bay, and the Berkeley Hills. 5 rooms include a living room, office, eat-in kitchen, and two bedrooms. A small back landing with great views and a shared yard are great when the weather's fine. Four blocks from Castro and Market, which boasts the historic Castro theater, numerous great restaurants and bars, and multiple MUNI lines making all of the city very accessible. Or stay in the Castro! Dolores Park and the Mission are both walking distance from the apartment as are Hayes Valley and the Lower Haight. We often walk to Kite Hill or Corona Heights, both within 10 minutes, for jaw-dropping views of the city and the bay.  We offer free wi-fi, cable tv with all of the movie channels, and a washer/ dryer. Parking is plentiful within a block (Please see house rules for parking advice. Don't get a ticket!). There is one bathroom to share with us.

name: Edwardian flat, heart of the Castro
summary: Our place is just a block from the bars, restaurants, and shops that make the Castro the best place to live. Also walking distance to transportation that can take you anywhere in the city.
space: Our space is in the heart of the best gay neighborhood on the planet - The Castro! We have a cozy, private bedroom in the front of our home just waiting for guests. The room has a queen-sized bed, so it can accommodate two guests. There is also a small closet for storage and luggage. Right now the room is our comic book/reading room. So if you like comics and pop culture, then the room is a definite plus for you!

name: Upper Castro Flat
summary: A great get away in the upper Castro, minutes from the Castro, Cole Valley, the Haight, Golden Gate Park and the Mission. Sleeps 5, all the amenities including a full gourmet kitchen, huge shower, laundry, internet and Netflix. Come stay and enjoy!
space: This is a one bedroom loft apartment with an open floor plan.  IMPORTANT: There are no walls separating the sleeping areas.  The loft has sleeping capacity  for 5 in total: - a queen sized bed sleeps 2 - the sofa converts to a queen bed for another 2 - and a twin mattress under the stairs sleeps 1 There is a modern kitchen, with a full size stove/oven, microwave, refrigerator, and in-unit full size washer-dryer. The bathroom features a massive multi-person shower.  Top it off with a big screen TV, WiFi, and a backyard.  We are straight and gay friendly, pets are negotiable.

name: Castro/Corbett Heights Condo
summary: Enjoy this quiet bedroom suite in my luxury Corbett Heights condo. You'll have your own private bathroom & your own private entrance, and you are welcome to share my gourmet kitchen & living room with gas fireplace & beautiful views.
space: In addition to your own private bedroom suite with full bathroom and private entrance, you are also welcome to share the rest of my home with me. Enjoy wonderful city and bay views from the living room and deck. Stay connected with  wireless internet throughout the house. My gourmet kitchen is fully-equipped. I've got lots of room in the refrigerator and pantry, and coffee and tea for you to enjoy during your stay. The living room has a gas fireplace and cable TV. YOUR PRIVATE BEDROOM SUITE In your own private bedroom suite, you'll have a queen-sized bed (plus an optional twin-sized air mattress if you need it). Your huge walk-in closet has hangers, extra bedding and extra towels.  Note: All the pillows/duvets/blankets are hypo-allergenic (synthetic down). Your private bathroom with shower/tub has toiletries, a hair dryer and a first aid kit. Locals call my neighborhood "Corbett Heights" but you can refer to it more generally as the Castro. My home is a 10-15 minute walk to the corner

name: Futon in Sunny lofted living room with City Views
summary: New queen sized futon with a memory foam topper in our living room with amazing city views.  This is a 4th floor walkup in a fabled Castro victorian with all the modern amenities.  You have a very spacious living room (14'X21') to yourself and you share the master bath.  Paul the Dog may come in to stretch and sun himself but no humans will be coming.  We have no blinds or curtains so you wake up to the city at your feet.  Can accommodate a 2nd guest on request.
space: Our futon is in  a sunny and spacious living room with hardwood floors and amazing city views.   Located in a famed San Francisco Victorian 1-2 blocks from everything .   Enjoy a gourmet kitchen, and easy access to Muni or easy on-street parking.   There is a small refreshment area with a mini-fridge, microwave oven, dishes and utensils.  The living room has sweeping views of the city with lots of sunlight.   The living room has a maple wood floor with a persian area rug, with a large flat screen Smart TV.   You have full access to a fully equipped kitchen on the lower floor.    Attached to the the kitchen is the dining area with antique furnishing and a cherry wood table.  The entire two level flat, is hardwood flooring with persian rugs.      You will be sharing the master bathroom with me, your host  Ash along with Paul the dog whose bedroom is right next to living room.   We have a small front yard with an herb garden overlooking castro street.  Which is a great place to sit and pe

name: Private Guest Suite with Private Deck
summary: Charming updated private guest suite w/ separate keyless entry in a grand Victorian - Approx. 600 sq ft., fridge (w/ icemaker), hdwd floors, Miele washer/dryer, variety of snacks, granola, drinks, tea/coffee. Living area w/ Smart TV -Netflix and views of garden.  All you need for a comfortable stay. Very quiet & private. Walk to heart of the Castro or hang out on the deck or lush tropical garden. Near Noe Valley, Valencia Corridor & public transp. - minutes to downtown.
space: Few homes have the historical character and charm of this property which is approximately 600 sq ft. Nor do they have a quiet tropical garden to enjoy.  Located on a quiet street, you can easily walk to the heart of the Castro (one block down and 2 short blocks over) and take advantage of all that it offers.  Walk score of 94 (Walker's Paradise) - great restaurants, coffee shops, shopping, and grocery stores.  Hop on MUNI to Downtown in minutes - Transit Score of 87 (Excellent Transit). You can't beat the location!   Walk onto a deck overlooking quiet tropical garden. Some of the amenities include: - Several sets of new clean towels  - Several sets of new clean sheets  - Hair Dryer - Complimentary bottles of sparkling or flat water, soft drinks and alcoholic drinks (for those 21 and over) and assortment of teas, coffee and fresh fruits, snacks and chips - Thoroughly cleaned for your visit  - Wireless internet access  - Sub Zero Refrigerator  - Microwave  - Miele Washer/Dryer - Iron & I

name: Cozy Duboce Triangle Bedroom with Private Bathroom
summary: This recently remodeled flat is located in the heart of San Francisco...enjoy morning coffee on the private deck, prepare dinner in our open, gourmet kitchen, or relax in your newly redecorated bedroom. Our place is close to Fourbarrel Coffee, Mission Beach Cafe, Chow, Churchill, and Blackbird. You’ll love my place because of the high ceilings, the location, the people, and the ambiance. My place is good for solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).
space: This flat is located in Duboce Triangle and is steps from Duboce Park, neighborhood coffee houses, intimate restaurants (Sushi, French, American, Mexican, etc.) and public transportation.  My husband and I love walking to the nightlife in the Castro (close enough to easily walk to, but far enough away to avoid the noise and hustle and bustle).  Our street is a quite, friendly one block street that is very welcoming.  When you sit on the private deck and look out onto the huge backyard, you will feel like you are miles away from the major attractions offered nearby.

name: Charming, Private Castro Garden Apt
summary: A lovely studio in the super convenient Castro/Duboce Triangle neighborhood. Radiant floor heat. Huge windows overlooking the backyard. Separate entrance. Restaurants, bars, public transpo around the corner!
space: A beautiful & large studio (400+ sq ft) with access to a peaceful garden. Super centralized location--near Castro, Lower Haight, and Mission neighborhoods with a Walk Score of 100 (Walker's Paradise!). The apartment is tucked in the back of a 2-unit Edwardian building (accessible through a separate service entrance next to the garage). It is well-lit with floor to ceiling windows on one wall, and warm with hardwood floor throughout (radiant heat) and slate floor in the bathroom. The living area is separated from the sleeping area (queen-sized bed) by a bookshelf. The futon sofa can roll out easily into a comfortable, second queen-sized bed. Kitchenette has a compact fridge, microwave, coffeemaker, and electric tea kettle (no stove, oven, nor dedicated kitchen sink). Large shower (no tub) and vanity area in the bathroom. My partner Dan and I love San Francisco, and we love our neighborhood. We are literally a short block away from a large number of restaurants, bars, shops, and parks, y

name: Private Bath & Private Entry + Large Bedroom
summary: Modern & well-appointed bedroom w/ your own private en suite bathroom & private entry in the upscale and serene Corona Heights neighborhood. 10 min walk to Castro shops, bars & dining. Easy MUNI metro access downtown & near two scenic parks.
space: This is a spacious, comfortable, and super clean guest bedroom with a private en suite bathroom and private entry in a beautiful modern home located in the upscale neighborhood of Corona Heights in San Francisco adjacent to the Castro district. Free street parking. No meters or parking permits required.  Stay with confidence and safety, as this guest room is legally permitted and properly complies with the City of San Francisco Short-Term Residence Ordinance and is operated by an Airbnb Superhost with over 250 reviews and 5-star ratings. FOR BOOKING INQUIRIES: Please provide your full FIRST & LAST name and that of your traveling companion. Since we are sharing my home, for safety please share a little bit about yourselves like where you work, what you do & the nature of your visit to San Francisco. All guests must have a complete Airbnb Profile. Guests with no reviews or profile descriptions cannot be accommodated. Understandably, this is for safety, security and fraud protection reaso

name: Sunny Dolores Park Apartment
summary: Sunny two-room apartment located steps from Dolores Park in San Francisco's hip Mission District. Walking distance to some of the city's finest restaurants, bars, and the Castro with easy access to public transit.
space: The apartment has a private entrance and is completely separate. Within the apartment  are two rooms separated by a pocket door from each other.  Both rooms have french doors accessing a private deck. One room has a queen bed and the other a day bed that pulls out to sleep two twin size beds next to each other (king sizes). Also included in the rooms is a TV, fridge, microwave, kettle, cups, glasses and mugs, to enjoy takeout food in the comfort of home. There is no standard kitchen.  There is a very large bathroom with shower and tub. The apartment is tastefully furnished and quiet, and is ideally located within comfortable walking distance to Noe Valley's 24th Street commercial district, Valencia corridor/the Mission, and the Castro. All three neighborhoods offer a wide and delightful array of coffee shops, hipster bars, top-rated restaurants (Delfina, Tartine Bakery) and cool stores. We are steps from the recently renovated Dolores Park, which boasts stunning views of downtown, a la

name: Relaxed Apartment with a Patio in The Castro
summary: Brew a cup of coffee in a cozy kitchen with elegant tiling and find a seat on a decked patio wrapped in a leafy garden. Curl up with a book on a modern sofa in a living area boasting colorful paintings, a stocked bookcase, and exposed wood beams.
space: The unit is a private apartment below the main house with a private entrance.  There is one bedroom and a pull out queen sofa.  There is room for approx four people (2 per bed) and one bathroom. The summer kitchen features a brand new quartz counter top, beautiful spanish tile backsplash, drink refrigerator with freezer, microwave, toaster oven (for light heating), and a full set of dishes and glass ware for pizza night at home. There is closet and shelf space for your extra goods and an iron with an ironing board.  It's so close to the action it's not even funny! :-)

name: Lovely garden studio in the Castro
summary: A charming, cozy, private studio on a quiet (and very steep) street with garden access and great views of the SF hills.
space: Charming, quiet studio with private entry, private deck, small bath, and mini kitchen that has enough amenities for warming up food, basic cooking, and for making tea and coffee (electric hot plate, electric kettle, toaster oven, microwave oven, blender, and a small fridge). The back deck leads to a lush backyard with beautiful views of Twin Peaks and Buena Vista Park. This house is on a very quiet and very steep street with easy access to the Castro and Noe Valley neighborhoods (three blocks from the Castro theater), MUNI (Market Street lines - K, L, M, T, and F - MUNI #24, #48, #35, and #33), and several grocery and health food stores. Easy access to downtown via public transportation. Easy, safe street parking 1/2 block away. One-car garage and washer/dryer are shared with our family, living upstairs. Small children are welcome - a portable crib or an extra sleeping pad are always available.  Check in and check out times are flexible depending upon availability. Luggage can be left

name: Guest Suite with Private Entry in Geographic City Center
summary: Rise early to watch the sun rise over nearby Corona Heights Park.  Enjoy the views of Buena Vista Park and San Francisco Bay from your cozy suite (156sqft/14sqm) or while enjoying a glass of wine on your private garden deck. Your immaculate, private entry suite with Mid-century modern touches is located in the safe, convenient and central Corona Heights neighborhood.
space: • Sunny, cozy & immaculate  • Queen size bed, high quality sheets & comforter • Refrigerator, microwave, & Keurig coffee maker • Large closet & dresser • High definition cable television & free wireless internet

name: Unique Castro Neighborhood Rental
summary: Two room rental in the heart of the Castro, in the center of SF.  Your bedroom connects with the "view" room offering a fantastic panorama of downtown, the bay and neighborhood.  San Francisco at its finest.  A very comfortable stay! Shared bathroom.
space: San Francisco Short-Term Residential Rental Registration Number: STR-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Possession of a San Francisco Short-Term Rental Registration Certificate certifies that the certificate holder has agreed to comply with the terms of the San Francisco Short-Term Residential Rental Ordinance (San Francisco Administrative Code Section 41A).  This ordinance does not require an inspection of the unit by the City for potential Building, Housing, Fire, or other Code violations. While staying at our home, you have unlimited access to the kitchen, deck and backyard.  We will provide space in the refrigerator for your perishables and beverages.  The deck is a comfortable place to share conversation and enjoy a cup of coffee, a glass of Napa's finest or a cold Anchor Steam.  In the backyard, chose between three beautiful decks to relax in the sun (or fog) with a book or magazine.  We recently inherited a wonderful dog named Jasper.  He will make some noise on occasion but is full of love.

name: Upper Castro Studio
summary: A fantastic stay/work space, with private street level entry, quiet, blazing fast wifi. Great for vacation or work.
space: Your studio is a big and roomy, light-filled space with  a queen-sized bed, a table a bench and two chairs to work or eat on, a comfy reading chair and an amoire with hangars, an iron and ironing board  The all-marble bathroom, two steps off the bedroom, has a great shower with lots of nozzles.  Towels and sheets are provided and  for long stays; maid service every two weeks.    You will have a private entry so no interaction is necessary, but we are open, kind unbiased people, straight and gay friendly, and look forward to meeting you.  This is a spare studio in my home, we live just upstairs. Thank you in advance for treating this space with kindness.  Quiet hours are 10pm to 7am. No smoking, loud screaming, or drama.

name: Victorian in the heart of Castro
summary: Located in the heart of Castro, our unit is a renovated, private room in a historic Victorian. Experience the charm and elegance of a bygone era, while enjoying the modern comforts of a recent renovation. Close to great cafes, shops and Muni metro.
space: Housed within a historic 1880's Victorian, our private room is a soothing, peaceful oasis in the heart of the Castro neighborhood. Spacious and comfortable, the room has a queen-size memory foam mattress, a full sized couch, flat-screen television with Direct TV satellite cable, and an en-suite bathroom with Grohe fixtures. The room has ample storage space, a coffee maker, and an iron/ironing board for your convenience.

space: The famed Mission Dolores Park, which is the vibrant heart of this culturally diverse neighborhood, is a block away.  The unit is the lower level of a newly restored 100 year old townhouse in a tiny quiet alley.  Immediately surrounding our neighborhood, and well within a few blocks, are other well- known neighborhoods, each with their own distinctive characteristics;  The Mission, The Castro (aka Eureka Valley), Noe Valley, Duboce Triangle, and Hayes Valley. We have a full bedroom suite with a queen size bed, dresser, closet, and make-up area, plus a separate den/living area with a queen size hide-a-bed couch. name: Hip Chinatown pad with epic views!
summary: Welcome to Mandy! This mid-century modern high-rise condo has epic postcard views of many San Francisco landmarks, including Alcatraz, Coit Tower, the Bay Lights, and the Transamerica Pyramid. Located in the heart of Chinatown, you're an easy 5-minute walk from four other vibrant neighborhoods: North Beach, Financial District, Nob Hill, and Union Square.
space: Hip and modern – and recently renovated and decorated – Mandy is a stylish two-bedroom corner unit with a balcony. This is the only high-rise building in Chinatown. It has a queen size bed in the blue master bedroom, and a queen size bed in the gray bedroom/office. Built-in coffee machine, washer & dryer, 48" TV with free Netflix, mid-century modern furnishings, tons of art and books, and a vintage-looking stereo are just some of the personal touches and amenities.

name: 6785 Bedroom w/ Bath in Chinatown & Central SF
summary: This bedroom has the perfect location! It is at the heart of SF Chinatown, near Little Italy, Nob Hill and very close to Downtown SF! This is the most desirable, walk-able and transit friendly neighborhood. Perfect for tourists sightseeing, and business travelers looking for lodging close to Downtown SF.
space: This is a freshly remodeled bedroom in Chinatown San Francisco, steps away from public transit stops, Downtown SF, Union Square, Fisherman's Wharf, Russian Hill, Nob Hill, North Beach (Little Italy), and Red Light District. The bedroom is at a perfect central location, and you can go to almost everywhere in SF by walking or taking public transit. Restaurants, clubs, bars, shops are everywhere around! The world famous Powell/ Hyde Cable Car has a stop only 2 blocks away from here!

name: Nob Hill Master Suite
summary: The Dollhouse! Experience your very own piece of history in the comfort of old San Francisco.
space: One of three Nob Hill Mini Mansions, " The Dollhouse,"  offers the opportunity to experience the romance and nostalgia of old San Francisco. Located 1 block from the historic Huntington Park (ideal for Sunday picnics), Grace Cathedral, Masonic Temple. This one-of-a-kind Nob Hill gem is ideal for entertaining guests. The home is surrounded by San Francisco's finest hotels: Stanford Court, Mark Hopkins, Huntington, Fairmont, Ritz Carlton. The home was designed by Mario Rocca the original proprietor of the Sir Francis Drake Hotel. This charming four-story home offers hardwood floors throughout with a cozy living room, formal dining room, kitchen,dishwasher/oven/refrigerator, four bathrooms, four bedrooms, bay windows, stained glass throughout, and a terrace facing the San Francisco waterfront, boasting a bird's eye view of San Francisco Bay, and watch the beloved iconic Trolley clang clang up the hill.

name: A Great Hotel Style Suite in Union Square
summary: Close to Union Square, Nob Hill, Chinatown, and the cable car, this hotel suite offers a quintessential San Francisco experience. Your room at the Worldmark San Francisco is well equipped for exploring the city with a queen size bed, full bathroom, and mini-fridge to store leftovers from the area's great restaurants.
space: The workout room means you don't have to leave your routine when you're away from home. The main floor has a free laundry room. WiFi is $4.95/day. Ask about parking charges.

name: Urban Downtown 1 Bedroom
summary: Downtown San Fran is all yours from this urban location. It's a historic building dating from 1908 and is a short walk to Chinatown, Nob Hill and Union Square. The famous Powell Street Cable Car stops just one block away!

name: Monthly Shared Home for Students 1
summary: Welcome to our home for budget-minded students, interns and J-1 work abroad participants visiting San Francisco for 1 to 6 months.  Unlike other shared houses on Airbnb that crowd many housemates into the same room, here you will have just one roommate.   The atmosphere here is friendly, social and international. You should be flexible, open to sharing, and have a high level of understanding and tolerance to cultures and customs that are different than your own.
space: Our home was created to encourage as much interaction between housemates as possible and still provide students with more quiet and privacy than is possible in a hostel.   However there still is a lot of dynamic social atmosphere in our house.   Our two person rooms are shared with other housemates of the same gender, unless opposite gender roommates have agreed to share. Unlike a hostel, the rooms have a desk, drawers an space to spread out, decorate, and make your temporary home feel comfortable. Housemates enjoy a free high speed internet Wi-Fi, a fully equipped kitchen, private bathrooms and laundry facilities. There's also a community common lounge with comfy sofas, chairs and community desks. Many of us also usually chip in and enjoy one weekly community meal together. We offer flexible and affordable monthly rates. This is month-to-month rental accommodation so a housemate request application and credit check is required.  New housemates pay for at least one month to start.  But

name: Shelli's Student Home (1 Month Min)
summary: Hello! Thanks for your interest in my communal student and intern home. Students and interns who stay with me tend to become fast friends with each other. I organize weekly house events, such as Sunday brunches or game nights or a night out at the movies. I pride myself on being a "house mom". I'll give you tips on where to go in the city, make you tea when you are home sick, or take you on an adventure.
space: You might see our home listed by Darren O. however this is actually my home (where I live) so I thought I would create my own listing as well.   You can book through him or through me...but either way you'll be living with me.    This private house is set up to provide students and interns visiting San Francisco with a safe and comfortable place to stay that has a built in community of international travelers.   Why come to San Francisco and stay in a place all by yourself?    If you're friendly and social and would like to live in a fun house with students from all over the world, check us out.    You should know that living in a community is very different than living alone or with a family.   We seek students that will be kind and respectful to other housemates and behave in a way that is not a burden to others in the house.   Yes, this means washing your own dishes and cleaning off the counters.    If you are a "dirty dish leaver" please, please look for another house.   Because th

name: Grant Plaza Hotel, Standard Double
summary: Rated the best hotel for your value, the Grant Plaza Hotel welcomes visitors from around the world who want an affordable way to experience San Francisco.  This standard has 1 double bed only. Roll away bed upon request, with fee. Your room charge will be paid prior to your arrival.  For all reservations made before 10/04/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , the remaining balance of taxes will be collected upon arrival. For all reservations made aft (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , all taxes will be included with your booking.
space: Grant Plaza Hotel has newly renovated rooms, continuing to improve the guest experience at the hotel. Guests can now enjoy the contemporary rooms with modern amenities. Each room has a private bathroom, desk, and multipurpose table. The clean colors of the room have a pop of color.   The value of great location is important for the Grant Plaza Hotel. You can go to local restaurants and theaters only minutes away from the property. It’s also located just a few blocks to Union Square and the San Francisco Financial District. No parking at the Hotel, special parking rate available at a nearby garage. Each room includes: Basic satelite TV Free WiFi access Free morning coffee No A/C

name: Nob Hill Jewel Box
summary: Extremely charming studio apartment in the ultimate location. 1/4 Block to the Fairmont Hotel, 1 Block to The Mark Hopkins, 3 Blocks to the Ritz Carlton, 5 Blocks to Union Square, 1 Block to China Town, 6 Blocks to North Beach (little Italy). Nestled near the top of SF's Nob Hill, the small Studio is like an episode right out of small spaces and it packs a big punch and bang for the price. Features queen Size bed, 50" Flat Screen TV, kitchen fully equipped and gorgeous bathroom.
space: I want to add that even though the square footage is small, it's virtually impossible to find accommodation in this neighborhood for this price. The Unit is in a boutique apartment building, has period Victorian moldings, is tastefully painted and decorated. Additionally the unit is extremely clean, with New Queen Size Bed, Mattress, Linens, and Pillows. Also sunny and bright. Great Shopping, Restaurants, Theater, and easy public transportation within steps. If your looking for the heart of San Francisco at a comfortable and affordable price this is it.

summary: Immaculate, spacious lower level private room with private entrance and adjacent parking.  Comfortable queen bed and attached spa like bath with tub/shower.  Studio like feel with 40" TV, microwave and refrigerator.  Use of backyard, washer & dryer.
space: This is a lovely, clean, lower level unit.  The space is warm and welcoming.  A nice queen bed with high end down duvet & comforter, down pillows, and a very comfortable mattress.  The space has it's own en suite full bathroom with shower/tub combo, towels and toiletries.  The space has a microwave oven, mini refrigerator, and dedicated heating unit for the room.  The room and bath are immaculately clean and crisp.  The room has lots of travel materials about the City. During your stay, there is free parking in the driveway. name: Crocker Garden Suite near Mission Street
summary: Beautiful private one-bedroom garden suite with complete privacy. Great for tourist andbusiness travelers. Wet bar with refrigerator, microwave, toaster and coffee maker. Includes full-size bed in the bedroom and a sofa bed in the living room. Ideally suited for 2 guests Living room overlooks southern facing sun garden  SmartTV with Netlix, HBO, Starz, Encore and Chromecast included. Bathroom with marble shower and porcelain floor  Desk workstation in bedroom with LCD, keyboard and mouse.
space: Spacious private garden suite with bathroom. Hardwood floors throughout and tile flooring in the bathroom. Private entrance with direct access to sunny back yard. You’ll be close to vibrant shops, restaurants and cafe’s. Alemany Farmers Marked (SF hidden gem) is nearby. The apartment provides a lot of privacy with a private entrance and its own bathroom. Free parking on the street and public transit are a breeze. You can be in downtown in 15 to with public transit or take 10 min drive. SF muni 43 bus stops across the street, subway is a 5 min bus ride away or 15 min walk.  The Airport is 15 min away and there is easy access to the north and southbound freeways (highways 101 and 280). You can also catch the subway to and from the airport with nearly door to door service since the bus stop that stops at the corner takes you to and from the subway.

name: Modern & Convenient Studio - Walk to BART & Muni
summary: Enjoy San Francisco from this modern and convenient studio! Private first floor studio; clean, comfortable, cozy. Walking distance to major bus lines, BART (subway), Muni (light-rail & bus), and a variety of restaurants. Minutes from the freeway and just a 20 minute drive to SFO. 87/100 Walkscore: "This location is Very Walkable so most errands can be accomplished on foot." SF STR permit #: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
space: Our studio has: queen-sized memory foam bed, a sofa with pull-out futon for one adult (or two children), and an optional queen-sized air mattress.  The space is plenty of room for 2-3 adults (queen bed + futon), suitable for 4 (queen bed + futon or queen air mattress), and great for the budget-conscious party of 5 (queen bed + futon + queen air mattress). We provide breakfast snacks, water bottles, and plenty of recommendations!

name: Simplistic Crocker Suite
summary: This cozy in-law suite is located in quiet Crocker Amazon neighborhood. It is southern edge of SF not close to the main tourist spots. My house is close to major bus lines.  15 mins cab ride to SFO and 15-20 mins more to downtown San Francisco. We recommend taking public transporation or uber/Lyft to get around the city from my place. Because parking can be difficult at night around my neighborhood. This suite is on the ground floor of my house. Access is through the garage.
space: Your own special getaway after a long day in the bustling city of San Francisco. This cozy and welcoming in law suite is yours for your vacation! A simple yet warm kitchenette for all your cooking needs, equipped with a microwave, kettle, french press and many other needed cooking pots, pans and utensils. A small dining area to complete our kitchen space.   This cozy suite is on the ground floor of my house. Access is through my garage. It has a queen sized bed and also a sofa bed in our living room, It can all accommodate 3 people. A nice sized bathroom with a bathtub for relaxing after a long day out adventuring. There is free WiFi, small TV with chrome cast which you may stream video/movies from your laptop, tablet or cellphone to the TV. Bedding and towels are included.  Complimentary tea and coffee are included. A view of our backyard right out of the living and bedroom. A very fresh and uplifting space to start of your day and make your vacation a memorable one.

name: Your Own Private 1-Bedroom/1-Bathroom in SF
summary: Welcome to San Francisco! This listing is for a beautiful, newly renovated bedroom with your own private bathroom.  We are located in the quaint Crocker-Amazon neighborhood of San Francisco with easy access to public transportation and the highway. Free street parking is available.
space: You will have a private bedroom and bathroom all to yourself. In the common area there is a kitchen, sink and refrigerator to cook if you don't want to eat out.  The bedroom is furnished with 2 full-sized beds and a desk. You will also be provided with a TETON Sports Universal Camp Cot and a TETON Camp Pad upon request.  The TETON Camp Cot measures 85x32x19 inches and can support up to 400 lbs.

name: Private room at San Francisco
summary: This spacious room fits up to 2 adults comfortably. We are located in a safe neighborhood only 30 min bus ride to the heart of downtown SF. There are plenty of yummy restaurants in the area.

space: **** PLEASE READ FAQ BELOW BEFORE SUBMITTING AN INQUIRY **** Q1.  Is my place available for MM/DD/YYYY date to MM/DD/YYYY date? A1.  Click on the desired check-in and check-out date on Airbnb.  If it allows you to select the dates and you can see the prices, it is available.  No need to inquire about availability via message.  Also keep in mind that anyone can book at anytime, so availability can change without notice. Q2: How much is this booking? A2: Click on your desired check-in and check-out dates.  Then select the number of guests.  Assuming the dates are available, you should be able to see how much the booking will cost you in 4 parts (room rate, cleaning fee, Airbnb service fee and Occupancy tax) and in total. Q3.  How is parking? (or is parking made available to me?) A3.  Parking for one midsized (up to 16ft) vehicle is provided. name: Cozy one bedroom home in San Francisco
summary: This is my personal home in San Francisco! It is very accessible by public transportation (bus lines, BART station), and I also have a parking space at the front for use. Within walking distances are several restaurants, bars, grocery stores, and a pharmacy. I only put my place on AirBnB when I am out of town so you will have the entire house to yourselves if you book. Please feel free to inquire about other dates that are not explicitly listed on the calendar though!
space: This is my personal home in San Francisco :) It is very accessible while still being a very quiet neighborhood. I have a wide selection of board games, books, kitchenware (gas range stove and electric oven), etc.

name: San Francisco 1 bedroom apartment
summary: San Francisco is an amazing city to visit! We are confident you will enjoy staying in this charming 1 bedroom private entrance apartment. The bedroom has a walk in closet, living room has a futon, full size dining table, full size kitchen, and 1 bathroom with shower/tub. Getting around in SF is easy, two Bart stations, AT&T Park, SF State University, Ocean Beach all 10 - 15 minutes drives. Cow Palace is a 5 minute drive. Great location to enjoy a trip to SF or work your way down the Peninsula.
space: No parties, no smoking (includes vaping and marijuana)  Check in after 3:00 PM Check out by 11:00 AM

name: CONTEMPORARY ONE BEDROOM IN NEWLY RENOVATED HOME
summary: Welcome to Crocker Amazon neighborhood of San Francisco, with convenient access to Freeways & 15 minutes away from SF Int'l Airport. Bus stop across the street gets you to Balboa Park BART station in 5 minutes. A 15 minute BART ride from there to downtown San Francisco. Street parking is available. This quiet, clean space is perfect for the business traveler. Walking distance: Crocker Amazon Park, local shops, banks, restaurants & neighborhood bars. The Dark Horse Inn is one of my favorites.
space: Contemporary, clean, recently renovated one bedroom with ample closet space and garden view.  A beautiful, exclusive-use bathroom is just outside bedroom.  Although cooking is not allowed, you may enjoy the modern kitchen for coffee, tea and toast.

name: SF| Cozy private studio. Fully equipped
summary: This is in outer mission area of san francisco. Perfect for freeway commuters. Bright spacious studio on the border of SF. Minutes from the freeway and perfectly located in the bay area with access to all major freeways without the city traffic, yet a short uber or bus to downtown.
space: This is an adorable high ceiling white bright studio in Outer Mission. The studio is a single unit in a building; this is not an in-law property. Facing Mission St. this place has everything nearby: bus stop downstairs and Balboa Park Station (Bart) some blocks away, coin-op laundry, Safeway super market, restaurants, etc. It is very accessible by freeway and close to most neighborhoods in SF. If you are driving in less than 10 minutes away you can get to the beach, downtown mission, and downtown San Francisco depending on traffic. Buses are 24/7. This studio has everything you would need: Queen size memory foam mattress, comfortable couch, 32" flat screen, Apple TV including my Netflix account, free high speed Wi-Fi, and lots of closet space. The bathroom includes one towel per guest, 1 hand towel, shampoo/conditioner, and hand soap.  Fully equipped large bright kitchen comes with fridge, gas stove, microwave, toaster, electric kettle and blender.

name: Spacious.Free Parking.Own Entrance
summary: My place is centrally located in San Francisco. Golden Gate Bridge, Fisherman's wharf and Pacific Coast are all around 5 miles radius. Free street parking is very easy here. The neighborhood is safe and upscale. It's walking distance to super market, restaurants and trail. It's also reachable by Uber and public transportation.  This large room has it's own shower and entrance. It's part of the house. No sharing space. We offer complementary bakery, fruit and snack.
space: The queen bed is comfy with soft head broad. If you need extra bed, a single mattress can be added to the side for addition $10 the first day, and $5 per day starting the 2nd day, payable upon checking in.

name: Quiet room w/ free parking in Diamond Heights
summary: Please read all descriptions.  Enjoy a cozy and comfortable stay during your trip to beautiful San Francisco in Marie's Diamond Heights home. This room sleeps 2 in a queen bed with memory foam mattress and shares a full bathroom with any other guests that may have booked the second room at the same time. Free parking is available on the street out front! $5/per person served hot breakfast is available if requested!
space: Your room is one of two smoke-free & pet-free bedrooms that I offer guests. It is right next to a full shared bathroom & on the opposite end of where Marie's bedroom and office are on the second floor of this single-family home in quiet Diamond Heights, a super-central neighborhood at the top of the hill above the Castro & Noe Valley districts. Please view a map before booking. Some reviews say I’m a bit far from the city, but what they mean is I’m not next to downtown. I’m above it :) My house is on a quiet, dead-end street but there is everything you'd ever need within few minutes drive in the nearby bustling, vibrant neighborhoods tourists flock to!  Marie has been a resident of San Francisco for 55 years & raised her two daughters here. The home is not fancy or 'trendy modern', and it has radiant heat (which heats through the flooring, not via vents!) but it's like staying with a relative & Marie thoroughly enjoys meeting her guests and serving them yummy breakfasts (if they so cho

name: 2 beds & breakfast with free parking
summary: Enjoy a cozy and comfortable stay during your trip to beautiful San Francisco in Grandma Marie's Diamond Heights home. This listing is for parties of 2, as it has 2 TWIN size beds. It has access to a full  bathroom which is SHARED with any guests staying in the second room (also party of up to 2) FREE parking available on the street out front AND a Full sit-down hot breakfast is provided if requested!
space: Your room is one of two smoke-free & pet-free bedrooms that I offer guests. It is right next to a full bathroom & on the opposite end of where Marie's bedroom and office are on the second floor of this single-family home in quiet Diamond Heights, a super-central neighborhood at the top of the hill above the Castro & Noe Valley districts. name: Float above San Francisco
summary: Perched at the top of Noe Valley and the Castro, our townhouse has gorgeous views and easy free street parking. Our comfortable furnished guest room includes a private bathroom. Close to two bus lines that transfer to Muni or BART.
space: Float over San Francisco from the comfort of your bedroom. The window occupies most of the wall, so your view extends 180 degrees. Meticulously clean room and house. Warm and hospitable home decor.

name: Stunning Canyon View 1 Bedroom w/ Garage Parking
summary: You'll love this stunning 1 bd  over Glen Canyon (amazing for morning walks). Views from the living room & bedroom will delight and the city twinkles outside your door. Kitchenette includes small fridge, toaster, microwave & kettle. Safeway (w/Starbucks) and Dim Sum restaurant a 5-minute walk. Garage parking. Easy access to 280 & 101, as well as Glen Park BART station.  Walk to Twin Peaks or Noe & Glen Park restaurants, but uphill home. •Remodeled  •850 sqft •Private entrance •Entire home
space: Stunning canyon views, garage parking, Diamond Heights Shopping Center w/ Safeway (and a Starbucks), Bakery, Post-Office, Walgreens, Dim Sum, & Cleaners a 5 minute walk, easy access to 101/280, Glen Park Bart, completely remodeled with separate keypad access entrance.

name: Best Views in all of San Francisco
summary: The perfect place to enjoy the views, views, views from the top of Noe Valley, the most central location within San Francisco. Enjoy the hardwood floors, recessed lights with dimmers, large empty closet for all your belongings, luxury bathroom. Free HD Cable with DVR and HBO. Free high speed wifi and local phone calls provided. Huge sunny patio with hammock, sun lounger and zen rock garden.
space: **THANK YOU AIRBNB FOR RANKING US THE #1 LISTING FOR OUR NEIGHBORHOOD IN ALL OF SAN FRANCISCO** Make this modern view 2 bedroom 1.5 bath apartment your private sanctuary during your trip to San Francisco. Located just across the street from City View Place, a well known Vista Point at the top of Noe Valley, it's a safe, modern and serene, 1200-square-foot  apartment equipped with top-notch amenities throughout. For larger groups, there is an additional ground floor in-law studio unit that can be booked separately or in conjunction with this two bedroom unit. The ground floor unit has private access to its own bedroom, full bath, kitchenette and garage parking for 1 vehicle (for studio bookings only). See separate Airbnb listing # 148769 in my profile for more details. -- 60" flat-screen HDTV with cable, DVR, HBO, DVD player in living room  --51" flat screen HDTVs with cable, HBO in both bedrooms --Nest Learning Thermostat -- central heating, concrete, glass and steel fireplace  -- hard

name: Amazing 60s Design w/Stunning Views
summary: This award-winning home from 1968 is located at the top of Noe Valley. There are stunning views of downtown SF, Bay, Oakland, Bay Bridge, Transamerica and beyond. It's quiet and located just a block from Safeway, Glen Canyon Park and transportation.
space: *********************************************** SAN FRANCISCO SHORT-TERM RESIDENTIAL RENTAL REGISTRATION NUMBER: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Possession of a San Francisco Short-Term Rental Registration Certificate certifies that the registration certificate holder has agreed to comply with the terms of the San Francisco Short-Term Residential Rental Ordinance (San Francisco Administrative Code Section 41A). This ordinance does not require an inspection of the unit by the City for potential Building, Housing, Fire, or other Code violations.  ************************************************* I've been a collector of mid-century furniture, art and design for years and my home reflects that. There's over (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) square feet, so there's lots of room. The living room and the kitchen area have 15 foot cathedral ceilings and clerestory windows. There are 270 degree panoramic views of downtown SF, Bay, Oakland, Bay Bridge, Transamerica, and beyond. There are three be

name: San Fran 3 bedroom/3 bathroom/den/free parking
summary: Extremely spacious San Francisco home in wonderful Glen Park. Five minute walk to BART then ten minutes to Downtown. Hi-speed WiFi and free two-car parking! Three bedrooms and three bathrooms, especially, a big plus. Large living and dining room.  Extra family room with  TV.   Short walk to cafes; variety of restaurants and a great food market.  Across the street from a wonderful park with hiking trails and a playground.  Near bus lines to Golden Gate Park. Families, groups and business ready.
space: Our comfortable, spacious home  is in the wonderful Glen Park neighborhood: three bedrooms and three bathrooms and family room. Guests are always surprised at how big it is when they enter! Two car-carport for your cars. New airport extreme for high speed wifi!  Both children and adult-friendly. This is our home--with art and books and personality! We also have a pull-out couch in the living room if you need extra sleeping space--  plus a den with a big screen T.V. New big screen T.V. in master bedroom. Both T.V.'s have Roku for watching movies. Two bathrooms (one with tub) have been newly remodeled. The other two bathrooms have showers. Complete fully-equipped kitchen with four burners, new oven, microwave, blender, coffee maker, toaster oven, large refrigerator, pots and pans, and enough plates, cups, silverware for everyone! Dining room table can seat eight.  Sleeps up to six(three couples) and also has the pull-out couch for one or two in the living room and two free parking spaces

name: Panoramic Views!   2BR, 2BA
summary: Stylish 2 BR 2 BA apartment. Spacious, light-filled, next to Douglass park, with panoramic views of  the city, East, and South bay. Centrally located, with access to any part of the city within minutes. 1300 sqft. One parking spot.
space: Stylish 2 BR 2 BA apartment. Spacious, light-filled, next to Douglass park, with panoramic views of  the city, East, and South bay. Centrally located, with access to any part of the city within minutes. Recently renovated with hardwood floors, abundant light, surrounded by trees and spectacular views. Two outdoor areas and 1 car parking.   1 King and 1 Queen bed.

name: Hidden Gem with San Francisco Charm
summary: Beautiful classic San Francisco home in a quiet setting just a block away from Glen Park Canyon. Located a short distance from Hwy 101 and the 280 freeway.  A 10-minute walk to Glen Park Bart, Muni, and Bus lines. The airport (SFO) is reachable in ~15 min by car and the Golden Gate Bridge is ~20 min away.  Napa/Sonoma wine country and Santa Cruz are within 60-75 minute drive. Available upon request: Baby Pac and Play High Chair Single sleeper Cot
space: Ideal location within blocks of Glen Park Bart Station, Muni and HWY 101/280 freeway access. Spacious entry, updated kitchen, bay windows, sunroom, 1 queen bed and 1 full bed upstairs, 1 sofa sleeper pull out couch in the sunroom and 1 queen murphy bed in the living room downstairs for potentially sleeping 6-8.  1 full bath upstairs and a 1/2 bath downstairs. Complete with the Nest thermostat, Alexa and Sonos Sound System, Wifi,  TV with Roku with Alexa voice capabilities.

name: Fab Mid-Century Master Suite
summary: Welcome to Eichler by Troy! My super bright and inviting retro home is located atop quiet yet centrally located Diamond Heights. My neighborhood was built in the 60s by renowned developer Joseph Eichler in the “California style” featuring homes (called "Eichlers") with clean open spaces, courtyards, and floor-to-ceiling windows to let the outside in – sure to appeal to lovers of mid-century architecture and design. Come hang out at Eichler by Troy while enjoying all San Francisco has to offer.
space: Registered Short-Term Residential Rental Certificate: STR-OOO1426 Eichler by Troy sports a distinct mid-century vibe via vintage furnishings, artwork, and charm. The large Master Suite sleeps two with a comfortable queen-size bed and includes a private bathroom with tub/shower, a large walk-in closet, and direct access to the plant-filled central courtyard and amazing back garden. Please note no TV is available within the Master Suite. Check out a nice article on Design*Sponge about my home. The title is "A Time Traveling Vintage Inspired San Francisco Home" if the following link is hidden: (URL HIDDEN)

name: Entire Home
summary: Centrally located in San Francisco. Spacious views, lots of light, plenty of parking, public transportation right outside the front door.
space: Open, sunny spaces with great views

name: City Retreat: Stunning Views from All 3 Floors
summary: Enjoy unobstructed panoramic views atop the highest inhabited hill in the city.  Diamond Heights borders Noe Valley/Glen Park, 5-minute walk to a large grocery store, pharmacy, post office, etc.  Ample easy free parking for multiple cars.  5 minute drive to Castro & Mission, 15 to SoMa, 20 to SFO.  Each of the 3 floors has views and a full bath.  Surrounded by green spaces/parks with running trails and playgrounds, this is a secluded, quiet, private place to call home while enjoying city-living.
space: 2300 square feet (214 square meters) - unusually large for SF so you can stretch out.  For business people, you'll find multiple desks, wi-fi, color wireless printer, and easy parking/easy access to your meetings downtown or on the Peninsula.   Parents will appreciate that we have the house set up for our own child, and excellent nearby playgrounds.  International travelers, note that we are globetrotters ourselves and have helped many first time visitors [from Finland, Israel, France (je parle le francais), etc.] get oriented.  Given this is our personal home, we only accept reservations requests from guests who have used airbnb before and who have gotten a favorable review from their other airbnb hosts.

name: Soaring Views of City - Tri-Level Townhome
summary: Beautiful tri-level townhome with spectacular city views. Good location. Easy access to arteries out of SF. Home offers deluxe kitchen, outdoor BBQ, three spacious bedrooms. Two queen on top level, one-full bath. Masterbed on the bottom level with spa-like master bath. Cable TV, rain shower, soaking tub. Middle-level has kitchen, living and dining rooms and half bath. East facing views from most rooms. See the sunrise. Look out over bay as far as Mt Diablo. Shopping mall nearby. Easy parking.

name: Private Studio with en suite, 10 min to downtown
summary: Stay in our beautifully designed downstairs bedroom, with private entrance and bathroom. It is in the most beautiful part of San Francisco -- Historic Glen Canyon Park, a 70-acre forest right in the city.  In the serene canyon, you'll forget that downtown is only 10 minutes away via the BART train.  Or if you prefer more of a neighborhood feel Glen Park village is a 5 minutes walk away. There's also plenty of parking, and we're an easy Uber/BART ride from the airport too!
space: Our house sits just under a cliff nestled between 2 parks.  Enjoy the parks, the city, Glen Park Village or just some downtime in our lovely home.  The bedroom is set up to be an office as well, so you'll have a great time relaxing or working in peace.  With the code to the house, you'll be able to come and go as you please with your private entrance separate from the main house.

name: Diamond Heights Gem
summary: Canyon view private room in the clouds.

name: Room in Sunny Condo - Diamond Hts.
summary: Private bedroom and bath in large condo in the Diamond Heights neighborhood of San Francisco.  Centrally located, great parking, public transportation outside front door.  Beautiful views in all directions.  Four week rentals or more only.
space: My neighborhood is almost in the middle of the city with easy access in all directions.

name: ATTN INTERNS AND STUDENTS:  URBAN RAINBOW CONDO
summary: Our San Frantastic rainbow of a home is the ultimate combination of modern, artistic interior design, and sweeping views.  It's an urbanite's mecca, replete with the sights, sounds, and local color of Lower Nob Hill in downtown San Francisco.
space: Our rainbow home is painted brightly in eight colors, giving it the ultimate San Francisco feel.  You will love coming home each day to our uniquely decorated home, and it is our goal to make sure you love it as much as we do.

name: HEART of San Francisco!
summary: Private room in a 2 bed 1 bath condo. On Market St (main street of SF) in Hayes Valley. 5 min walk to diners and bars, 15 min to downtown & 2 min to public transit to go anywhere in Bay Area! VERY LIMITED FREE STREET PARKING (available options listed in "Location -> The Neighborhood" section below.) On 5th floor with double-paned windows, and you can hear some street noise sometimes. Has a TV with Roku and Netflix for your entertainment!
space: I live in my 2 bed 1 bath condo with my dog. During your stay here, you will occupy the cozy guest bedroom which has necessary amenities to make your stay a comfortable.

name: 420 - Clean Hotel Room in PERFECT LOCATION
summary: This clean, private, budget hotel room with private full bath is PERFECTLY LOCATED. A short walk to the Famous Cable Cars, Nob Hill, Main Hub for Public Transit, Union Square, Fisherman's Wharf, Grace Cathedral, AT&T Park, Polk Street, and more! You’ll love the place because of the location, the people, and the value! This single room with one double bed & private full bath is good for everyone who wants to be in the heart of the action at a very reasonable price!
space: The space was recently painted and also has a brand new hardwood floor as of January 2017.

name: Classic Private Room in ❤️ of SF
summary: Our top floor downtown apartment provides the ultimate in convenience, walking distance to Union square, Market street, China town, BART and endless restaurants and bars. The bedroom is cozy and there is 1 shared bathroom.
space: Cozy room with great natural light and full size bed. The room is in a 3 bedroom/1 bath Lower Nob Hill apartment.

name: ~NEW~ Cozy bedroom in Central SF Apartment
summary: Enjoy a classic San Francisco vibe in my cozy downtown apartment with an outdoor patio! Excellent, modern apartment, located in one of the best areas of the city. Easy Access to Union Square, Financial District, Market Street, SF MOMA, Art Galleries, Shopping malls and restaurants.
space: I am offering the Cozy Suite in my fully remodeled apartment. The apartment is in a gated building with a beautiful garden located in the heart of San Francisco. Enjoy everything the city has to offer, all within footsteps of your front door. The space is completely furnished with fresh linens and toiletries included during your stay. I have cleaners coming to tidy up the common areas, so you can assure the place is well kept.

name: The Sutter Apartment Back
summary: Enjoy a modern and furnished 2 bedroom in-law style unit in the heart of San Francisco for your vacation or work visit. Located walking distance to Union Square, Financial District, China Town, Polk St and many great neighborhoods / restaurants to experience the vibe and feel for the local SF culture. Message me for a better rate :) and lets see what we can do.
space: ~~~~AMAZING CENTRAL LOCATION~~~~ Conveniently & Safely located in Lower Nob Hill, walking distance to Marina, Cow Hollow, Chinatown, Moscone Center, Union Square, Downtown and so much more...  @ Union Square (Cable Cars / Shopping) - 7 min walk @ Trader Joes  (Grocery Store) - 7 minute walk   @ Polk Street (Bars and Restaurants) - 8 min walk @ Downtown Financial District - 20 min walk @ SF Ferry Building (restaurants & view of the Bay Bridge) - 30 mins walk @ China Town - 15 min walk  @ Little Italy  - 25 mins walk @ Whole Foods (Grocery Store) - 20 min walk  @ Fishermans Wharf (Pier 39) - 40 min walk and many more lovely places close by.... ~~~APARTMENT FEATURES~~~~ @ Large wall to wall windows in each bedroom that get lots of sunlight @ Private Bathroom @ Brand new furnishings  @ Iphone/Android chargers provided for your convenience @ Complimentary snacks and drinks  @ Tea and Coffee setup  @ Always fresh & clean sheets / towels BEDROOM 1:  @ Furnished with a wooden QUEEN size bed, t

name: *Bright and Private Large Bedroom in Heart of SF!*
summary: Bright and tranquil apartment on the top floor of a gated building in the heart of San Francisco. Enjoy everything the city has to offer, all within footsteps of your front door.
space: Enjoy your own private bedroom in my 3br apartment. If you need 2 rooms please let me know and I can check if my 2nd bedroom is available. Located in a gated apartment with a beautiful garden in the heart of San Francisco. The space is completely furnished with fresh linens and toiletries included during your stay. I have cleaners coming to tidy up the common areas, so you can assure the place is well kept.

name: Cool Timeshare/Hotel (Union Sq.)
summary: The Donatello is a timeshare/hotel which is one of the top hotels in San Francisco.  Just show up and check in like any other hotel, no arranging to get keys necessary. - 1 KING BED and 1 QUEEN SLEEPER SOFA - Parking: $32 per night
space: DESCRIPTION With 400 square feet of space and 10 foot ceilings, these rooms are some of the largest in the San Francisco area. Rooms are elegant and provide many of the luxuries of home including wet-bar and sink, compact refrigerator and microwave, sofa sleeper, cd player and in-room safe. All rooms have one KING BED and one QUEEN SLEEPER SOFA and sleep maximum of 4 people. No rollaways are available. Services & Amenities: Spacious studio accommodations 24-hour front desk Concierge services Intimate Italian dining at Zingari Ristorante Indoor valet parking ($32 per night, unlimited in and out privileges) Meeting facilities Dry cleaning services (fee) Rooftop deck Fireplace Exercise facility (7AM - 1030PM) Hot tub Sauna Spa services (fee) ATM machine Internet kiosk in lobby (free) Complimentary wireless Internet access Resort Facts: Check-in time: 3:00 pm Check-out time: 12:00 pm Front desk hours: 24 hours per day Deposit: $50 per day (authorized hold upon Check-in, fully refundable) M

name: ** Bright, Private Bedroom in Central SF Apt! **
summary: Enjoy this roomy bedroom in my 3 bedroom, 1 bath apartment on the top floor of a gated building. There is public transit, coffee shops, restaurants and bars all within walking distance. You will have access to a cute patio in the back of the building if you wish to soak up some sun on a nice day. The space is completely furnished with fresh linens and toiletries included for you during your stay. We have cleaners coming to tidy up the common areas, so you can be sure the place is well kept.
space: I am offering this suite in my 3br apartment. If you need 2 rooms please let me know and I can check if my 2nd bedroom is available. Homey, facing the back of the building so street noise is limited.

name: Live Like a San Franciscan in Hayes Valley
summary: Sleep easy on a Black Label Beauty Rest mattress, waking up to the tropical back yard view below the balcony. This bright apartment is full of fun curios and accents, with everything from a globe and rotating compass to a turquoise glass collection.
space: Everything you want and more!  A new unit in San Francisco's hottest neighborhood, Hayes Valley.  Stay in a great place in a great location. STAY IN HAYES VALLEY...where all the cool people hang out. The place itself is on a quiet street (to help you get a good night's rest), but the bustling neighborhood is in the heart of the city.  Everything is just steps away. In one direction you have Civic Center, including the SF Symphony, SF Opera House, SF War Memorial, City Hall, the Asian Art Museum and the SF Main Library.  In the other direction you have the eclectic shops and fun restaurants of Hayes Valley! All of which are less than a five minute walk.  BART and MUNI (buses, underground trains & street cars) are all easily accessible and within walking distance, too. My 1-bedroom, 1-bath condo is one of 4 units, located on the first floor (above ground level storage units) of a small, quiet building with a secured entry and intercom. All units are owned and occupied by friendly, consid

name: The Sutter Apartment Front
summary: Enjoy a modern, furnished 2 bedroom in-law unit in the heart of San Francisco for your vacation or work visit. Located walking distance to Union Square, Financial District, China Town, Polk St and many great neighborhoods / restaurants to experience the vibe and feel for the local SF culture.  Looking for a better rate?-send me a personal message and let’s see what we can work out :)
space: ~~~~AMAZING CENTRAL LOCATION~~~~ Conveniently & Safely located in Lower Nob Hill, walking distance to Marina, Cow Hollow, Chinatown, Moscone Center, Union Square, Downtown and so much more...  @ Union Square (Cable Cars / Shopping) - 7 min walk @ Trader Joes (Grocery Store) - 7 minute walk  @ Polk Street (Bars and Restaurants) - 8 min walk @ Downtown Financial District - 20 min walk @ SF Ferry Building (restaurants & view of the Bay Bridge) - 30 mins walk @ China Town - 15 min walk  @ Little Italy - 25 mins walk @ Whole Foods (Grocery Store) - 20 min walk  @ Fishermans Wharf (Pier 39) - 40 min walk and many more lovely places close by.... ~~~APARTMENT FEATURES~~~~ @ Large wall to wall windows in each bedroom that get lots of sunlight @ Private Bathroom @ Brand new furnishings  @ Iphone/Android chargers provided for your convenience @ Complimentary snacks and drinks  @ Tea and Coffee setup  @ Always fresh & clean sheets / towels MASTER BEDROOM:  @ Furnished with a QUEEN size bed, topped

name: Private Room with shared bathroom in Hotel
summary: Hotel in Tenderloin about 4 blocks from Downtown/Union Square and Shopping Center. Public Transportation is at every block and Moscone Center is a 10 min walk. You’ll love my place because of Convenience and it's good for all travelers. Our hotel is centrally located to everything you could possibly think of however there is a church/shelter a block away which gets the sidewalk filled with homeless people. Since our location is close to downtown the streets may get a little noisy and dirty.
space: You get a private which sleeps 2 people. You get 1 double bed, fridge, tv and some other basic amenities. If you stay more then a day we do offer housekeeping during the morning. We don't have a parking lot but we work with a garage around the corner however they charge per day. Depending on the season it can be anywhere between $20 - 35 plus tax. This is the cheapest garage I was able to find that was close enough to the hotel. This hotel is 100% non-smoking so if you do smoke please do it outside.

name: Nobhill PRIVATE ROOM w/ private en-suite bath #1
summary: The newly remodeled bedroom is located in my totally remodeled 6 bedroom  6 bath unit It's just one block from the Top of Nob Hill where the Fairmont, Mark Hopkins, and Huntington hotels are located and a short stroll to Union Square, Chinatown and several other popular amenities. Each room has its own private en-suite bathroom and electronic lock for added privacy and convenience, Wi-Fi, fresh towels and linens, smart TV, desk, etc.
space: Washer and dryer are located in the room on your right first thing entering the unit. Extra toiletries, towels, and cleaning supplies can be found in one of the closets in the hallway.

name: Inn at the Opera Hotel Room**
summary: Hotel room for two people (200sf). Great location & value, highly rated on Trip Advisor & Yelp. Room includes kitchenette, and a free breakfast buffet in the downstairs restaurant is included. Valet parking is available at additional charge of about $38 per day. Base price is for Sun-Thurs. Bookings with arrival date beyond 60 days require 2 night minimum stay
space: Each room has a coffee maker,  free Wi-Fi, TV and DVD player, and iPod docking stations. Central air conditioning is not offered, but the rooms have ceiling fans. The front desk serves fresh cookies each afternoon around 3pm. A bowl of fresh apples is always out for the guests.

name: Studio at Donatello Hotel near Union Square
summary: Centrally located, highly rated timeshare hotel with many amenities. Check in at the front desk as any hotel, and enjoy the great service. Room has kitchenette, King bed and a sleeper sofa.  The on site parking garage costs an additional $38 per day if you use it.  Bookings with an arrival past 60 days must stay a minimum of 2 nights.
space: With 400 square feet of space and 10 foot ceilings, the Donatello rooms are some of the largest in the San Francisco area. Rooms are elegant and provide many of the luxuries of home including compact refrigerator and microwave, sofa sleeper, cd player and in-room safe. All rooms have one KING BED and one QUEEN SLEEPER SOFA and sleep maximum of 4 people.

name: BARTLETT QUEEN(5th Floor No Elevtor)
summary: Queen Bed Room in the The Bartlett.  Private Bathroom.  Shared Kitchen, Laundry and lounge with building.  Friendly 24 hour front desk.  No Daily Housekeeping. NO Bikes allowed on the premise.
space: We are like a European Hostel.  Not all rooms are shared but you Check in at the front desk, which is open 24 hours.  Check in time is 3pm and check out is 11am. Info Number: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)

name: Standard One Queen Bed
space: Hotel Whitcomb provides the city's most modern services, such as a Starbuck's Coffee, an internet café, Wi-Fi, and Meeting and Banquet Facilities - a unique mix of vintage hospitality and urban convenience. Located on Market Street, across from the Orpheum Theater, the hotel is a San Francisco sanctuary surrounded by trendy Soma and Hayes Valley restaurants, shops and attractions.  Hotel Whitcomb will Waive the required Urban Bundle Fee of $35 per night for this room.  When booking more than 9 rooms, it is considered a group. Different policies and additional supplements may apply.  No Pets Allowed. Refundable security deposit for incidentals – A minimum of $100 per night upon on check in (Max $500). All reservations require a valid credit card and ID at check in.  Non-smoking Hotel. Smoking in your room will result in a $500 cleaning fee. Valet Parking Available for $52 per standard car per night. Additional charges apply for Oversize Vehicles.

name: 2BR/1BA & Check-in Day Parking-Modern

Get $40 off by using this link (please use link before signing up for a new account, or else create a new account): www.airbnb.com/c/gchan403 Clean, cozy, quiet, modern and renovated are just a few of the adjectives used to describe my listing. Convenient to freeways, minutes away from SFO/downtown, walking distance to restaurants and bus that will travel all over SF.
space: --Book without fear of host cancellation!
