name: Home Away From Home
summary: NOVEMBER 2017: Kathy: “This spot was perfect. The neighborhood felt safe and boasts many lovely spots for a meal. The lodging was sparkling clean and exactly as described. Beds were comfortable, plenty of linens, bathroom boasted hairdryer, shower gel/shampoo/conditioner dispenser. Lots of tour guidebooks and reading materials on site. Wifi worked perfectly. Electric lock system meant not worrying about keys. There is a market within walking distance on Clement to stock up on necessities.”
space: JANUARY 2018: Fernanda & Family - We had a great time at Christine's place. This place is beautiful, comfortable, neat, clean, well kept, quiet, well equipped and the location is excellent. The neighborhood is quiet. It was a very comfortable place for my family. We always found a parking space nearby (within a block or two). It has markets, restaurants and shopping nearby. You can tell Christine makes an effort to make her guests feel at home, we found maps, city guides, books, restaurant menus, and all sorts of info that made our stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this place!! San Francisco Registration: STR-(ON-FILE) Accommodations: Charming 2 bedroom with private entrance in San Francisco's Richmond District.  We can  accommodate 6 guests (1 queen, 1 queen, 1 sofa bed - 2 small children or 1 adult).  Access to fully equipped Kitchen with stove, microwave, refrigerator and coffee maker.  Dining Table for 2, 4 or 6 people.  Full Bathroom with shower over tub. Laundry.  Cable TV and F

name: Quiet Harbor for your Journey in SF
summary: My place is located near Golden Gate Park, 5 minutes walk to de Young Museum and California Academy of Science. It closes to many bus lines that take your around the city. There're many restaurants and grocery stores steps away.
space: My place is located on the 3rd floor in a 4 floors 6 units building, no elevator. My unit is in the back of the building which is very quiet and an ideal place for resting after a busy day.

name: Private unit near Golden Gate Park
summary: New remodeled in-law near Golden Gate Park. This is a private unit has its own living room, bedroom and bathroom. There is a Safeway supermarket cross street opens 24 hours. Many Bus lines around, easy access to downtown, GG Park & Fisherman Wharf.

name: Private entrance bd/bath by GG Park
summary: Private entrance room with private bathroom, fridge and microwave. One block from USF, St. Mary’s Hospital, Golden Gate Park and #5 bus line which connects you to the whole city. High speed wi-fi and cable (HD flat screen TV). Great central location.
space: My home is ideally located for people visiting San Francisco:  One block from the University of San Francisco (backyard backs to USF soccer field), USF Law School, Koret Center, St. Mary’s Hospital and Golden Gate Park.  One block from Fulton St. with easy access to public transportation.  Walking distance to shopping and restaurants.  Perfect for people visiting students at USF or patients at St. Mary's Hospital.   Please note that this room is for one person only.  Accommodations:  For rent is a bedroom with its own private entrance from the street.  Available is a very comfortable day bed with standard size twin mattress (39" x 75").  Small private bathroom with shower.  Includes HD flat panel TV with Comcast XFinity basic cable, books, high-speed wireless internet (Comcast), hair dryer, mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Door from the room to the backyard.  You can see the tip of Golden Gate Bridge from the backyard.   I will supply linens, towels, pillows and blankets. I am

name: Golden Gate Park Retreat
summary: Two warm and cozy private rooms in our charming home located 2 blocks from Golden Gate Park. The space includes a bedroom, living and eating area (NOT a full kitchen), and bath and is easily accessible through a private entrance. You will love the easy access to SF!
space: Your private entrance leads to your own large living room, bedroom, and private bath.  An eating area includes a small refrigerator, microwave, kitchen table and coffee/tea pot (no stove/oven). Your living quarters is on the ground floor of our home, so you have exclusive use of your space without having to go through our living area. Please note that our family living space is directly above the suite and there can be a moderate amount of noise throughout the day, and especially in the morning and again in the evening. Also, we recently adopted a puppy.  She will become more quiet as she matures, but despite our diligent efforts to keep her presence silent, you are likely to hear her as she enters and exits the back of our house. If you need or want a space that is perfectly quiet at all times, you should consider other options. While there is only one queen size bed, it is possible to sleep one extra person/child in the living room area on a folddown sofa.

name: Fully Private Garden Studio w/bath
summary: A charming, quiet retreat for your stay in San Francisco.  Located in the Lone Mountain neighborhood, near Golden Gate Park, USF, the Inner Richmond, NOPA, and Haight-Ashbury
space: This lovely garden studio is a one-room suite with attached kitchenette and full bathroom.  This unit is fully private with direct access from the street.  The main residence is upstairs and sometime the owner is there and sometimes it is rented to other tenants. There is a separate apartment adjacent to the studio.   The room is 268 ft² (24.8 m²) and furnished with a queen sized bed that will comfortably sleep two. The unit is ideal for one or two people.  There is a TV with basic cable and Roku for streaming video.  The apartment opens up to a shared garden where you can sit out on a lovely day. The kitchenette is fully equipped and includes a coffee machine, kettle, 2-burner cooktop, microwave, toaster oven and mini-refrigerator.  It does not have a full sized oven.  There is a private, full bathroom with shower.  All water from the tap is filtered.  This studio is conveniently located two blocks from Golden Gate Park and USF, with a short walk to the Haight-Ashbury district and UCS

name: Exec 3 bedrooms 2 baths cleaning every other week
summary: San Francisco provides the location, restaurants, shopping, transportation, parks, recreation, sports, culture and entertainment. We provide the things you need for a fantastic stay in the City.  Enjoy a complimentary bottle of wine.  No need for a car, 5 bus lines within 5 minutes walk.  Our walking score is 97 out of 100!  Cleaning services every other week included.  Welcome to our World Class City and our City Suite.  Metropolitan, vibrant, busy, exciting, engaging, delicious, San Francisco!
space: PERFECT FOR FAMILIES OR FRIENDS STAYING TOGETHER. KID FRIENDLY. Fully furnished and fitted out with everything you need for a comfortable stay. Ensuite master bedroom with king bed has flat screen TV, separate tub and walk-in shower, walk-in closet and access to the outdoor living room. Bedroom 2 has a queen bed, flat screen TV and access to an outdoor terrace/fire escape. Bedroom 3 has two twin beds. The guest bath has a tub and shower. summary: Beautiful 2br/1ba with private entrance, kitchen, garden and patio. Centrally located 1 block away from dining, shopping and nightlife options on Geary St. corridor. 4 blocks to Golden Gate Park and Presidio.  Easy access to SF attractions via public/shared transportation. Neighborhood is very diverse and has many award winning restaurants at reasonable prices.  If you are interested in a date more than 3 mos or a single day, please contact us.
space: Private with separate entrance. Garden apartment with California succulents and lemon, pear and apple trees.  Strong/fast high speed fiber optic wi-fi, two flat screen TVs with DVD players and library of movies, books and maps. Fully stocked kitchen with dishes, pots and utensils. Towels and sheets are included. Walking distance of grocery, restaurants/bars/coffee places, drug store and clothing store. Additional reviews are at https://www.airbnb.com/users/show/266139.

Full laundry facility & nice kitchen.

Many wonderful restaurants and shops in the neighborhood. Location is close to transportation and both Golden Gate Park and The Presidio.
space: Two pretty bedrooms face a quiet street and the other faces the garden. Our home is just a block and a half from a National Park (The Presidio) and a short walk to Golden Gate Park and it's museums.Many shops and fantastic restaurants are within blocks.  One room has 2 twin beds, and there is a room with a queen bed if preferred . Both rooms can be booked together (at additional cost) which is ideal for families or couples traveling together. Host will be on site during your stay and can assist with questions. The Inner Richmond district is loaded with many wonderful restaurants, coffee shops and shops. name: Charming Garden View Studio
summary: Garden Studio is perfect for relaxing and exploring the nooks and crannies and hidden gems of San Francisco!
space: The studio apartment is located in a residential area so you will have plenty of peace and quiet. There are  several coffee shops, tons of restaurants, bars, and fun shops within 2-4 blocks walking distance.  The studio is on a street level of the  house, the owner lives upstairs. name: Garden Studio With Private Entrance Near GG Park
summary: There is plenty of space to unwind in this studio apartment, which has a private entrance, small kitchenette, new shower, lounge area and garden access. The studio is located on the ground floor of our home with a view of the garden. It is a block from Golden Gate Park in the Inner Richmond District. Walk to music festivals, museums, gardens, hiking trails, USF, Presidio, Haight/Ashbury. Easy commute by public transportation or by Uber/Lyft/taxi to downtown and Union Square.
space: Live where the locals live while being a tourist. Our studio apartment is the perfect place to relax after experiencing the city. It has a remodeled bathroom, a small kitchenette with microwave, sink and refrigerator; a sitting area with a view of our garden; a queen-size bed with new mattress; and a separate entrance for complete privacy.  Walk to Golden Gate Park, the Presidio, the Inner Richmond restaurants and shops, the Inner Sunset restaurants and shops, Haight Street and NOPA. Downtown, Union Square, the Castro and the Mission District are a short bus ride/Uber/Lyft drive away. Walk to Outside Lands and Hardly Strictly Bluegrass festivals, as well as to all the museums, gardens and trails in the park. Walk to music performances in the band shell, Lindy in the Park swing dancing every Sunday, Thursday night parties at the Academy of Sciences, or Friday night music and dancing at the DeYoung Museum. Numerous cafes, restaurants and shops are in the immediate neighborhood. Walk to A

name: The Garden oasis by Golden Gate Park
summary: Welcome to our garden oasis! If you’re looking to have a calm place to retreat to after a day of exploring our beautiful city, but still want to stay in the heart of the city itself, within walking distance of tons of attractions, this is your place!
space: As you walk down your private entry path to the front door, take a moment to stop and smell the flowers. Seriously, smell them - they smell amazing.  Now come on into our home, a 2 bedroom full-floor flat with an open living/dining/kitchen area.   If you want a comfortable and spacious fit, the flat can sleep 6 in the bedrooms. One bedroom has a comfy queen-sized bed. The other bedroom has a comfy queen-sized bed plus a "nook" with an additional queen sized bed (the nook is perfect for children, or for a group that doesn't mind sharing a space, but please note that the nook is not a private space within this bedroom).  If you want a cozier fit that utilizes the convertible beds in the living room, the flat can sleep a total of 9 (the sofa in the living room pulls out into a full-sized bed, and the futon in the living room folds down into a large twin-sized bed).

name: 311E Private Room in Super Convenient Area, Room E
summary: My place is located at one of the most convenient neighborhood in San Francisco. It is located on 4th Ave and Clement street in Richmond district, with all the shops, restaurants, supermarkets, banks, bars and clubs right down the street! It is also close to everywhere: - 4 mins drive / 4 blocks to Golden Gate Park; - 6 mins drive to Golden Gate Bridge; - 14 mins drive to Downtown SF; - 20 mins drive to Fisherman's Wharf. Bus lines are also within one blocks that can take you anywhere in SF.
space: This is a large shared house with 5 bedrooms, 2 shared bathrooms, and shared kitchen. Other rooms are occupied by other tenants. This room faces the backyard and is very quiet. name: Beautiful Private Garden Apt. Nr. Golden Gate Park
summary: We built this apartment with the thought that someday we would live in it ourselves. Thus, we chose to go "high end" with construction materials, appliances (Viking stovetop), fixtures and cookware. The apartment opens to our backyard garden, with a patio and bocce court. Two blocks from Golden Gate Park, we are close to main bus lines, museums, great restaurants, and beautiful hikes. I was recently honored by Airbnb for having consistently been a Superhost since the program began, years ago.
space: My husband designed this apartment, with uniqueness and quality in mind. With custom woodwork, fantastically comfortable bed, hotel sheets and towels, and a garden out the back door, this space is quiet, peaceful, and beautiful.

name: Cozy Giants Room @Golden Gate Park
summary: Beautiful, spacious, light-filled Edwardian house in quiet neighborhood with distinguished amenities, park-like setting view, and supreme location near the best of Golden Gate Park. FREE internet!!!FREE street parking*!!!FREE laundry!!! **We have a dog** *There is A 2hr limit parking particularly on our street from 8am-6pm Monday-Friday. The street East and West of us do not have any parking restrictions. Parking permits are available for $10/day if necessary.
space: NOTHING BEATS IT! Lovely Edwardian house (4 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms) in Inner Richmond neighborhood with distinguished amenities, park-like setting view and supreme location near the best of Golden Gate Park. Cozy Giants Room @Golden Gate Park (Go GIANTS!) is one of the bedrooms we have up for rent in our magnificent Edwardian house.

This sought after trendy neighborhood is surrounded by some of San Francisco’s top restaurants, shops and grocery stores just outside of your front door! name: 311B Private Room in Super Convenient Area, Room B
summary: My place is located at one of the most convenient neighborhood in San Francisco. It is located on 4th Ave and Clement street in Richmond district, with all the shops, restaurants, supermarkets, banks, bars and clubs right down the street! name: Garden oasis by Golden Gate Park
summary: Welcome to our garden oasis! If you’re looking for a calm family-friendly retreat after a day of exploring, but still want to stay in the city itself, within walking distance of tons of attractions, this is your place!
space: As you walk down your private entry path to the front door, take a moment to stop and smell the flowers. Seriously, smell them - they smell amazing.  Now come on into our home. There is an open living/dining/kitchen area, a large master bedroom, and a small bathroom.   The master bedroom has a large queen-size bed, as well as a "nook" with an additional queen-sized bed. The nook is perfect for children, or for a group that doesn't mind sharing a space (please note that the nook is not a private space within the master bedroom; the bedroom and nook are essentially one big room). In total you can sleep 4 people in this master bedroom, and this will give you a comfortable, shared fit in the flat.  If you have an even bigger group and don't mind a much cozier fit in the flat, then you can also use the sofabeds in the living room. The couch in the living room pulls out into a full-sized bed that sleeps 2, and the grey futon folds down into a large single-sized bed that sleeps 1 comfortably.

name: Private unit with 2 bedrooms near Golden Gate Park
summary: Private unit with 2 bedrooms and a full bathroom near Golden Gate Park. No kitchen & No living room, this is a divided unit from an apartment with individual entrance. One of the bedroom has patio with access to the backyard. Queen size beds for both bedrooms and good for 4 people. There is a Safeway supermarket cross street opens 24 hours. Many Bus lines around, easy access to downtown, Golden Gate Park & Fisherman Wharf.

name: Private, Newly-Renovated 1-Br Apt
summary: SUMMARY Charming, modern, newly-remodeled private apartment located on the lower level of our three-story, 100-year old Edwardian house. Cable TV, wifi, full kitchen. We are located in the safe, convenient, and family-friendly Inner Richmond neighborhood. We are registered as a legal short-term rental with the City of SF. Beware of illegal, unregistered homes! Airbnb Superhost for over 3 years, with over 160 reviews!
space: DETAILS We are offering a charming, modern, newly-remodeled private apartment located on the lower level of our three-story, 100-year old Edwardian house. We are located in the safe, convenient, family-friendly Inner Richmond neighborhood. This 550 sq ft apartment has beautiful natural light streaming in from the sliding glass doors facing the private back yard. The living room area has a newly-purchased comfortable couch, and a 46" flat-screen TV. TV is a smart TV, so you can log in to your Netflix account, YouTube, etc. TV also has cable, HBO, Showtime, and DVR recording capabilities. Kitchen area is an open-spaced, bright, fully-equipped kitchen with new appliances, including a dishwasher, microwave, and granite counter tops, a small dining area and table, and a desk / work space area.  (PLEASE NOTE: The gas range seen in the photos has been replaced with a modern "hot plate" stove, and a high-end convection oven) The separate bedroom includes a queen size bed with night tables and

summary: Your own private room and a shared bathroom down the hall. House is on a big hill with a great view. Plenty of 72-hour free parking in front. As part of the booking procedure, my house rules require you send me this sentence via the Airbnb message thread: "Kevin, I have read your listing and house rules carefully and I agree to follow what you wrote." If you don't, you forfeit your reservation and money.
space: This room can fit 6 people. Nobody else will stay in your room other than people in your group. The bunk beds sleep four, and two more can sleep on the floor on a full size mattress. There is a shared bath with a bathtub/shower down the hallway from this room. Please read my house rules before you book and the day before your arrival, as there are extra charges for not adhering to some of the rules. I strive for transparency here, and the rules are reasonable and for your benefit. If you incur an extra charge, such as for early or late arrival and/or scheduling, for laundry service or to store your luggage, I give you weeks to pay and never demand it at once. The rule list is rather complete because I have been a host for over ten years now, so I have seen nearly everything. I charge $20 extra for the following: asking me if you may, telling me you will or actually arriving early, or late before midnight. name: Charming Cole Valley Private Suite
summary: This lovely, self-contained suite will feel like your own private hideaway, with a beautiful terrace overlooking the city and surrounding greenery, and access to all the neighborhood cafes, restaurants and shopping you'll need to make your stay perfect.  Although it's on the 4th floor with many stairs to climb, the view and privacy will make the effort well worth it.
space: This lovely 1-bedroom suite in Cole Valley has a bathroom, small kitchenette and private deck overlooking the city and takes up the entire top floor of our classic Victorian house.  It is decorated with soothing earth-tone fabrics and charming seascape paintings, and will be a relaxing retreat whether you're in town for work or vacation.   I will mention that to get to this lovely apartment does involve lots of stairs to climb, some of them up a steep spiral staircase, since it's on the 4th floor and set above the street.  But the view and light are well worth the climb. (See notes on PARKING in last paragraph below) It has one extremely comfortable queen-sized bed and chaise with terrific views of the city, as well as a twin bed tucked away in a nook in the bedroom.  It has a living room with a twin-size daybed that has a pop-up twin trundle bed underneath, to comfortably sleep two people.  It also has a small kitchenette, a desk, free wifi and cable TV.  The large deck also has magni

name: Upscale Golden Gate Park Master Studio with Private Entrance
summary: Cozy up in the love seat by a TV with Roku 3, Hulu, and Netflix. This 3rd-floor master suite delivers an eclectic family atmosphere, plus a deck with verdant vistas. The walk-in shower offers rain-dance mode, together with a view of Mount Sutro.
space: My master is a convenient, kitchenless suite on the 3rd floor of my house! You can come and go as you please. It also offers its own separate, luxury bathroom. (Please note 3rd floor - not terrible, but definitely 2 (two) flight of stairs walk up) STREET PARKING in the neighborhood is usually good (see below), there is no parking space with the unit.  INDEPENDENT DECK overlooking yards/green spaces. WASHER/DRYER available for your use on same floor. UCSF only 4 blocks away.

name: Golden Gate Park Orange Studio UCSF
summary: This sweet spacious kitchenless studio is ready to spoil you with high ceilings, queen bed, luxurious shower & sitting room. It has independent entrance, fridge, microwave, coffee maker, toaster... 2 blocks to heart of Inner Sunset, 4 blks from UCSF.
space: The Orange Suite is a convenient, kitchenless studio on the 3rd floor of my house! It offers a comfy firm queen bed, a new bathroom and fixtures, refrigerator, toaster, microwave, espresso maker, as well as the sweetest sitting area in orange you ever will see – with couch, chairs, bean bag chair and tv. I love spending time under the cozy slanted ceilings! PARKING -  Street parking in the neighborhood is usually good, there is no parking space with the unit. (Also this is good to know for most neighborhoods in San Francisco: There is a 2 hour limit weekdays from 8a-6p. Effectively what this means is you have to move your car if the tire is marked between 10am and 4pm. Overnights and weekends there is no time limit.)

name: Inner Sunset Near Golden Gate Park & Transport m1
summary: Two bedroom apartment,  in the Inner Sunset.  Access to all San Francisco via the N-Judah streetcar & subway which is 1/2-block away.  Views all the way to the ocean and 1 1/2 block to Golden Gate Park.  A few blocks to 50+ restaurants, cafe's and shopping.   This is a very nice and family safe urban neighborhood. Unfortunately, there is no off-street parking. Self check in - come & go as you like.
space: One bedroom has a  double bed and sleeps 2 people. The other has a king bed.  From the windows you can see wonderful sunsets and a small bit of ocean as well as the trees of Golden Gate Park nearby.  There are many small shops, especially Chinese ones and a wonderful new board game cafe.  We are walking distance to the Japanese Tea Garden, the De Young Museum & the California Academy of Science Museum. Both downtown, UCSF hospital, and the ocean are short N-Judah rides (in opposite directions), and the Golden Gate Bridge is easily reached via the 28 bus.

name: *Prime Location - Golden Gate Park*  UCSF
summary: For a truly authentic and local San Franciscan experience, stay with us in one of the city's most popular neighborhoods- The Inner Sunset. Our remodeled 1912 Edwardian home is a perfect base to explore by foot the many local shops, restaurants, museums and of course the infamous Golden Gate Park. We are just a block from main Muni lines allowing for easy and fast connection to other parts of the city. Pls note: booking minimum is 2 nights, but I can consider 1 night if possible Just contact me.
space: YOUR ROOM Furnished with a plush queen mattress, memory foam pillows, and plenty of closet storage, your private room has direct access to a large balcony. You are welcome to enjoy the shared balcony area. Might we suggest sipping coffee or tea with the sunrise? The room is also ready with fresh linens and towels, a 40” flat screen, skylight with retractable cover, and floor heating. We’re certain you’ll find the space comfortable, quiet and perfect after a long day exploring.  BATHROOM This full and detached bathroom is directly next to your room. Please note this is a technically shared bathroom. Although it typically gets very little use, it does serve as my Guest/Occasional-Use-From-my-Son bathroom. * there is coin operated washer/dryer on the lower level for your convenience. name: Private suite with bath near UCSF and GGPark
summary: Designed for comfort and efficiency, this stylish one-of-a-kind private suite with its own bath, kitchenette and comfortable seating area sleeps two(plus child on couch).  Separate from the upper level main home, this lower level suite with its own entrance opens to a deck and un-groomed garden.  On a quiet street near Irving and 9th shopping and restaurants, UCSF Parnassus and Golden Gate Park. Transit within 2 blocks; grocery and coffee in 3. Featured on Apartment Therapy!
space: It's a compact 280sf professionally designed and built space that makes use of every inch to provide comfort and function while maintaining a bright and airy feel.  Luxurious for one, comfortable for two and cozy for adult(s) with child or tween.  Extra attention was given to soundproofing to enhance privacy for both host and guests.  Room darkening curtains, white noise from the G-home and ear-plugs help even the most restless sleepers. Your first morning's breakfast of granola, yogurt and O.J. is included as are coffee, tea and snacks. Out of respect for our non-drinking guests, we do not provide alcohol, but you are welcome to BYOB. The queen bed is fit with organic cotton sheets, comforter and blankets so guest can customize their sleep temperature.    Our 2019 new medium firm mattress is comprised of 2″ of soft organic latex over medium springs with organic wool batting and cotton in its cover panel. San Francisco apartments built in the early 1900's (ours in 1906) have architectural charm with curved corner ceiling arches and hard wood floors. The kitchen and bathroom are new as well as the windows throughout.
space: Located in the heart of San Francisco. A very popular local neighborhood with great restaurants. One of San Francisco's safest neighborhoods! Close to 9th & Irving, a great area with all the amenities needed. Just two blocks from Golden Gate Park with all the central attractions, including the Academy of Sciences, De Young Museum, Botanical Gardens, Japanese Tea Garden and more. Over forty restaurants, including the city's best sushi, Thai, and Indian, all within three blocks walking distance. MUNI (rail car and buses) only 1 block away with city car share rental sites close by as well. Beach is a short drive or train ride away. 2 full bedrooms, that share a wall with a dividing door. There is accessibility to a Pack N Play for infants and one bathroom with a standing shower (no tub). High-speed wi-fi and full cable TV: you can surf the net or watch your favorite shows. summary: Your private space in our home offers comfort & convenience with a calming view of the garden and GG Bridge in winter. According to prior guests, the view of Marin Headlands & a peek at the towers of Golden Gate Bridge (visible in the late fall through early spring) is a bonus too. name: Spacious 2 Bedroom Flat in Vibrant Inner Sunset
summary: Make this lovely garden apartment your home in San Francisco! It comfortably sleeps 4, has 2 full bedrooms and bathrooms and offers an eat-in kitchenette. Relax outside on the outdoor patio and enjoy the laid back vibe of the Inner Sunset District, one of San Francisco's largest and most up-and-coming neighborhood. Easy access by foot or Munirail to UCSF, Golden Gate Park and Ocean Beach. We're also in one of SF's easiest neighborhoods for parking!
space: A large 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom garden-level flat with private front and rear entrances on a quiet street with nearby parking that's walking distance to the best restaurants, cafes, bars and attractions in the Inner Sunset.  The kitchenette is equipped with a sink, microwave, toaster and mini-fridge. Relax and enjoy a glass of wine or dinner on the exclusive-use outdoor patio.

name: New! Charming & Cozy SF Hideout - Room D
summary: This brand new cozy bedroom (just built in Spring of 2017) is great for resting and recharging after a full day of exploring San Francisco. We are located in a quiet and peaceful residential neighborhood, The Inner Sunset, a welcomed retreat from the hustle of the city. Live like a true SF local! We are less than 5 minutes by car to Golden Gate Park (15 min by walk), 10 minutes to Ocean Beach, 10 minutes to Haight Ashbury or Castro, 20-25 minutes to Downtown/Union Square, and 20 minutes to SFO.
space: This is a small & cozy private bedroom with a shared bathroom. The bathroom entrance is right across from your bedroom and is shared with one other guest bedroom that sleeps 1-2 guests.  The entire floor is an in-law unit and shared space with a total of 3 other private guest bedrooms, and a shared kitchen.  2 of the bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms and will not be using yours. Each bedroom has its own separate keypad lock entry for security.  This bedroom is equipped with a comfortable twin-sized bed, small closet and shelf space, TV, wifi, and desk. There is no window in this bedroom. Though the room is small, it is cozy, efficient, and functional. It is perfect for solo travelers who may be on a budget but do not want to sacrifice comfort! It is ideal for people who plan to be out and about in the city.  The brand new kitchen is a shared common space, shared with the 3 other guest rooms. The kitchen does not have a stovetop for cooking, but you are welcome to use the microwave, toast

Up to seven people can fit in the other room that this room shares the bathroom with, but that is rare. It's much more common for there to be four people in the other room. I find that most guest groups don't wake up at the same time so bathroom conflicts are less common than you might think. name: Charming 1 bedroom in law Inner Sunset at UCSF
summary: Charming and quiet 1 bedroom unit on first floor of the house.  Full size living room, bedroom, bathroom. and kitchenette. Plenty of parking on the street. 10-15 minutes walk to UCSF campus and 15  minutes to Golden Gate Park. Beautiful hiking trail within 5 minutes from the house.
space: 10-15 minutes downhill walk to UCSF campus and 15 minutes to Golden Gate park. Please keep in mind  the heels are rather steep if you prefer to walk downhill (and then uphill) to reach all nearby locations, including public transportation, parks, restaurants and stores.  Alternatively, bus #36 stops 1 minute away from the house, it comes about every 30 minutes. Of course, Uber and/or your own car works great if available. Plenty of outside parking without hourly restrictions.

name: Privacy on 2 levels, 2100ft, 3bd/2.5b, UCSF, cozy
summary: Built in 1912, around 2500 sq ft, updated over the years yet it still has lots of charm and character with tall ceilings and a welcoming, comfortable feel. Located in a nice, quiet, residential neighborhood, walking distance to GG Park, UCSF, museums, gardens, fun activities for adults and children. The Inner Sunset is friendly, has small shops, great restaurants, wine and coffee bars, bakeries and it's centrally located near the N-Judah Street car which runs from downtown to Ocean Beach.
space: This is our 100 plus year old 4-bedroom San Francisco family home, where we raised our family, to which we invite and welcome guests to stay and make lovely memories of their own. Small groups of friends and families seem to really enjoy it, it offers a lot of mingling space. Our guests stay on the spacious second and third floors, we live on the garden level level and have private access. We offer our guests privacy, something we value when we travel. We love meeting guests whenever possible, we really do think of everyone who stays in our home as extended family. On the second level * formal living room (sofa can sleep one person but is not a sofa-bed) * formal dining room * well equipped kitchen  * family room with large flat screen TV, open to kitchen * deck with gas grill, nice views * powder room off the family room * stairs down to back yard and deck On the third level our guests have three bedrooms and two bathrooms, plus a bonus office/sun room and a roof deck * on the street

name: New! Charming & Cozy Master Bedroom - Room A
summary: This newly renovated cozy master bedroom  is great for resting and recharging after a full day of exploring San Francisco. We are located in a quiet and peaceful residential neighborhood, The Sunset, a welcomed retreat from the hustle of the city. Live like a true SF local! We are less than 5 minutes by car to Golden Gate Park, 10 minutes to Ocean Beach, 10 minutes to Haight Ashbury or Castro, 20 minutes to Downtown/Union Square, and 25 minutes to SFO airport.
space: This is a private bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom.  The entire floor is an in-law unit and shared space with a total of 3 other private guest bedrooms, and a shared kitchen. Each bedroom has its own separate keypad lock entry for security.  This cozy bedroom is equipped with a comfortable queen-sized bed, closet, TV, and wifi. There is no desk in this bedroom. It is perfect for solo travelers, couples, and traveling pairs. It is ideal for people who plan to be out and about in the city.  The brand new kitchen is a shared common space with the 3 other guest rooms. Please note that the kitchen does not have a stovetop for cooking, but you are welcome to use the microwave, toaster oven,  refrigerator, and all other appliances. We will also happily keep the kitchen stocked with coffee, tea, water, and some light breakfast items for you. There is a Safeway supermarket conveniently located 3.5 blocks away should you need anything else.

name: Brand New 3BR/2BA Inner Sunset Apartment, A+ Loc'n
summary: Brand new Inner Sunset apartment with fabulous amenities.  Great for families, friends, couples and business travelers.  This excellent, central location is steps to a long list of restaurants, cafes, pubs, shops and more.  A short walk to Golden Gate Park opens up another long list of attractions.  1-Block from the N-Judah transit, which becomes a subway that goes right down town.  NO SMOKING;  Three small children live upstairs;  We cannot have loud groups who are up late.  Six people MAX.
space: This newly constructed apartment has three well separated bedrooms, each with a queen bed.  There's a small patio and yard, and the location is truly excellent in terms of immediate urban amenities and transportation.  Please see the Neighborhood info about the 40+ restaurants that are a one-to-five  minute walk from the front door.

name: Private garden guest duplex
summary: Private garden duplex w/beautiful cozy bedroom upstairs and lounge down plus elegant en suite bathroom.  (Rental accommodates solo travelers only). Separate entrance and access to huge landscaped garden and patio. Safe, quiet neighborhood near GG Park, museums, transit lines and retail.
space: Private, quiet, cozy 2 story space with comfortable single bed (sleeps one). Has separate entrance and access to large walled garden.  Neighborhood has plentiful non-permit parking.

name: Charming Cole Valley Victorian
summary: Our home is a short walk to Golden Gate Park, UCSF, Cole Valley and Haight Street!  Our MUNI line (N-Judah) to Union Square and Downtown is only 2 blocks away and you can be from our door to downtown in about 10 minutes!
space: Our home is a perfect location for use as a relaxing home base for vacations in San Francisco or as a convenient workspace if you are here on business.   You will have access to free wifi, a flatscreen TV w/ Netflix and access to a fully equipped kitchen. All bed linens, blankets, and towels are provided.   We are here to help if you need it, and invisible if you prefer to relax without interruption. It is a quiet, comfortable home - perfect for a vacation holiday or getting some work done on the road. Our home is a less than 5 minute walk to UCSF Hospital, and only two blocks from the MUNI N-Train which takes you straight downtown to work (and to shopping in Union Square and the Embarcadero), and 1 block away from multiple bus lines. If you are working down in Silicon Valley, the Genentech, Tesla, etc. shuttles all pick up within a couple blocks, as do the shuttle buses to UCSF Mission Bay.

name: Lovely Private Suite Near UCSF- Monthly Only

space: *Please read all of this listing if you are serious about booking our suite. A lot of information is included to give you an accurate picture of the rental experience. BOOKING:  Please have a complete profile with photo and Verified I.D. before inquiring. Since we only book long-term guests who will stay a month or more, we would like to know something about you so please write more than a few lines on your bio. When sending an inquiry message, privately add as much detail about your trip and plans as possible. Inquiries without a complete profile and verifications will NOT be considered.  Here's a link to tell you more about Verified I.D: https://www.airbnb.com/help/article/450  After you send us an inquiry, we will then communicate via Airbnb messaging to determine whether or not our suite will fit your needs. name: Private Sunset Studio on the Hill
summary: Cozy, completely remodeled studio apartment in the heart of Golden Gate Heights (hill above the Inner Sunset). The studio is on the block between the Hidden Garden Steps and the highly-photographed Moraga Steps. Catch a beautiful sunset from the steps or continue to Grand View Park for panoramic views of SF, the Golden Gate Bridge, Marin Headlands, and Ocean Beach. Enjoy the privacy and comfort of the studio and patio, or walk down to the neighborhood restaurants, bars, cafes, and shops.
space: A newly remolded private studio with its own entrance and patio area. One queen bed and one sleeper sofa. Modern shower and bathroom. It's clean, comfortable, and has a ton of natural light.  You'll come in through the patio where you can sit and enjoy a drink on a beautiful day/night.  The studio comes with a small fridge, microwave, and coffee maker.  *** Please Note: The studio does not have a kitchen other than the appliances listed above. *** In the heart of Golden Gate Heights (the hill above the Inner Sunset), the studio is on the quaint block between the Hidden Garden Steps and the highly-photographed Moraga Steps, which were a neighborhood project inspired by the Santa Teresa Steps in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.  You can catch a beautiful sunset from any level on the steps. Or continue up to Grand View Park to catch a glimpse of one of the most amazing panoramic views of San Francisco, the Bay, Golden Gate Bridge, Marin Headlands, and Ocean Beach. It is furnished with platform bed, topped with a Nuvanna (high end mattress), 500 thread count sheets, and a down comforter. space: Yes, this is San Francisco. A magnificent park and lake with wooded, flat, walking and biking paths lead to fabled Stern Grove where free summer concerts take place on Sundays. Access the park by the garden gate or stroll down to the less steep entrance a few houses away. Free run for canines in marked areas in the park. Full view of the park from the office area, master bedroom, sun room or the dining table. Front porch seating overlooks a modest, suburban lawn on this very quiet street. Fireplace.  And, it’s a 20 minute drive to downtown, 15 minutes to the Castro, 15 minutes to the marvelous museums, aquarium, California Academy of Science, Japanese Tea Garden and Arboretum in Golden Gate Park, or 20 minutes to Lands End, The Presido, the battlements from World War II, and the Golden Gate Bridge. summary: Large room sleeps up to 3 adults. Super comfy sofa bed plus a King Koil Queen size air bed.  Includes access to full kitchen and Washer Dryer.  Located near Sloat and 19th ave. with easy direct transport to downtown and any other area of SF.  Street parking is easy here.

name: cozy private bedroom and bathroom
summary: Enjoy the fully remodeled high-end private bedroom and separate private bathroom. Plus, you have access to a sitting area, and a spacious kitchen with a small fridge. If desired, I can offer a second bedroom with an air-mattress for a surcharge. The house is in the private gated community close to I-280 freeway.

name: Breakfast with a View Marina room Free Parking
summary: One block from Palace of Fine Arts; walk to Marina, Golden Gate Bridge, Disney Studios, Chrissy Field, the Presidio, shopping on Chestnut St. Public  transportation to everywhere outside our front door. Free parking on premises. Hosts are extroverted, cosmopolitan, great cooks and exuberant hosts. Serve continental breakfast every morning and wine cheese upon arrival.
space: The hosts' experience and sophistication and welcoming openness make this location memorable for a San Francisco visit -- we know the town, the people, the culture, the special little restaurants, the parks, the walks...and we are eager to share the highlights of this place we love. Whenever possible, with prior notice, we try to accommodate special needs  ( diets, mobility restrictions, allergies, etc)

name: Queen Bdrm w/ Pvt Bath, near Marina,walk everywher
summary: Pink Castle looking 1905 Edwardian residence full of natural light. Perfect location between Union St. and Chestnut St. and relatively short walking distance  :  the beach, Golden Gate Bridge, Ghiradelli Sq. and Fishermans Wharf , Presidio and more. Public transport a block away.  This can be a lively neighborhood on weekends with a short burst of noise around 2 AM. This home is great for solo and business travelers, and vacationing couples and those relocating.
space: Large room with skylights and big round window for lots of natural light . Queen bed , couch and small writing desk side tables.  Views. Private bathroom a few steps away.

name: Beautiful, spacious Marina flat
summary: This bright, spacious Marina flat (built in 1924) overlooks a park in the front and a sunny garden in the back. The building has been has been in our family for more than 50 years! We love sharing our home and vibrant neighborhood with visitors. Guests of all race, religion, ethnicity and gender orientation are welcome.
space: The flat has 3 bedrooms, 1 full bath, office, spacious kitchen and dining room, Pilates studio (your host's work space - please read more about this below) and small garage. There are beautiful hardwood floors, original tiles and molding throughout. Two of the bedrooms look out on a large garden with many beautiful trees and flowers, including lemon, magnolia, apple, camellia and roses.  BEDROOM 1: The spacious, sunny master bedroom overlooks the garden. It has a California king-size bed with a high-end McRoskey mattress and also has a small half-bath (sink but no toilet). There is a walk-in closet, plenty of shelf space and a cosy reading chair..  BEDROOM 2: The second back bedroom has a comfy queen-size bed, a large desk and a cozy armchair. It overlooks the garden and is very sunny. There is also a spacious closet for storing your clothes. BEDROOM 3: The third bedroom has a queen-size bed, a large armchair, small desk and a closet for storing clothes. Guests have full use of the lar

name: Marina District One Bedroom
summary: Great place for young carefree travelers. Arguably the best neighborhood in SF. Located within 2 miles of the Golden Gate Bridge, 4 blocks to the Bay and Marina, on the corner of the famous Chestnut Street which has many bars, restaurants and shopping. Easy access to best locations city wide.
space: One bedroom in a 3 bedroom flat. Location is spectacular. Lovely room with lots of amenities available. One and a half bathrooms, two toilets, one shower... Super friendly Boston Terrier lives on site. This is an ideal offering for someone looking for a comfortable room in an awesome location as a base for exploring the City. It is less ideal for those who want to lounge around the apartment, work from "home" and/or do a lot of cooking.

name: Master Suite Golden Gate Bridge views Private Deck
summary: Edwardian residence with lots of natural light that is close to almost everything and everything is within walking distance. Located between the Marina and Pacific Heights in the neighborhood of Cow Hollow, this home has a Walking Score of 99. Enjoy a private king bedroom with  en suite bath. This home is great for solo travelers, business travelers, and vacationing couples.
space: Enjoy your private bedroom with a king-size bed and private en suite bath. The bathroom features marble floors, double sinks, a walk-in marble shower.  Off the bedroom there is  a private deck with views of the Golden Gate bridge, Palace of Fine Arts, Transamerica building, Salesforce tower, Russian Hill and Alcatraz.  32 inch TV with cable, a desk, and french doors.  Large skylights provide plenty of sun and fresh air.

name: Great apt in the Marina! Full Kitchen & Parking!
summary: My place is a small family run Motel in the Marina district, close to Cow Hollow and Pacific Heights. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the kitchen, the coziness and the free parking. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and furry friends (pets). Housekeeping is also provided daily!! Parking with a private garage is included as well. Please specify  if you have any pets (dogs only/extra $)
space: Contemporary amenities include free Wi-Fi, cable television with premium channels, full kitchen with refrigerator,gas stove/oven,and all kitchen utensils and flatware/cutlery with complimentary coffee, tea and hot chocolate. Guests also receive free garage parking during their visit.  We also offer accommodations for guests traveling with their dog.

name: SF Garden Studio "A" w/ensuite bathroom
summary: Located in the Marina down the street from the Palace of Fine Arts; private entrance (A) on ground floor.  Small room with fridge and microwave; single bed; En Suite bathroom w/shower.  The room is entered through french doors from the garden.
space: The space is quite small.  Only suitable for one person.   It's very quiet and noise must be kept to a minimum.  A fridge and microwave is provided as well as closet space and a gate-leg table with folding chair.

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.**Please Instant book.

name: Own Floor of Grand Marina Waterfront Home
summary: Private 1-bedroom in-law suite on the ground level of a grand 3-story home. Spectacular location within view of GG Bridge. Featuring its own entrance,  front garden, back patio, working fireplace and parking. Tons of amenities. While connected by a staircase to the home's upper floors, no living areas are shared, allowing for your privacy. Paradise for walkers, runners or bikers. Walking distance to the city's most major attractions in addition to restaurants, a grocery store and shops.
space: Our well-appointed guest suite is similar in size to a luxury hotel suite, but the amenities make it feel like home. Features include a dedicated living room with home theater and surround sound, a working fireplace, a queen bedroom with en suite bath, a walk-in closet, and a kitchenette with a sink, refrigerator, microwave, toaster, coffee & tea makers and a washer/dryer. Direct access to the front garden and the back patio furnished with comfy lounge sofas and a fire pit. The home is located just off Marina Boulevard, but the bedroom is on the back side of the house where the only sound you'll hear is that of birds chirping in the morning. Our primary living space is one or two floors up, and unless we make plans to meet you, our paths do not cross. You may hear us upstairs at meal times, but as empty-nesters ourselves, our home is generally peaceful. We travel a lot and understand what you need to feel comfortable and keep up the routines of home: We provide video streaming services

name: Nice Bedroom near Presidio/Fort Mason/Marina area
summary: Edwardian home full  of natural light , close to almost everything. Located between the Marina and Pacific Heights, in the nice and flat neighborhood of Cow Hollow. There are hardwood floors throughout the flat. The room is street side on the main floor  and shares a split bathroom - one room for toilet and one room for shower, with possibly another guest.  This room is great for solo or business travelers. Great wifi. Great walking location
space: This is a spacious condominium with tall 9.5' ceilings  Bedroom features a king size bed, large wardrobe and tall dresser. This room receives plenty of light and fresh air from the traditional bay windows that look south west toward Pacific Heights. Split bathroom shared.

name: Newly renovated Marina Private Suite with Bathroom
summary: Large 650 sq ft entire garden guest studio is all yours. It was just been renovated. Separate entrance leads to bed/bath room & living/work area. Major transport 2 blocks away. Walk to Fisherman's Wharf, Ft. Mason, Waterfront & restaurants/shops on Union, Chestnut and Polk streets. Golden Gate Bridge nearby
space: Well-maintained quiet and large guest suite is exclusively for your use.  Comfortable, private and light, the suite has direct access to a beautifully landscaped big backyard where hummingbirds and the famous San Francisco green parrots often visit.  Help yourself to a beverage from the refrigerator, cozy up in your comfy bed, enjoy a hot shower or just relax with a book or watch tv in your living area. It's your private refuge from the crazy energy of the city!  A small fridge, microwave, espresso/coffee maker and tea kettle are at your disposal in the living area of the suite.  Cable TV and wireless internet are also included.

name: Marina Designer Showplace  "ELEGANT  BEDROOM"
summary: Mediterranean, quiet elegant bright 1 bedroom & Bath, in a spacious three bedroom condo.  Unique location in the Marina District situated one block from The Palace of Fine Arts, Yacht Club, Beach. Walking distance to Golden Gate Bridge, Presidio Park, Fort Mason, Ghirardelli square, Chestnut and Union streets. Close to Museums, Trails, Hiking.
space: A beautiful Mediterranean bright 3 bedroom, 2 bath apartment in charming, quaint Marina. Located one block from the Palace of Fine Arts, St Francis Yacht Club, Crissy Field Beach (famous for windsurfing).  Beautiful trails and walking distance to the Golden Gate Bridge, Fort Point, Presidio Park, Fort Mason, Ghirardelli Square. This is one of the nicest, best neighborhood in the city.  It has a view of the Palace's dome, the beautiful Mediterranean homes and an East view of San Francisco's skyline and tall trees.  There is a shared garden & roof deck with fabulous 360 degree views of the city, the bay and the Golden Gate Bridge. There is a deck in the rear of the apartment overlooking tall pine trees and East City views. The apartment is on the second floor and has an elevator that opens into the home.  The modern, elegant, secure apartment is welcoming, cozy, artistically decorated and fully furnished. It has wood burning fireplace (not for use), hardwood floors, art throughout and ce

name: Romantic Marina Garden Studio
summary: Street parking only, please follow all signs. Enjoy a wonderful respite at our romantic studio with your own private garden and full kitchen. Walk to everything, just two blocks from the water, shops and restaurants await in literally every direction from our home. Easy 24 hour self-check in.
space: This modern ground floor garden view studio apartment with full kitchen is located in one of the most desirable and convenient areas to stay in San Francisco-- the Marina, we are located just one block between famous restaurants Zushi Puzzle and Boboquivari's Steak and Crab, and within walking distance of the legendary Cable Car route, Fisherman's Wharf, Golden Gate Bridge, Chinatown and our City's famous "Crookedest Street". It has central heat and comes with plenty of cotton linens and towels, a walk-in closet with computer desk area, flat-screen television, HD Cable, Starz Movies, high speed wireless Internet, free local and US phone calls. Make this Marina Studio your private pied-a-terre during your trip to San Francisco. It's a bright, quiet and comfortable 400-square-foot apartment with its own private entrance and sunny garden, and equipped with all the amenities you will need throughout your stay: --Private entrance --Flat-screen TV with HD cable, Starz Movies, DVD, telephone,

name: Mission Sunshine, with Private Bath
summary: Welcome to "The Mission," the sunniest neighborhood in town. Enjoy world-class dining, shopping, and nightlife on Valencia, or a Tartine picnic in Dolores Park, all just steps from our 100 year old home.  We've been Hosts since Airbnb's 1st year (2009), and can suggest restaurants or insider sight-seeing ideas. We love our home, our hometown, and our neighborhood, and we look forward to sharing them with you. PLEASE click below to read more about this private room and bath in a shared home.
space: Your sunny room looks out over a lush garden, and includes all the comforts of home... Queen bed, sofa, dresser, closet, and a rocking chair.  Just up the hall, your private bathroom has a "like rain" shower head over a clawfoot tub. (The bathroom is not "en-suite.") For a third guest (or for two guests who want separate beds) there is a full second bedroom available. ($60/night, and only available if you book Mission Sunshine.)

name: Valencia Corridor Center Of It All!
summary: We have a 3 bedroom two bath flat with 2 rooms listed on Airbnb.  We offer unique décor (much of it we made ourselves) and all the amenities you might need if you forgot anything.
space: We look forward to sharing one of the most vibrant neighborhoods in the city with you, the Mission!   PLEASE NOTE: We provide parking but we ask $20 per day, not included in your booking price. It is payable in cash when you arrive.  There is only one spot and we have two rooms so please inquire about availability.   We live in a 3 bedroom 2 bath flat and list two rooms on Airbnb.  The two guests rooms share one bathroom.  You will either share the bathroom with one other guest or have it to yourself if the other room is not booked. Our place is easily accessible from all Bay Area airports (we are 3 blocks from the 24th St Mission BART station). We are near the Valencia Street corridor (one block) and we are a short walk to foodie heaven (Delfina, Bi-RIte, Arizmendi, Dosa, etc) as well as Dolores Park.
