Extra sofabed or bed can be setting up upon request for $20.00 (one time charge), baby bring your own crib,it is no charge.  You welcome to bring your own sleeping bag with no charge

name: private room with private bath
summary: Private room in the San Francisco Sunset District.  1 block from major transportation.  15 minutes to Downtown.  Quiet and Safe.  The room has its own private bathroom.  Easy access to all major subway lines. Has private bathroom in the room.
space: The Space Hello - We have an "inlaw" type studio ready for your San Francisco adventure! For those of you not familiar with the term inlaw, it is its own living space on the first level of the house - you won't see us much, as we live upstairs (ma, pa, kid, cat). Upon entering the front door, there is an entry way with two doors - one leads up to our house and one leads to this room... so we rarely see the person downstairs as the spaces are clearly defined. Newly remodeled as of July 2013! We just redid this space, including upgraded lighting, new floors, freshly painted, and additional sound insulation so it is like a brand new room. It's really nice! The room has been set up to include everything you'll need for your stay minus your suitcase. Two twin beds, table and chairs, all plates/cups, silverware, towels, and more. You have your own private bathroom downstairs also.  The whole house is on wireless. The room itself is good sized - 12 x 15, plus a small hallway and closet. There

name: Relaxing  Modern Apt near Ocean+SFO + Free parking
summary: My husband and I welcome you to our house 2 mins walk to Ocean.  This one Bedroom apartment is on the second floor of our house with it's own private keypad entrance.  We do airbnb for 1st floor in-Law unit as well (without Kitchen). WHAT TO EXPECT: - Clean and comfortable Private Apt - Comfy queen bed, 100 % Pima cotton sheets and memory foam pillows - THIS HOUSE IS NOT IN DOWNTOWN but in suburbs nears Ocean Beach - Wavona & 47th   - Tram  "L line" behind the house  - Free Street Parking
space: -Nearest Intersection - Wawona & 47th - Modern, private and quiet Bedroom - Across the street from Ocean, less than 2 mins walk to beach - Lots of trails, parks and lake within 5 mins driving distance.  - If you are a runner, surfer or enjoy sunset then this place is for you - Fridge, microwave, tea kettle - Very comfortable bed after a long day - Hairdryer, towels, shampoo and soap provided to make your travel light - Ultra fast internet, 250 Mbps internet - Across the street from Zoo and yes sometimes you hear animals if you carefully listen

name: Spacious SF Getaway Near The Ocean
summary: It feels like home away from home.  If I were travelling, I would be looking for a place with these amenities.  Three blocks from the ocean and yet public transportation is 1 minute away to take you to downtown (25min) transfer to cable car etc.
space: In such a compact city as San Francisco, space is a luxury, and in this spacious private studio apartment, you get a comfortable and peaceful stay with access to a private kitchen and bathroom! It is located on the main floor level.  A queen sized bed is provided as well as a sofa bed for 2 extra guests.  It can fit up to four people comfortably.  It comes with wireless internet service and a color flat screen T.V. and  a DVD. A centralized location, you are a  block away from the L Taraval MUNI  bus that would take you directly to Downtown San Francisco, where you can visit Union Square among Macy's, Bloomingdales, Nieman Marcus, the Orpheum Theatre with quaint restaurants.  It is 2.5 miles from S.F. State University. Three blocks away from the beach, you can enjoy a hike with a nice view of the ocean, go surfing, or take a quiet stroll along the coast. Driving is 7 minutes to the famous Cliff House and Beach Chalet where you can dine while you watch the beautiful sunset.  It is just

name: West Portal Garden Unit
summary: Beautiful, peaceful garden apartment  (750 sqf) with a large deck, flower garden, fully stocked kitchen, full sized bath, bedroom.    Everything is brand new.   Cable TV (HBO/Showtime Netflix), Wi-fi internet, washer/dryer incl. Ample street parking. San Francisco Registration No STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  The location is West Portal, which is a small neighborhood near the Sunset (so small that Airbnb does not have the neighborhood listed.)
space: This apartment is brand new with all brand new furniture, appliances and furnishings and is the only unit on the first floor.  The unit has a private entrance, and a unique tri-folding glass door that opens to a private deck and garden with flowers, vegetables and a fire pit.  BBQ with the fixings provided to grill up your special and dine al fresco on the patio.   The eat-in kitchen seats four and includes a gas stove/oven, refrigerator, toaster oven, microwave, coffee maker, dishes, utensils, pots/pans, and basic staples (sugar, flour, spices).  Everyone gets a check-in goodie basket in addition. Internet/TV:  Free wireless internet.  Catch up on your favorite HBO/Showtime programs or watch a movie on Netflix or other Roku streaming stations. Bathroom.  Large bathroom with bath includes towels, hair dryer, iron, ironing board, first aid kit, emergency sewing kit, toilet paper, toiletries (shampoo, conditioner, soap, creams). Please note:  Unit is in West Portal, but Airbnb system lis

name: Spacious 3bd/2bath Home - Near all transportation
summary: Beautiful San Francisco home centrally located to Golden Gate Park, Golden Gate Bridge, Ocean Beach, SF Zoo and many resturants.  Public transportation (Muni) is less then 1 block away. Some of the best truly San Francisco resturants are within 5min of driving.   This home offers a nice open layout for families and friends to spend time after a nice day of sightseeing in the city. A parking spot for 1 mid-size car is provided.  Street parking is available nearby with NO permit required.
space: The home comes with a well-equipped kitchen, most typical kitchen accessories are available.  Towels and basic bathroom amenties (soap, shampoo, body wash, etc..) are provided.  The main TV in the living room comes with HBO, STARZ, CINEMAX and many movies on-demand.

name: Cozy room in Parkside house
summary: A large cozy room inside residential house in Sunset. Public transportations one block away. Safe neighborhood. Walking distance to Golden Gate park, Japanese tea garden. Only 20 minutes muni ride to Golden Gate Bridge and 5 miles to Fishman's wharf.
space: The room is at back of the house. It is quiet at night.

name: Rockin' Room in the Sunset
summary: Welcome to “The Fillmore Room”, a cool suite where you can bask in the sweet smell of nostalgia and rock and roll. Not just the same old boring routine here - if you're coming to SF for all that's fun and funky, this is the perfect place to start!
space: Amenities include a spacious bedroom with white leather bed and sitting area, retro bar with vintage ColdSpot fridge/freezer and microwave, and private en suite full bath.  The décor is pure San Francisco music history, featuring sweet posters from decades of shows at the West Coast’s best musical venue… The Fillmore!  When you arrive we'll welcome you with bottle service (dealer's choice), because that's how we roll. Your host is a San Francisco native who is happy to give local tips if you're interested.  And we are permitted by the City of San Francisco to have this AirBNB listing: Registration Number is STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: New! Charming & Bright Suite - Room B
summary: This brand new bedroom with ensuite private bathroom (just built in Spring of 2017) is great for resting and recharging after a full day of exploring San Francisco. We are located in a quiet and peaceful residential neighborhood, The Sunset, a welcomed retreat from the hustle of the city. Live like a true SF local! We are less than 5 minutes by car to Golden Gate Park, 10 minutes to Ocean Beach, 10 minutes to Haight Ashbury or Castro, 20 minutes to Downtown/Union Square, and 25 minutes to SFO.
space: This is a private bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom.  The entire floor is an in-law unit and shared space with a total of 3 other private guest bedrooms, and a shared kitchen. Each bedroom has its own separate keypad lock entry for security.  This bedroom is equipped with a comfortable queen-sized bed, closet, TV, and wifi. There is no desk in this room. This room is cozy but very functional. It is perfect for solo travelers, couples, or traveling pairs who may be on a budget but do not want to sacrifice comfort! It is ideal for people who plan to be out and about in the city.  The brand new kitchen is a shared common space, shared with the 3 other guest rooms. Please note that the kitchen does not have a stovetop for cooking, but you are welcome to use the microwave, toaster oven,  refrigerator, and all other appliances. We will also happily keep the kitchen stocked with coffee, tea, water, and some light breakfast items for you. There is a CVS store conveniently located 1.5 blo

name: Modern, Luxury 2BR/2BA
summary: A cheery, cozy, oceanview retreat near restaurants, shopping, and public transport ready to be your home away from home in San Francisco. Many consider our place to be a great refuge since we are a little further away from downtown. Newly renovated space that sleeps 2-4 (1 full-sized bed in BR #1. 2 sofa beds in BR #2/daytime living room with TV and Netflix). In a residential neighborhood in the southwestern part of the city known as the Parkside/Sunset area, our place is steps away from public transportation that gets you downtown in 25-30 minutes. See Other Things to Note before booking.  By car we are 15-20 minutes from SFO Airport & downtown.
space: Enjoy this new, modern apartment just steps away to public transport, restaurants, and shops. We are near the Zoo, Ocean Beach, free concerts in Stern Grove in the summer, produce markets, delicatessen, butcher, and laundromats. We have ocean views and a sitting area in the garden. 25-30 minutes to downtown by public transport. Upon entry to the right you'll find the first bath with dual vanity sinks, dual head shower including a Rainshower head, and toilet.  Hair dryer is in the drawer. Step in further to the kitchenette with granite top island and adjustable barstools. Two red pendant lamps accent the space.  The first room has a full size memory foam bed with hypoallergenic pillows and its own bathroom with dual sinks as well, bathtub, and shower. The second room has a futon sofa that folds for sleeping, a TV with Netflix, and a white loveseat that also folds out for flexible sleeping arrangements (sleep 2 on futon or 1 on futon and 1 child or smaller adult on folding loveseat; down

name: Welcome to the edge of the Earth!
summary: Come stay with us at the edge of the Earth! Only 7 blocks from the beach, this quiet, private in-law apartment is ready for guests. Perfect for families, we're five blocks from the SF Zoo and three blocks from the L-Taraval train. Our three-room space is spacious, clean and quiet.
space: Our brand new, open concept (read: no doors!) three room in-law is a great space for families and friends traveling to San Francisco. A well-appointed bathroom (with door)  is adjacent to the main bedroom, with a very comfortable queen bed. The second  bedroom has a queen-sized sleeper sofa. A kitchenette is included in the common third room. The kitchenette DOES NOT HAVE AN OVEN, but includes a microwave, hot plate, small refrigerator, coffee maker, dishes and silverware for 6. A local market is on the corner, making shopping a breeze! ** Please Note: Smoking is strictly prohibited on the property, including the back yard.** **Please Note: Our space is limited to four people.** If you're traveling with kids, let us help! We have a pack & play, high chairs, strollers, etc. Just ask!  We are also across the street from a beautiful park and ball field, there's plenty of space for kids to play.

name: Adorable private "in-law" for two
summary: Private cheery "in-law" apartment in our home of 38 years. Close to the beach, Golden Gate Park, Stern Grove, Land’s End, restaurants & bars, streetcar line and freeways.  Also close to San Francisco State University and the University of California San Francisco.  Perfect SF neighborhood with many amenities within walking distance.
space: This is a comfy cozy totally private apartment in our home, in a nice San Francisco neighborhood called the Sunset District. The main room has a very comfortable queen sized bed. The small extra bedroom has a twin bed.  Sliding doors open to the backyard, which you are free to enjoy.  The bathroom has a shower (and a pocket door to separate the toilet.) The kitchen has a sink, fridge, microwave, blender, electric kettle, toaster and coffee maker.   **The stove/oven is not in use.   We will supply coffee and tea (and cream & sugar) and there will be bottled water and orange juice, and butter & jelly, in the refrigerator.  And snacks!  There is cable tv and free wifi, and there are books to enjoy.  There is also literature about San Francisco available to help you with your stay. You have a private entrance, so may come and go at all hours.   We live upstairs, so will happily assist you with your needs! This unit is for two people only, per night.  Sorry no exceptions.   Thank you.

name: Cozy Room in Sunset near Golden Gate Park & Beach
summary: Located in the Outer Sunset, near Golden Gate Park, Ocean Beach, Stern Grove and the Zoo, on a quiet street, half a block from buses/train. Private room on first floor flat w queen bed, closet, smart TV, private detached full bath & walkout to beautiful garden. Flat & living area is shared w one other suite (w own private full bath). Great for adventurers and business travelers.  Microwave & fridge in shared living room w neighboring suite (no kitchen). Free, non permit parking on our block.
space: We are super hosts! Super hosts are experienced, highly rated hosts who are committed to providing great stays for guests.  Our house is a charming 2 story San Francisco home. The first floor flat has a private entrance through the garage with keypad for gate entry. The flat has two suites with digital locks, each w their own private full bathroom and access to the garden. Your private full bathroom is located in the shared common living room. The adjacent room has a full bath ensuite. We live upstairs and have our own separate entrance. Self check-in is possible, giving you privacy & flexibility in arrival time. name: Clean and comfortable. 2 minutes to transport.

space: The space is bright and beautiful the bed is soft and very comfortable. It is next to the entrance and downstairs bathroom with shower. Also right next to the kitchen. Very convenient for our guests as generally these are all the things you will need. STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: Great Cozy Home in Sunset District
summary: We offer our entire 2 bed 1 bath ground level unit in the Sunset Area. 1 block from the L metro light rail/subway car that takes aprox. 20 mins to Downtown/Moscone Center without traffic!  Close to restaurants, supermarkets, GG Park, Zoo, Ocean Beach, USF, UCSF, SFSU. Plenty of free street parking. Drinks Magazines TV! MEMORY FOAM MATTRESS! Note: There are 2 new queen sized beds for up to 4 people. name: Brand New Beautiful 3 bedrooms in Sunset SF

Close to grocery stores,parks and restaurants and beach.Easy access to freeways. 10 mins drive to UCSF and SFSU. 5 mins to the Zoo.

name: Sun+Beach+Waves Top Floor Flat
summary: This sunny, clean, and quiet 2-bedroom top-floor flat is three blocks from the beach, one block from the zoo, and a short stroll to the outer-sunset's hip cafes and restaurants. Easy street  parking and near the L-Taraval (San Francisco muni tram), it's a charming beach getaway in the big city. You can hear the ocean!  FYI: I used to rent to basement apartment and live upstairs, but I moved to Sonoma County, so I now rent the upstairs and I stay downstairs when I am in San Francisco.
space: Bright, clean, and well-maintained, the flat is spacious and comfortable.  There are two good-sized bedrooms with closets, a full bath with tub and shower, fully-stocked kitchen with convection oven+stove, dishwasher, and full-sized refrigerator. Large windows open west, to the beach, and there's a large deck and private garden just outside the back sliding door.

name: Colorful private room & shared bath

space: Please read everything before booking. I’ve had guests who didn’t read my listing before booking which resulted in issues and unmet expectations. Perfect room for working professionals. Mostly quiet and peaceful with the exception of Muni running from 5am - 1am.  Please note, you can hear and feel the vibrations as the Muni passes by as the stop is right at the corner of the home. space: Atop the warm Potrero Hill. Great bay & skyline views. 100% privacy. 400' Studio with Latex Cal King plus kitchenette. Perfect for quick visits or longer stays. Great access to restaurants, parks, Whole Foods, bus, airport, freeways, car rental.

name: Amazing Views. Quiet Rooms. Adorable Cats!
summary: Come share our beautiful, peaceful, 4br modern home with amazing city views on Potrero Hill. Two rooms for respectful guests available in our recently built, gorgeous home. Custom cabinets, marble bathrooms, plenty  of parking. The bus to downtown stops on the corner. Me,  my son Sam, and our two cats, Puss & Boots  live here.
space: Wake up from a quiet deep slumber on a comfy memory foam mattress. Grab a cup of coffee and sit looking out at the city from the dining area, or sit in the sunny back garden. My cats are very friendly and love guests! Hop on the #10 bus outside your door to get downtown, North Beach, FiDi. the #19 takes you right to Fisherman's wharf and many attractions. Everyone who has stayed says it's an amazing place. Convenient to SF General, SOMA, the Mission, Mission Bay and right off the freeway to take you south to the peninsula, or east over the Bay Bridge.

name: Sweet Cats, Amazing Views Potrero
summary: Come share our beautiful, quiet 4br modern home with amazing city views on Potrero Hill. I have two listings for rooms in our recently built, gorgeous home. Custom cabinets, marble bathrooms, plenty  of parking. Two very friendly cats live here too.
space: Come share our beautiful 4br modern home with amazing city views on Potrero Hill. I love hosting guests in m home and look forward to helping you have a great stay in our city. Two guest rooms are available in our recently built, gorgeous home.  Modern furnishings,custom cabinets, marble bathrooms, plenty  of parking. The bus to downtown stops on the corner. This is the best neighborhood in SF. My cats are very friendly too! You have access to the whole first floor and garden. There are two bedrooms available to rent with baths, a custom kitchen with Viking stainless appliances, and a living and dining area that looks out over the city. The back yard is huge by SF standards with tables  & chairs, big grassy area, and fruit trees growing. All yours to enjoy.  Our bedrooms and bath are on the floor above. name: Fabulous Artist Flat—Potrero Hill—Business Ready
summary: Whether in San Francisco for business or pleasure, our 950sq ft top floor flat in sunny Potrero Hill is the ideal place for you. It is furnished with the bohemian flair that SF is known for, combined with modern necessities.
space: The flat is clean, comfortable and familiar, and at the same time filled with eclectic artistic touches that surprise and delight our guests.  To help you with your bearings: It’s walking distance to UCSF Mission Bay Women's and Children's Hospital, Adobe, Pinterest, Airbnb HQ, Zygna, California College of the Arts and the Showplace Square/Design Center. The SF Muni bus lines #22, #19 and #10 are close by. The Muni T line is about 4 blocks away for access to the downtown Financial Center or shopping at Union Square. You are close to two CAL train stations for easy access to Silicon Valley. Additionally, it is:  25 minutes from San Francisco International Airport  15-20 minute walk to AT&T Park. 5 minute walk to UCSF Medical Center Situated between the 280 and 101 freeways

name: Convenient, quiet, private
summary: Welcome to our private guest room with direct garden access! It's in a nice neighborhood with amazing views, plus you can walk to Chase Center, restaurants, shops and transportation. We have hosted more than 300 guests, so we know what you need for a great stay!
space: Welcome to our spacious guest suite with private bathroom on sunny Potrero Hill! It is on the lower level of our house and looks out on a quiet garden.  Please note that there is NO SMOKING (this includes electronic cigarettes) in the house, the garden or in front of the house. FUN FACT: Science-fiction writer Frank Herbert lived in this house in the 1960s, and wrote most of his acclaimed book "Dune" while living here!  Features include: --King-size bed, with sheets, pillows (down, feather, fiberfill and memory foam are all available) and goose-down duvet --Private bathroom with shower, toilet and sink - plus hairdryer and a selection of soaps, shampoos, conditioners and other toiletries --Big, fluffy bath towels, washcloths and hand towels --The suite is equipped with a microwave oven, coffee-maker, coffee grinder, toaster, teapot, dishes and silverware--plus you also have kitchen access. --A selection of premium coffee beans, teas, sugar and other condiments --Outside door to the gar

name: Potrero Paradise: Lux, Hot Tub, Balcony w Views!
summary: The French doors of this large third-story broom open to a private balcony and breath-taking views of Downtown.  The home is quiet and yet convenient to Moscone Center, the Mission District, SoMa,  ATT Park  as well as highways 101 and 280.  Ample parking too. Take in the view of the fog rolling over Twin Peaks from the always-ready hot tub (backyard). The room features European Sleepworks queen bed, fine linens and towels, Cable TV, desk, and wireless internet.
space: Enjoy the third-floor west-facing bedroom of my Mediterranean style home at the top of quiet and convenient Potrero Hill.  Enjoy your coffee or wine while taking in the spectacular views from the private balcony. I've made every effort to make the room and my home comfortable for you, please read the reviews to learn why I'm an Airbnb Superhost.   Down the hall, you'll access a large and luxurious sky-lit bathroom featuring a large shower with 2 heads.  This bathroom is between the two guest bedrooms.  There is additional full bathroom available downstairs (on the main level) if needed.  (I have my own bathroom in the master suite on the first floor). My home is set away from the street with a gracious front patio/garden.  Despite its convenient location, the home is very quiet, a welcome retreat after work or your day exploring San Francisco.  My home is ideal for business travelers (easy access to Moscone Center, Downtown as well as the freeways) and tourists alike.  Plenty of parkin

name: SAN FRANCISCO PARADISE W/EASY  FREE PARKING
summary: A light filled  remodeled  CHIC room WITH PRIVATE ENTRANCE AND PRIVATE FRONT GARDEN in  Historic victorian house in the Sunniest most desirable  Neighborhood in San Francisco (Potrero Hill) with AMPLE FREE  STREET PARKING.  Super Close to Muni lines,   Mission Bay,Dogpatch, SOMA, downtown , Freeways, Airport ,etc... Also walking to Restaurants, shops.Bars.and all mini markets.  New  POSTURE-PEDIC  Queen SUPER COMFORTABLE , NEW  FRESH  Linens  BEST NIGHT ASLEEP.  GREEN SOLAR POWER ENERGY.
space: This House is a SOLAR POWER GREEN ENERGY HOUSE.

name: Lotus❤️Breakfast, Parking, New,W/D,Awesome Sunsets
summary: Private Room w/shared bath in our new, stylish and luxurious designer home 》Breathtaking views and sunny, newly remodeled House on Potrero Hill  》Newly refurbished home - everything inside is new 》Top end furnishings 》Brand name bathroom fixtures 》New, sealed, double-glazed windows means peace&quiet 》Kitchen 》Free street parking 》Self-service breakfast 》Walk Score 88 》Transit Score 76  》15 min.to Financial District 》Store your luggage if you arrive early or leave late.
space: 》Plenty of free street parking 》Walk to Mission, UCSF, cafes, bars, grocery & gyms 》Extremely safe neighborhood 》What Guests love about our Dream House on Potrero Hill is that everything is brand spanking new and beautifully furnished!  It's kept sparkling clean by our magnificent housekeeper and is bright, roomy and super comfortable.  Located in one of the few sunny parts of San Francisco, you're often sitting in the sun, looking at the breathtaking view of the fog (named "Karl" by the natives) rolling into parts of the city. Because we are high above the freeway, 2 blocks away, and have new, sealed, double-glazed windows, there is no freeway noise. 》The location works for both those with a car and those without and for both business and leisure travel. 》The views of downtown San Francisco from our living room are magical!  Do take a walk to admire from 18th or 20th streets.  Downtown is visible from the front of the house and Twin Peaks/top of Golden Gate from the living room. 》Leav

name: Potrero Hill "Nest" Quiet, Comfy & Convenient
summary: Comfortable, quiet guest room with own private bath in well-appointed, sunny, modern townhouse. Convenient for business and vacation travelers. On top of one of the famous SF Hills, in the very desirable Potrero Hill neighborhood.  Near to terrific restaurants, shops. Great views! Sunniest weather! Easy close-by public transportation & street parking.
space: Sunny, quiet private bedroom with own private bathroom in 3 story townhouse (host lives on premises). Room is good-sized (approximately 11.5' x 13.5'), comfortably furnished, with bay window, and own adjacent bathroom. Bamboo hardwood floors throughout, with two decks, views overlooking the whole city, fireplace, tall ceilings in common areas (kitchen, dining, living). There are laundry machines in unit, plus dishwasher, gas stove, cable and WiFi.  Great neighborhood (Potrero Hill), close to transportation (several SF Muni Bus Lines, T-Line, Caltrain, BART) and easy access to Hwys. 101 & 280. Conveniently located to nearby shops including Whole Foods, Good Life Grocery, and Chiotras; excellent restaurants (i.e. Chez Maman, Papito, Mochica, Sunflower, Serpentine, Piccino, Smokestack BBQ, etc…); with easy street parking. The peace and quiet of the country in the heart of the City! Potrero Hill is the sunniest part of San Francisco, and feels like a village within the City, with lots of t

name: Contemporary Light Filled Apartment in Potrero Hill
summary: Enjoy stunning views of the city at this renovated hilltop hideaway in one of San Francisco's sunniest neighborhoods. Marvel at the view while washing dishes in the fully equipped kitchen or while kicking back with coffee on the sunny balcony.
space: Hello guests! Welcome to our apartment in the sunniest neighborhood in San Francisco!  This newly remolded unit is located on the lower level of our family home.  (We are a family of 5 with a cat and a dog.) * Fully equipped kitchen with stove, dishwasher, microwave, fridge, etc.   * New 55" 4K HD Television (with cable) * Hi speed wifi * King Tempurpedic bed * Plenty of street parking * Stunning panoramic view * 15 minute walk to the mission, 5 minute drive

name: Studio Room on Potrero Hill
summary: Enjoy a 360 sq ft.  warm space in our home atop Potrero hill. Your own private entrance, bath, living and sleeping space with fridge, microwave & coffee. It's quiet, easy to park, and a park is right across the street. Great views of SF just outside. We have kittens upstairs FYI. Come lounge in the backyard. It is both a sanctuary and great place to hang out and play ping pong!
space: This room is quite large on the ground floor of our home. Your own entrance and private bath, so you can come and go as you please, or enjoy the main areas of the house. It's unique design feels more like a creative studio attached to the rest of the home.

name: Atop Potrero: Lux, Hot Tub, Large Deck w Views!
summary: Enjoy fabulous views of Downtown and Twin Peaks from the large private deck off this well-appointed bedroom atop Potrero Hill. The home is quiet and yet convenient to Moscone Center, the Mission District, SoMa, ATT Park (ask me about Giants tickets!) as well as highways 101 and 280. Easy Parking too! Take in the view of the fog rolling over Twin Peaks from the always-ready hot tub (backyard). The room features European Sleepworks queen bed, fine linens and towels, desk, and wireless internet.
space: Enjoy this third-floor east-facing bedroom of my Mediterranean style home at the top of quiet and convenient Potrero Hill.  Enjoy your coffee or wine while taking in the near-panoramic views from the private deck.  I've made every effort to make the room and my home comfortable for you, please read the reviews to learn why I'm an Airbnb Superhost.   Down the hall you'll access a large and luxurious sky-lit bathroom featuring a large shower with 2 heads.   This bathroom is between the two guest bedrooms.  There is additional full bathroom available downstairs (on the main level) if needed.  (I have my own bathroom in the master suite on the first floor). My home is set away from the street with a gracious front patio/garden. Despite its convenient location, the home is very quiet, a welcome retreat after work or your day exploring San Francisco. My home is ideal for business travelers (easy access to Moscone Center, Downtown as well as the freeways) and tourists alike.  Plenty of parkin

name: The Moroccan Suite in Chic San Francisco Home with Views
summary: Discover a personalized getaway in this quaint space. The room features curated decor, contrasting textures, pops of color, a private bathroom, and access to a shared kitchen and living area with views of the city.
space: 》You have a private bathroom with top-name brand fittings and fixtures. Guest comments include, "Great water pressure and fancy fixtures.  I wish I could have this nice a shower at home!" 》Plenty of free street parking 》Walk to Mission, UCSF, cafes, bars, grocery & gyms 》Extremely safe neighborhood 》What Guests love about our Dream House on Potrero Hill is that everything is brand spanking new and beautifully furnished! Because we are high above the freeway, 2 blocks away, and have new, sealed, double-glazed windows, there is no freeway noise. 》The location works for both those with a car and those without and for both business and leisure travel. 》The views of downtown San Francisco from our

name: WELCOME TO YOUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME,FREE PARKING
summary: NEWLY Remodeled  Spacious light filled  room with unobstructed city views, private entrance, private front garden in a historic Victorian house located in the most desirable neighborhood in San Francisco  Ample street parking (free) which is RARE in the city. New queen postur-pedic Mattress , Super comfortable and always fresh crisp clean linens . Close to fine dining, shops, cafe's, lounges, Caltrain, muni, Mission Bay, Embarcadero, Downtown and everything San Francisco has to offer.
space: Recently remodeled Victorian Home with beautiful outdoor garden of your own.  New beds and mattresses, (Postur-pedic), Fresh linens, clean, quiet, secure and comfortable. Perfect for a great nights sleep. Experience the Victorian San Francisco Living.

name: Secluded quiet private room & bath
summary: Private queen room & bathroom, quietly tucked off the garden level in our family home on Potrero Hill.  ACCESS to your room is thru our living room and home; Please see note on time restrictions.  Tempurpedic mattress, deluxe linens & towels; fridge/microwave, work/dining area.  Great snacks + Peet's finest coffee.  Wi-Fi & lots of FREE street parking.  2 blocks #10 & 19 Muni; 10 blocks to (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minutes SFO, 10 minutes downtown. Our reviews are our highlights!
space: Guests are not allowed, please be sure to confirm your reservation for the correct number of people. Secluded, cozy and quiet, super comfy queen size bed & your own private bathroom; Mini kitchen-microwave, fridge & kettle/coffee; work /dining area & adjacent outdoor seating in garden. Great safe location on top of Potrero Hill, expect to climb if you are walking!  Walking distance to the many great restaurants on 18th Street.  Easy freeway access, 20 mins SFO, 10 mins downtown SF and ample free parking.

name: SF Urban Haven & Secret Garden
summary: Belong on Potrero Hill!  Sunny retreat in a charming well maintained San Francisco Victorian. We are in a great location on a tree lined street with the skyline at your feet and best weather in town.
space: Thank you for your interest in staying at my place. Since I began hosting in 2011 I have received many kind and glowing reviews. The reviews you see below may not reflect the most recent ones, but are a selection made by Airbnb based on the country of the viewer first. For the most recent reviews, just click on my photo at the bottom of the page, and you will get to my profile page and can see all reviews in chronological order. The SF Urban Haven is one of the first listings certified by the SF Short Term Rental law and complies with all terms of the legislation. See number below. The Haven includes a private bath, high ceilings, interior shutters, original wood floors, woodwork & vintage lighting. It is decorated with an Asian flair and is a cozy nest with a queen platform bed, freshly ironed sheets on a fabulous made in SF McRoskey mattress. It is comfortable for one or two people. Note: If you have tons of luggage, it may feel crowded.  I'm happy to store unneeded luggage in my roo

name: MODERN SUITE WITH PRIVATE ENTRANCE
summary: 400 SQ FT SUITE WITH SEPARATE ENTRANCE. INCLUDES WIFI, FLAT SCREEN TV, PRIVATE BATH, MICROWAVE, AND FRIDGE.  SPACIOUS WITH CONCRETE FLOORS. STREET PARKING. HOUSE IS LOCATED  1 BLOCK FROM SHOPS AND RESTAURANTS.   2 PEOPLE MAX. NO PETS  (STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: MY SUITE IS COMPLETELY SEPARATE FROM THE REST OF THE HOME AND HAS A SEPARATE ENTRANCE OFFERING GREAT PRIVACY. THE SUITE WAS RECENTLY REMODELED

name: Bedroom in quiet Potrero Hill 1
summary: After the earthquake of 1906, San Francisco burned to the ground. In the aftermath the city built "earthquake shacks." A few of these 1907 homes remain, including this one which I call the "Casa Shipwreck," a home that feels like a journey at sea.
space: A beautiful 2 bedroom (with loft) historic home in quiet Potrero Hill.  This is a shared home, with one other room on Airbnb. Fireplace, garden and new kitchen and bathroom. This is the front bedroom with a full size bed near the piano. An easy trip downtown on the 3rd street light rail past the ball park.

name: Potrero Hill-Sunset Views & Free Parking
summary: Come stay in our beautiful Potrero Hill home. Just above the Mission District, and surrounded by a park (Starr King Open Space), it's a wonderful spot to enjoy the sunset, or chill after a day of sightseeing.  Bring your car! We have a dedicated parking space on the street for you.  1/2 mile walk to the 24th Street Mission corridor, in a quiet area of SF. *Be aware, we have about 50 stairs up to our house!*
space: When people stay with us, the thing we hear most often is how beautiful and calm our home is. We have owned our house for 13 years, and have gone to great efforts to keep it clean, beautiful, updated and comfortable for our guests. This is not just a crash pad with a spare bed.  We love it, and hope you will too!  Your room is large (by SF standards - 12'x14'), quiet, has a full (double)sized bed with a 1 year old Casper mattress, and as many pillows as you require. The room also has its own (small) balcony which overlooks a park, and a walk-in closet and a dresser for your personal items. Our bedroom is at the other end of the hall, and there is a shared full bath in the hall.  While the bathrooms are "shared," Dan and I tend to use the full bath on the main level, so guests don't have to wait to use the upstairs bath. On the main level is our newly remodeled kitchen, as well as the dining room and living room, and the other full bath. There is also a balcony with a killer view of the

name: Beautiful Potrero Hill Apt, Parking
summary: Newly renovated New Stainless steel appliances New hardwood floors New Granite countertop Easy street parking Outdoor Patio HDTV Netflix Washer & Dryer Walking distance to MUNI Printer, Fax,Scanner available
space: Beautiful 1 bedroom with updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Private patio. Private entrance. Entire space is private.

name: Potrero Hill room & bath in BEST part near 18th St
summary: IMPORTANT: When booking, state what time you intend to check in. Check in is 4pm-8pm. We do NOT take reservations past 8pm. We prefer those who are traveling for work. We do NOT offer kitchen access. We only accept reservations from guests who have some details about themselves in their profile!  Room and private bathroom are in a large Victorian home with us - 2 married adults. Our bedroom is on a separate floor so you have privacy. We are steps from charming 18th Street and epic city views.
space: The house is large and decorated in a combination of mid-century modern, vintage and industrial in a Victorian home built in 1900. We have hardwood floors and we only use organic and non-allergenic products in the home. The bedroom is small and has a queen bed - it is dark, moody and stylish. We are in our late 30s and have a normal M-F work schedule. Our bedroom is on the top floor, yours is on the bottom floor. You have a private bathroom next door. There is street plentiful street parking - a rarity in SF. Our prices are below market-rate because we don’t offer kitchen access - sorry.  There is a market, coffee, restaurants, bookstore and boutique shops only steps away. Whole Foods (with a cafe and bar inside) is a 10 min walk.

name: Suite in Stunning Potrero Hill
summary: Spacious private bedroom and fully stocked private bathroom suite for two; much like you would find in a boutique hotel, in a modern, secure building located in one of San Francisco's most beautiful neighborhoods. Multiple dining and public transit options no more than ten minutes on foot.
space: The main entrance is shared with the host but the guest suite is separated from the rest of the unit by a solid, lockable door for maximum privacy. The queen-size bed suite includes a dedicated private full bathroom with tub/shower combo and a large closet with built-in shelving and a small refrigerator. As well as a laptop stand suitable for business travelers. The complex was constructed in 2006 and features a modern design with high-end fixtures.

name: Studio with own entrance and garden views.
summary: Nicely furnished, quiet and private. Looking out onto our garden. Located in the Richmond district near Baker Beach, one block to a National Park, near the culinary haven of Clement Street,  and blocks to Golden Gate Park. Bus routes #1 California and #38 Geary Street to Downtown in 20 min.
space: The studio is 400 sq. ft. contemporary and minimal with its private bathroom and many amenities. Accommodates two adults on a comfortable full sized bed.

name: CHARMING, PRIVATE GARDEN UNIT
summary: Private in-law style garden unit for up to TWO PEOPLE ONLY with your own private entrance. The unit is among some of the most beautiful, historic architecture in San Francisco and the wooded forests and hiking trails of Presidio National Park.  Your unit contains a small bedroom and a cozy sitting room w/kitchenette (there is a microwave but there is no stove), and is conveniently located. We kindly ask that you read our entire description below.
space: Your two room unit is in one of the most beautiful areas of San Francisco. The unit  faces our garden, lush with plants. You have a sleeping room with baseboard heater, bathroom with shower (no tub),  and a  kitchenette/sitting area with sink, microwave, compact refrigerator, coffee maker, French Press, and toaster.  Please understand though there is a microwave oven, there is no stove.   The bed is queen size and the unit is ideal for two people.  We provide  wifi and limited tv reception along with Netflix streaming.  Unlike many other neighborhoods in San Francisco, free parking is commonly available in our area. There is a three hour limit on weekdays between 9-4 and we can assist you regarding time restrictions.  On weekends, there are no restrictions.  A few minutes walk brings you to Laurel Village with shops offering high quality gourmet groceries and prepared foods in addition to Peets Coffee, Starbucks and several restaurants. We often walk to the Fillmore District, the Marin

name: Peaceful room in yoga teacher's colorful apt.
summary: Clean, comfy, cozy private room in a colorful 2 bedroom flat shared with me, a friendly dog, cat and roommate Double bed, DSL, linens, towels, in room amenities: iron, hot-water pot, hairdryer, coffee-tea. You may use fridge to store food and back yard. Safe residential neighborhood, very easy public transport, central location. Close to Golden Gate park, Presidio park, and many restaurants, shopping,coffee shops.
space: One small clean quiet room in a colorful 2 bed-room walk up flat. Room is painted blue and has white vintage dresser drawers as well as a double/full sized comfy bed with linens, DSL, heated, and cozy. There is a deep closet for your clothes and luggage. Also included in room: Iron, hair-dryer, white noise machine, electric hot water heater (for tea/coffee), toiletries (if you forget yours), pet hair removal rollers, pet gate (to keep them out of your room).  There are fountains in the house that create running water sound.  Neighborhood is quiet, safe, but centrally located- easy walk to public transport. Walk to cafe's, shopping, parks, recreation, city urban life, restaurants, book stores, ice cream shops and grocery stores, Take a bus ride to the beach, or walk through the Presidio and Golden Gate Park.  There is close and safe street parking available on my street over night. While there is usually a 2 hour limit during the day, there are a few spots that are available all day. Th

name: Serene Space by Golden Gate Park
summary: Come rest your head in this peaceful space. Private room, private bath and shared living room in a timeless family home. Located in a safe residential neighborhood, walking distance to Golden Gate Park and The Presidio. Easy drive or bus to downtown.
space: Guests will be staying in a private room, with a cozy comfortable queen sized bed, and an attached private bath. Guests also have access to a shared family room with a cable TV, a piano, books, and a mini fridge with complementary snacks, tea, coffee, and cream.  Guests may also relax on the back deck canopied by an old thriving magnolia tree. A mother and her sister live the home which is also frequented by her 2 grown daughters.  It has been a family home for decades, thus the residence is deeply cared for and maintained. The home is accented with Asian art, fostering a clean and cozy zen atmosphere. So wake up blanketed in San Francisco fog in the calm and safe Laurel Heights/Jordan Park neighborhood.

name: Luxury in Presidio Heights Sleeps 4
summary: Our newly renovated place is in SF's most exclusive neighborhood, near the Financial District and all tourist attractions. Your private space has its own entrance, linear gas fireplace, a marble bath, washer/dryer. Sleeps 4 w/queen bed and a pullout couch. (From 8/30- 11/31, weekdays & Sat from 8-4 (no noise Sat after 4 or Sun) ,  there'll be noise from the house upstairs due to a remodel upstairs.  We've reduced from $459  for the inconvenience. No noise on Sat/Sun eves/before 8 am any day.)
space: Located in San Francisco's most prestigious neighborhood, this new apartment has a private entrance and overlooks a private garden. This apartment is luxurious and ultra comfortable. This junior one bedroom apartment has a queen size bed and a pullout couch. Marble bathroom, linear gas fireplace. Easy street parking.

name: Luxury Interior Designer’s GH/Apt -  Pac Heights
summary: Surround yourself in luxury in this beautiful designer 1-bedroom - it's sexy, contemporary and luxurious.   Close to some of the most coveted food in the city: Ariscault Bakery (named best croissant in the world by Bon Appetit),  Authentic Chinese, Burmese, Taiwanese, Dim Sum, Giorgio's Pizza (institution).Close to GG Park, Museums, Presidio. Easy access to downtown/Moscone. Separate entrance. Walk to coffee, grocery, etc. If you're looking for a true SF experience-this is it!
space: Luxury apartment/Guest House located in Jordan Park/Presidio Heights neighborhood. Fully equipped kitchen.  Rain shower head - sliding barn door into the bedroom.  Elfed closet with open drawers. Tons of space to put stuff away for a weekend or for a few weeks.  Close to hospital and walking distance to many SF attractions and bus line.  We'd love nothing more than to provide someone with the experience of our wonderful city. You will absolutely love the space.

name: Sweet SF Penthouse - Bed+Bath, Sunsets, Yoga & Zen
summary: Large private bedroom and bathroom in a classic San Francisco style penthouse apartment. The bedroom features a king bed with organic linens, nightstands that will charge your devices, large closet, and big dresser with mirror.  Wake up to morning sun and a garden view. Next to the room is a full bathroom for your use.  It even has a little view of the Golden Gate Bridge. There is also parking available upon request for additional charge (but better than a city garage!)
space: The room is very relaxing and great to enjoy after a long day of exploring, studying, and or/working in the City.  Wake up refreshed to continue your adventure. Start the day with a morning meditation or yoga practice.  Make a smoothie, coffee, or breakfast. Lounge around reading or watching a movie in comfy chairs and couches while the sun sets.

name: Designer Flat - easy access to downtown
space: Beautiful, 3 bedroom with gorgeous designer finishes and artwork.  Large living room and dining room, chic but yet casual enough that you feel at home.   The space was designed with that in mind.   Down sofa with pull out(new updated blow up mattresses), wood burning fireplace, formal dining room seats up to 8, 1.5 bathrooms, with laundry in the flat, in a desireable area of SF. All appliances - Vitamix to Kitchen Aid.Bedrooms have Frette sheets.  This is considered a LARGE flat (1500 sf).  There is also a separate in-law that would sleep 4 more if needed.   Close to everything--walk to Starbucks,fabulous restaurants (we are huge foodies and can supply our list) gym, Golden Gate Park, Presidio, the renowned de Young Fine Art Museum, and a variety of restuarants and shops. It is 1-2 blocks from multiple bus routes (easy access to Financial District and shopping). There is a large backyard with a charcoal grill and firepit.  Additionally, there is a brand new Range Rover Sport that could

name: Perfect Garden Apt - Laurel Heights
summary: A private and comfortable 2 rm apt in Laurel Heights that is a home away from home. From the private deck to the hardwood floors in the Queen size bdrm, this apt makes your stay in SF fun, safe and enjoyable. Great bath and kitchen to enjoy a night in.
space: We have tried to make this flat more like a home than a vacation rental. We have also stayed in the flat for several months so we know how it is to live here. We live in the building so we are available. Laurel Heights is in the center of everything. Bus lines 38, and 1 make a car totally unnecessary and take you anywhere in SF. Restaurants and bars all along Geary, Clement and Laurel Village are within s 10 minute walk. Shops on Sacramento are hip and chic. We offer discounts for longer stays...10% reduction for stays of 6 months

name: Spacious 3BD1.5BTH+GARAGE Prestigious neighborhood
summary: Newly furnished spacious 3 Bdrm 1.5 Bath with a garden flat in prestigious Presidio Heights.  Lots of storage. Great location just minutes away Presidio Park where you can golf, hike or bike with the iconic Golden Gate Bridge as your backdrop. Also minutes away from the Golden Gate Park filled with activities and museums such as the Botanical Gardens and the DeYoung. Walk only 2 blocks down for the Muni bus stop where the 22 will take you to Downtown SOMA, Union Square and Chinatown.

name: Single Family Home in San Francisco
summary: Have it all, this Laurel Village neighborhood house (approx. 3-miles from downtown SF) has parking that can fit up to 6-cars, but is also walking distance to world-class restaurants, boutiques, the renowned CPMC facility and public transportation.
space: Tucked between the neighborhoods of Presidio Heights and Anza-Vista/Lone Mountain, this home was custom-built by the owners and exhibits thoughtfulness and character in its layout.  Natural light seeps into this large house through the picture windows and skylights. The main level of the house (upstairs) features two large bedrooms, two-baths and copious closets. The master bedroom has a connected bathroom/vanity area and several closets, one cedar lined and the second with built-in shelving. Hardwood floors throughout with accented area rugs. Kitchen has been upgraded with gas stove and stainless-steel appliances. Formal living and dining room. The landscaped yard is a great amenity for a family with toddlers or pet (dog friendly). Downstairs features another bedroom with bath, a large family room with a dry-bar galley.  Flat screen TVs in every bedroom. Two side-by-side garages with separate doors, use both for cars or one as storage. Additional off-street parking (in driveway) and s

name: Chic| Presidio Heights| Insane views| Private Deck
summary: Tastefully remodeled 1 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom home situated in the heart of Presidio Heights. A top floor unit with fabulous large picturesque windows that provide exceptional natural light, and breathtaking City views from every room. Modern kitchen with Viking stainless appliances, built-in entertainment speakers, gas fireplace and outdoor deck.  The condo is one block from the shops and coffee stores on Sacramento Street, and three blocks to explore The Presidio.

name: Presidio Heights Designer Decorated Mansion
summary: Come stay in one of San Francisco's most magical houses. Designed by noted architect William Gunnison, our French revivalist mansion has three bedrooms and two baths recently renovated with Carrara marble, plus a spacious family room and washer/dryer upstairs. On the first floor, you will find a living room, foyer, curved staircase, half bath, dining room with a cove ceiling and chandelier, a breakfast room, sun room and full kitchen. Make your stay in San Francisco magical and memorable!
space: Our house is great for families, for multiple guests, for getaways with friends. With 3 bedrooms and plenty of extra space for air mattresses in the library and in the family room, we've been happy to host large groups traveling for business or pleasure as well as families who are looking for a special time in San Francisco.

name: Elegant Victorian in Presidio Heights *Views*
summary: This stunning five bedroom Victorian is located in charming, Presidio Heights, which is known for it's gorgeous tree-lined streets, shops and delicious restaurants. This spacious, three-level home is warm and welcoming. The 3rd floor offers sweeping views of downtown.  All new furniture throughout the entire home.  The kitchen, master bathroom and master closet were just renovated a year ago.  There are historical chinese elm trees in front of the house that add to the charm.

name: Beautiful home in Presidio Heights!
summary: Awesome architecturally significant home on tree lined street that runs between the Presidio and Golden Gate Park.  Close to main bus line, Laurel Village shops and restaurants, and gorgeous neighborhoods for peaceful walks.  Close to GG bridge(car)
space: 5 bedroom, 4 full bath, 1 half bath.  Open rooms on first two floors.  Lower level has wet bar, TV with PS4, full bath and opens to sport court with basketball net. Main level has living room/dining room/kitchen all open and inviting.  This floor opens to a deck with grill and hot tub, plus tranquil back yard with gas fireplace.  Upper level has master suite with duel shower heads in bathroom.  Two bedrooms, one with a queen and one with twin over double bunk bed plus twin trundle (sleeps 4) and hall bathroom.  One room opens to a beautiful deck with full sun. Top floor has two bedrooms--one with twin and twin trundle, one with double bed, with full bath, and a view down through the richmond district.

name: Warm and bright 1bd in Laurel Heights/Presidio
summary: This wonderful, charming light-filled, recently updated 1 bedroom and 1 full bathroom is conveniently located in the heart of San Francisco. This is the perfect home for an enjoyable stay in San Francisco; everything about this home speaks to ease and convenience.

name: One bedroom one bath in Laurel Hts/Presidio
summary: #202 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom This charming 1 bedroom and 1 full bathroom is conveniently located in the heart of San Francisco. Everything including Starbucks, restaurants, San Francisco Downtown, and hospital or more are just along the street.

name: Charming 1 bedroom enjoy staying in Laurel Heights
summary: #201 This charming 1 bedroom and 1 full bathroom is conveniently located in the heart of San Francisco. Enjoy the convenience of washer and dryer in the residence and easy walk to the bay, Presidio Park, restaurants, cafes, and much more.

name: 2 Double Beds Kitchenette City View
summary: 2 Double Beds 450-sq-foot (42-sq-meter) room with city views Internet - Free WiFi  Entertainment - 32-inch flat-screen TV, cable channels, and DVD player Food & Drink - Kitchenette with refrigerator and microwave Bathroom - Private bathroom, shower/tub combination, free toiletries, and a hair dryer Practical - Safe, iron/ironing board, and desk; rollaway/extra beds and free cribs/infant beds available on request Comfort - Air conditioning and daily housekeeping Non-Smoking Connecting/adjoining rooms can be requested, subject to availability
space: Property Location  With a stay at Laurel Inn, a Joie de Vivre Boutique Hotel in San Francisco (Pacific Heights), you'll be a 3-minute drive from Kaiser Permanente Medical Center and 7 minutes from University of San Francisco. This hotel is 1.7 mi (2.7 km) from Palace of Fine Arts and 1.9 mi (3.1 km) from San Francisco Bay. Rooms  Make yourself at home in one of the 49 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks. Amenities  Make use of convenient amenities, which include concierge services and discounted use of a nearby fitness facility. Dining  Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM. Business, Other Amenities  Featured

name: Comfort & Quiet In Laurel Heights
summary: #212 This property features one bedroom.  Beside the great quite and peace, you can enjoy an easy walk to the Presidio Park, restaurants, cafes, bars and much more. Located on shopping district.

name: Gorgeous Presidio Heights Home
summary: Coveted Presidio Heights location. Beautiful 2-level condominium in a two-unit building . Contemporary and recently remodeled home features 1 bedroom (queen bed), 4 bathrooms, deck, yard and a small gym.  An exceedingly large family room downstairs with wet bar and pool table. We have some flexibility in pricing and timeframes but looking for a minimun of 30 days at $500.00 a night. Please email with any questions.
space: 3,000 square feet

When you stay in a Zeus property you will be met with top-notch amenities including premium mattresses and bedding, organic bath products, bath linens, a fully equipped kitchen, and super-fast wifi. Our staff is on call should anything come up that needs our attention or that can make your stay more enjoyable. Enjoy a stay with Zeus! We have 1325+ reviews (see below).

name: Virtually Your Own Apt in Nth Beach
summary: Classic San Francisco home (Edwardian) in the heart of San Francisco.  Located 10 minutes walk from: Fisherman's Wharf, Little Italy, Chinatown, Coit Tower, Lombard (Crookedest) Street etc. and the cable car stops just around the corner.  Tons of great restaurants and cafes within a short walk from front door.
space: ABOUT THE HOUSE Ground floor of two story Edwardian house in a little one-block long alley in North Beach built in the early 1900's.  We share a common front door.  I live upstairs and guests have exclusive use of the ground floor living area that includes your own bathroom, living room etc (please see below regarding privacy). The house is an easy 10 minutes walk to many famous San Francisco landmarks - Coit Tower, Little Italy, Washington Square Park, Fisherman's Wharf, Chinatown, Lombard Street, Ghiradelli Square etc.  With a Walk Score of 98 and a Transit Score of 92 out of 100, this puts my place in the "Walker's Paradise" (average Walk Score in SF is 86) and "Rider's Paradise" category on the WalkScore website.   That website also ranks my place as a "Lower Crime Area." Also, there are 8 Legacy Historic Small Businesses within a 15 to 20 minute walk from my place.  Cable car stop merely yards away from front door, and the historic F line street cars stop is only 10 minutes walk a

name: Private Room/Bath ❤ of North Beach!
summary: Located in the heart of the vibrant Italian North Beach neighborhood...tons of cafes, Coit Tower, Telegraph Hill, Lombard Street and next to China Town, Fisherman's Wharf and Union Square.
space: We have a cute bedroom downstairs complete with an en suite bathroom.   All the other rooms in the house are upstairs, so it will feel like your own private place.  It's cozy, but the best part is certainly the location. By being located in the heart of the vibrant North Beach neighborhood you will experience a local's perspective of an amazing city! It's worth noting that with two people you may feel the space constraints of this city as the room is typical San Francisco size (i.e. fairly small). You will definitely have a memorable experience in one of the best neighborhoods SF has to offer though, as it's hard to beat this location.

name: Cozy Studio Guest Suite
summary: Cozy studio guest suite/apartment, with separate entrance. Bathroom w/shower, large closet (8x3 ft), small kitchenette. Queen bed + pull-out couch (twin bed). Very quiet. Away from street. Private outdoor area. In Polk & Chestnut area, close to great restaurants/cafes, easy walk to Aquatic Park and Ghirardelli Square.
space: Cozy studio guest suite with separate entrance (in 2 unit building), bathroom w/shower, large closet (8x3 ft), small kitchenette. Very quiet. Away from street.   Refinished hardwood floors. One small private courtyard deck. Small garden. Washer and dryer - shared, no charges.   In Polk & Chestnut area - close to great restaurants/cafes on Polk St, easy walk to water (Aquatic Park) and Ghirardelli Square. Surprisingly easy parking on street (especially overnight and weekends - at highschool 1 block away). The apartment is kept clean and tidy by a professional cleaning staff.

space: Charming, cabin style 1 Bedroom unit in an amazing location.  Walking distance from some of the best sights San Francisco has to offer. This is a wonderful cozy one bedroom with a cabin feel to it.  Located within blocks of some of San Francisco's most iconic spots such as Lombard Street, Ghiradelli Square, Fisherman's Wharf, and the famous San Francisco cable cars.   This super cozy unit is located in an ideal area for those who want to walk around San Francisco's Marina District. There are great restaurants and numerous sights to see within just a few minutes walk. The proximity to some of the most famous San Francisco sights is hard to beat.   Parking pass for the private street is included!  This allows you to park in the reserved spaces right in front of the unit - a major plus for this area! The proximity to some of the most famous San Francisco sights is hard to beat.

Perfect set up for travelers who want to explore the city and business people, not ideal for those who want to lounge around, work from "home" or cook.
space: Great location close to main attractions. Just walking distance to Fisherman's Wharf, Ghirardelli Square, North Beach, Lombard Street. Cable car just a few steps away. name: Charming Russian Hill - Junior 1BR Basement Apt.
summary: Located in one of SF's most coveted neighborhoods, this newly remodeled Junior One-Bedroom apt is centrally located to some of the best attractions. From the cable cars to the tree lined streets, the charm of Russian Hill awaits...
space: At the top of the hill, tucked away behind buildings and garden courtyards, there lies a unique living space in a unique part of town.  Ideal for a couple, the unit can accommodate two individuals or third additional person on a pull-out Sofa Bed.  The apartment is a beautifully remodeled Junior 1-Bedroom "In-Law" unit located on the ground floor (approx 400sq ft). The unit unfortunately does not get much natural light, but we make up for it by providing your own private entrance, newly sanded hardwood floors, a mini kitchenette with modern appliances, and just enough space to feel comfortable and at home. There is access to a garden courtyard in the back for a peaceful relaxed setting or you can simply walk out front for the hustle and bustle of the City.  The apartment is located on Filbert St, an already popular street in San Francisco, famously known as the steepest navigable street in the Western Hemisphere. name: Modern 1-BD in Fisherman's Wharf/Russian Hill
summary: Ideally located in the heart of San Francisco's Fisherman's Wharf area. Modern one bedroom with full bathroom and eating area.  Sleeps up to 4 guests.  Only 1 block away from Ghirardelli Square and walking distance to Aquatic Park, Fisherman's Wharf, Pier 39, North Beach and Chinatown. Numerous restaurants nearby.
space: The suite is separate, private, and located  in the lower level of our house. The space is used exclusively for our Airbnb guests only and it has its own  entrance through the side yard and away from the street .  The bedroom is furnished with a queen bed and includes linens, hairdryer, toiletries, ironing board and travel iron. The bathroom en suite is stocked with towels, soaps and shampoo.  The living room has a 50" flat screen TV and a queen sofa bed with a memory foam gel mattress.  (Please note that this is a sofa bed and comfort level and expectations of a sofa bed is subjective to each guest)  The eating area seats 4 and features a microwave, coffee maker, basic utensils, cookware, tea kettle,  and refrigerator. The unit is heated by in-floor radiant heat. The unit has its own WiFi for our guests. Clothes Washer and Dryer are not available in our place. name: Spectacular Bay View Russian Hill
space: Live in the Garden of Eden in an Urban Environment. Centrally located for a great visit to San Francisco. Fabulous north and east bay views, sunny, recently renovated Furnished 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath apartment located in a landmark 3 unit building 4 blocks from SF Bay on the north slope of Russian Hill. The apartment is 1000 square feet. Double Pane soundproof windows. Cable TV, DVR, and WiFi. Large outdoor north facing Alcatraz view deck (25ft x 8 ft). Access to large back yard and beautiful garden. name: 2BD Russian Hill Hideaway
summary: Greetings! Located in the heart of one of San Francisco's trendiest and safest neighborhoods - Russian Hill. This gorgeous, well-lit, top floor two-bedroom apartment will meet all your needs (and more!).  Please read on for details...
space: Edwardian apartment located off of Hyde street at the top of Russian Hill. I've updated the apartment with state-of-the-art amenities & furniture including:  * very comfortable queen size memory foam bed in the bedroom  * beautiful oak hardwood floors throughout the apartment  * 55-inch HD theater system with surround sound  * Free cable, HBO and high speed wireless internet  * Entire house is wired with sound system in every-room (including bathroom)  * Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances, pot-filler and caesar stone counter-tops and all utensils necessary  * white leather couch in living room * 2nd bedroom with queen size bed & closet  * Extra room used as a small office with desk   * Washer and dryer in apartment The apartment is within walking distance to many great locations in San Francisco:  * Located between Polk Street and North Beach  * Half a block from the hyde street Cable Car line  * Great restaurants within 1 block radius, including pizzeria, fine italian, Sw

name: Designer's 1BR, Close to Sites: Parking, Roofdeck
summary: Come stay in my apartment a few blocks from the waterfront. Right next to all the great tourist hot spots, the apartment is ideal for seeing the city. From my lovely roof deck you can see Alcatraz in one direction and the SF skyline in the other.  2 blocks away you can hop on the iconic Taylor/Mason cable car. Within 5 minutes walk to some of the most popular and photogenic spots in SF. Within 5 minutes from Pier 39, Beach street, Ghiradelli Square, Lombard Street, & North Beach.
space: Come stay in my apartment a few blocks from the waterfront. Right next to all the great tourist hot spots, the apartment is ideal for seeing the city. From my amazing roof deck you can see Alcatraz in one direction and the SF skyline in the other. 2 blocks away you can hop on the iconic Hyde/Powell cable car. Within 5 minutes walk to some of the most popular and photogenic spots in SF. Within 5 minutes from Pier 39, Beach street, Ghiradelli Square, Lombard Street, & North Beach. Why pay $300+ a night at a hotel when you rent our entire 1 bed/1 bath with a roofdeck and gorgeous views for the same price? Walk Score: 91 "Walkers Paradise" Of special interest to business travelers, or guests here for a conference downtown: My apartment, while close to the best sites in SF, is also walking distance to downtown. It's about a 30 minute walk, a quick 5 minute uber, or you can even take the bus if you desire. Easy access to work during the day, then come home and see the sites of SF by night.

name: Amazing Location with Breathtaking Bay Views
summary: Enjoy 180° Bay views in the sunny living room at this hidden oasis in the heart of the city. Listen for foghorns, sea lions, and the clang of nearby cable cars. Sit at the sleek marble dining table and admire the eclectic art featured throughout.
space: Enjoy the best of San Francisco in this charming, sunny, stylish, comfortable and quiet 2 bedroom/1 bath top floor apartment overlooking the Bay in the heart of the City. An urban retreat, this 1000 sq. foot bungalow is great for visiting couples, families and business travelers. Nestled between the bustle of North Beach's Italian District—voted a Top 10 neighborhood in the country—and the friendly tree-lined streets and bohemian charm of Russian Hill, settle in and enjoy the City lifestyle like a local. Relax on a quiet, quaint and private alley (though you'll likely hear the ding of nearby Cable Cars, the fog horn from Golden Gate Bridge, and sea lions on PIER 39!). Step inside to a uniquely San Francisco-style flat with hardwood floors, great light and an incredible Bay panorama with window seats where you can sip California wine and watch sailboats, cruise and cargo ships glide by. Step outside to postcard views of Alcatraz and Coit Tower on your doorstep.

name: Private room by Fisherman's Wharf & Financial Dis
summary: Located in hip North Beach area, close to Fishermans Wharf, walking distance to great restaurants, bars, and entertainment.  Large airy private room with access to kitchen, shared bathroom, washer & dryer.  Bohemian decor - plenty of books!
space: The building is a 1920's Edwardian with all the fine details of the era.  We have an extensive art collection and vinyls, many of which you can enjoy in the room! The room is spacious, clean and has plenty of natural light.  The room holds a queen sized bed, night table, closet, desk and dresser. Please note that we are on the top flat and up a long flight of stairs (I count 38 to be exact!)

name: Bayview Penthouse: Private Bedroom, Bath & Balcony
summary: Top Location, Views & Facilities! - PRIVATE BEDROOM with ATTACHED PRIVATE BATHROOM & BALCONY - Top floor PENTHOUSE with panoramic views of SF Bay, Alcatraz,  Russian Hill & Park - Just few steps from Fisherman's Wharf, Ghirardelli Square, Pier 39, Aquatic Park Beach, Lombard Street, restaurants, cable car & bus stops - Shared Living Room, Kitchen, and Terrace with stunning Bay views - Self-serve breakfast & food anytime! - Garage parking $25/day Registration Number: STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
space: Bright and sunny private master bedroom with a very comfortable queen bed (Tempurpedic mattress & pillows), attached private bathroom, and attached private balcony facing Russian Hill, SF Park, Cable Cars, and Bay Bridge. Private bedroom and the living room each have satellite TV (50" smart UHD TV with premium channels, Netflix, YouTube, etc.). The entire penthouse is full of natural light and warmth.  From the living room and terrace you see SF Bay, Alcatraz, Angel Island, & Golden Gate Bridge.  From the master bedroom & balcony you see Russian Hill, SF Park, Telegraph Hill, Bay Bridge, and beautiful Hyde Street with cable cars. Perfect place to relax, enjoy, and explore SF from!  Walk just few steps to most places of interest.

name: Sunny North Beach Guest Room in a Stylish Flat⚡
summary: Spacious, sunny, private guest bedroom in my 2 bedroom home. Fast WiFi -hardwood floors - eat-in kitchen - great views - prime walking location. A great home base to get familiar with San Francisco.  Ideal place to walk to Financial District every morning!  Fresh, Central, Stylish and Clean =)
space: The room gets a lot of sunlight and you can hear the famous Cable Car bell when it passes by on the street below - aside from that, the noise level only moderate as the apt is a couple blocks off of Columbus Ave. This room is a guest room/home office, not a sublet of someone's personal room, so it is clear of most personal items and ready for you to feel at home in. There is also a lot of space to use in the closet and cupboards for you to store your things.  Soap, shampoo/conditioner and towel provided. The eat-in kitchen has all the goodies which guests are welcome to use. You can store whatever food you wish in the refrigerator and are always welcome to make a cup of tea for yourself with any tea you find in the cupboard.  The building is very small and is controlled access. Located on the 3rd floor, walkup. I live on the premises within my own private room, but usually I'm at work or traveling (often times for work). name: Quintessential Russian Hill 2BR Apt
summary: Entire Russian Hill flat centrally located to all the major sites!  This is a typical San Francisco "Victorian" style apartment build over 100yrs ago A reserved parking spot can be negotiated, as well as access to a communal washer/dryer. For an additional fee, a weekly or biweekly cleaning service can be arranged.  Located walking distance to many major attractions, sights, and transportation.  We live out back. This is an entire fully furnished Private apartment with 2x private entrences.
space: The apartment is meant for 5 people but can host up to 6 comfortably if need be.  The Master Bedroom sleeps two in a queen bed.  The Guest bedroom sleeps two on 2x twin beds.  The Living Room sleeps two on fold out sofa bed as well as on the comfy couches too.  There are 1.5 bathrooms  (2x toilets - 2x sinks - 1x shower) There is also a full Dining Room to eat, study, or work and a Full Kitchen if you plan on cooking.  Furthermore, there is a Hallway Study to help plan you day as well as a patio/deck in the back.  The apartment is in a beautiful 'turn of the century' Victorian building overlooking North Beach with views of Telegraph Hill and the San Francisco Bay.  The building is located on Filbert St, an already pretty popular street in San Francisco, famously known as the steepest navigable street in the country.  Within walking distance is also: • Lombard St (crookedest street in the world)  • Fort Mason • Ghirardelli Square  • Aquatic Park • Fishermans Wharf  • Pier 39 • North Bea

name: Studio with beautiful garden
summary: Studio furnished with queen bed, dining table, smart flat screen TV, ipod hook up, microwave, toaster oven, refrigerator, fireplace and sliding doors that open to a lovely yard. Also has wireless broadband Internet and xfinity network. Our studio is located in Russian Hill, steps from the shops, cafes and restaurants of Polk Street and Union Street.  Just 3 short blocks from a new playground with tennis and basketball courts. Crunch Fitness is ½ block away.
space: This studio is wonderful because it has two sliding doors that open to a beautiful garden. It makes for a peaceful and tranquil place to share a cup of coffee or a glass of wine.

name: ROOM Marina LOCATION LOCATION
