The bedroom has a very comfortable queen bed with fresh and clean sheets, desk, closet/dresser space and good natural lighting.  During your stay you will enjoy the conveniency of restaurants, bars, public transportation and local tourist attractions.

name: Charming Guest Room in 1907 Cottage on Russian Hill
summary: Begin a relaxing morning out on the porch, then head to the local international market and delis. This fully-equipped suite features a comfy 4-poster bed, kitchenette, and charming dining area. It's all the comforts of home with a 20th-century vibe.
space: Annie’s Cottage offers charming accommodations within walking distance of Fisherman’s Wharf, Union Square, China Town, North Beach and other San Francisco favorites. Our unique San Francisco lodging on Russian Hill is convenient to many interesting shops and boutiques nearby. The historic San Francisco cable car system is only a short 1/2 block away.

name: Gather Round the Fire Pit at a Period Russian Hill Flat
summary: Start your day with a cup of tea, play card games, or end your day with a glass of wine next to the firepit on a charming, roomy, private back deck, where cushioned seats beckon beneath lights and palms. Inside, hardwood floors, original moldings, and antique flourishes nestle comfortably alongside modern and vintage styling.
space: Three bedrooms, two with queen beds and one with a single bed. Couch in front room makes into a round bed that could sleep two. Gas fireplace in front room. Fully equipped kitchen. Washer & dryer in unit. Private deck with BBQ and fire pit. Flat has x-finity cable, Netflix and internet.

name: Cozy Room in Sight of the Sea
summary: PRIVATE BATH: The room has same floor exclusive private shower/bathroom and Atrium. Peak outside these bedroom windows: drink in the Pacific and Ocean Beach, or gaze upon a spacious new hot tub to soak out your weary day from exploring the city.
space: Quiet neighborhood with free street parking. One block from Sutros Heights park.  Stroll down Lands End pacific trail leading to Golden Gate Bridge. Your lodging is four blocks from Goldengate Park, and  a five minute drive to DeYoung Museum and the Academy of Science.  A brief walk to World Class Cliff House Restaurant.  Access to public transportation Muni #38 Bus to downtown San Francisco.

name: Charming & Private Ideal location
space: Spacious, quiet and beautifully decorated, this private garden 1 bedroom sleeps 4.  Ideally located beside the beautiful ocean view walks at Lands End. Roll out of bed and grab breakfast at one of the diners just a half a block away with panoramic world class views of the Pacific.   Your own private apartment offers 1 bedroom (queen bed) and large living room (2 twin trundle beds) and a private bath (shower only). Natural light streams in from the garden and the Geary bus line is just half a block away and will take you downtown. There is ample street parking at this location, you will likely find a parking spot right in front of the house.  This self contained apartment is on the ground floor of my home and offers total privacy with separate street entry on the side of the house.  Access to the garden is yours.  There is not a full kitchen however, your basics are covered with refrigerator, microwave, toaster over and coffee pot, and access to shared laundry. Store your surf boards in

name: comfy oceanside nest
summary: Private room on top level of house with city and GG Bridge views.  Lots of light, privacy and calm.
space: The room is +250 square feet of warmth and light.  It is completely private with no other rooms on that level.  The bed is a brand new queen size  BeautyRest with high quality linens and pillows.  There is a 50" HD television with cable, small desk, closet, couch, electronics charging station, robes and lots of books in case you need material for a cat nap.  The bathroom is on the level below, but has a great glass enclosed spa shower and is stocked with essentials, towels, misc. toiletries and hair dryer.

name: 2+BR Beach Cottage-w/Parking+Views
summary: Experience the comforts of a beach house in SF & share this home with your group of family/friends. The house is located on a quiet street and has charming period details, beautiful ocean views, a spacious layout, and incredible access to the beach.
space: This is a unique opportunity to stay with the beautiful Pacific Ocean and miles of coastal trails two blocks away. The incredible location will inspire the nature lover and photographer in you...Come experience a private, spacious, well-appointed beach cottage that has the comforts of home, free parking in driveway and easy street parking, a safe neighborhood, and the capacity to host a group of family or friends. The 2,000 sq ft Beach Cottage features classic marina-style architecture, as well as mid-century modern and beach chic decor for a clean, comfortable and fun style.   A perfect place to relax and unwind as you explore the city!

name: Land's End Retreat
summary: Inviting urban retreat at the edge of the city overlooking the ocean. Private room and bathroom, comfortable and quiet, with artistic accents. Incredible location steps away from the Land’s End trailhead, up the hill from from Ocean Beach, a few blocks away from Golden Gate Park and around the corner from public transportation. Restaurants, cafés and groceries are a short walk away. Street parking available; no parking meters or required permits. You can hear the waves at night.
space: The space is quiet and kept very clean. Kitchenette area includes refrigerator, toaster, microwave, electric hot water kettle, coffeemaker, plates, glasses, utensils and more. Coffee/tea/snacks/fruit provided. Let us know if there's anything you need!  Bed: 1 queen size bed, pillows, sheets, down comforter Bathroom: Full bath with shower. Towels and basics (soap, shampoo, conditioner, hair dryer etc) provided. Comfy armchair and ottoman for reading or relaxing after San Francisco day tripping. Café table and chairs, desk, dresser. Extra blankets and picnic basket/cooler for local outdoor excursions.

name: Best Secret in Town
summary: This is a private room in my two story house located in the quiet side of the city close to Lands End Trail, Golden Gate Park, Ocean Beach. City Muni Bus can take you to  many other tours attractions, shops, restaurants in the city. It is a big room with one queen size bed and a futon can sleep up to 4 people. Everything you need will provided in the room like:  TV, coffee maker, small refrigerator, breakfast table with 4 chairs,  clean towels, Iron and Iron board, and full size closet.
space: The room is spacious and it is on the top level of the house. Through the bay window, if it is a clear day, you will have the beach view( at left of the house) and beautiful sun set view. TV, coffee maker, small refrigerator, iron, iron board, all provided and conveniently located inside your room. The bath room is located at hallway and shared with other airbnb guests during their stay. The kitchen is shared with the owner and other airbnb guests.

name: Best Master Suite in Town
summary: This is a private master room with your own bathroom located at the quiet side of the house. You’ll love this place if you are a business traveler, Couple, and/or solo adventure. My house is located at quite side of the town, and convenience to downtown and all tours attractions. Walking distance to  Golden Gate Bridge, Lands End, and Golden Gate Park.  WiFi, comfortable bed, TV , coffee maker, refrigerator, hair dryer, iron, clean towels, full size closet and loveseat are in your room.
space: This is a two story house. Your room is on the top floor of the house. From the street, two 16 steps will take you to your room. The room with real queen size bed and loveseat will make your stay comfortably. There is a private bathroom in your suite and the full size kitchen, shared with owner and other airbnb guests, is located at main floor of the house.

name: The Real San Francisco #2
summary: Perfect for families!  Minutes to GG Bridge, GG Park, Museums, The Presidio, S.F. Zoo, Lands End Trails, Lincoln Park golf course and three beaches.  A playground right across the street, and loads of games, toys, books and sports equipment for keeping little ones busy.  The apartment sleeps up to four adults, plus a bunk room for up to three kids.
space: Our 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath flat is available while we travel abroad.  This comfortable home features large windows in the living and dining rooms, for big and bright views of the San Francisco skyline, the Presidio, and the Golden Gate Bridge.  Great sunrises too!  The bedrooms are on the west side of the flat, and all include blackout shades, so they stay relatively dark in the morning. Traveling with kids but don't want to lug out all the equipment?  Pack & Plays, highchairs, strollers, toys; you name it, we have it or can get it.  Give yourself a break. There is an excellent playground across the street, and a very kid-safe beach nearby.

name: Serene Apartment with a Garden Patio in the Outer Richmond
summary: Enter a bright, clean-lined kitchen to fix a cup of tea, then head out to the sunny deck patio to unwind amongst the potted flowering plants. Adorned with intriguing artworks and design-conscious furnishings, this space emits a smart, stylish aura.
space: My home is fully remediated to neutralize the effects of EMF using Vastu - the Feng Shui of India, or the Art of enhancing the energy of your home. The sanctuary is soothing for your body-mind. I love art and have several beautiful paintings and sculptures. The home is a Victorian old lady from 1907, survived the earth quake and stands rock solid on top of the hill overlooking the Lincoln park and the Golden Gate Bridge. My kitchen is a delight for food lovers and chefs. I have a large variety of spices & condiments & plenty of staple of lentils and  rice and breakfast items in the fridge you can use during your stay. It is not just  a house, it is a true place to retreat. I know myself how much I love to arrive somewhere and right away  make myself a good cup of coffee or herbal tea and to feel that the owners have put their love in the house to make me feel welcome. The home is situated in a residential quiet area, very suitable for families with children or for people that appreciat

name: Lands' End hideaway
summary: Light and airy in-law with dedicated bathroom and kitchenette.  Cozy hideaway in a nice residential area close to Lands End Trail, but with the city well within reach.
space: The room is on the lower level of the house, with its own bathroom.  The room is cozy with an electric fireplace and seating area.  There is also a kitchenette for your use, stocked with a few essentials.

name: Beautiful Home in SeaCliff
summary: My home is in one of the safest neighborhoods and walking distance to the golf course, Ocean and Baker Beaches, Park Presidio, Lands End, Sutro Baths and the Cliff House. There are tasty local and famous restaurants within less than a 5 minute walk with variety of foods, movie theatres, cafes, and shopping. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

name: Balena Blu - Suite with Ocean Views
summary: Newly refurnished private bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom with access to a living room and deck.  There are spectacular views of the ocean and you are steps from Lands End, Sutro Park, and Ocean Beach.
space: The bedroom has an extremely comfortable king size bed and blackout shades.  It also offers breathtaking views of the ocean.  The kitchen is fully equipped by and for people who love to cook.  The bathroom has a spacious shower.  The shared living room is quite comfortable and used only by us for access to the back yard and laundry.

name: SF Apt Blocks from the Beach
summary: Enjoy whole apt. in quiet residential neighborhood in nature, near bustling neighborhoods. Can sleep up to 5. Tranquil, clean, nurturing. Sweet garden. The perfect guests are those who quietly enjoy the unit/garden. Please read notes/house rules carefully to see if our place is right for your stay. (Note: NO smoking allowed in apartment or outside in front or back garden.)
space: Our apartment is comfortable, peaceful and quiet. If you want a place for just the two of you; a retreat from the busyness of your life; to finally write that book/screenplay; are here for a work assignment/course of study, this will be your home away from home.  You have everything you need for a meditative, rich experience. Full bath; large closet. And healthy too; water filter; non-VOC paint throughout; even the soaps and household items are eco-friendly/green. You are minutes from a stunning jaunt into nature to the Pacific Ocean.  Add'l guests approved before booking: $30/night. 3 add'l beds: sofa makes up into queen-size bed; meditation room has a twin-size futon. Also in the unit: - Fully-stocked kitchen: toaster/convection oven (note: no stove); cookware; electric coffee/tea kettle. Plates, cups, bowls, utensils, napkins. Tea set. - Homemade granola; protein bars; snacks. - Extra towels, linens & comforters/blankets. - Toiletries; blow dryer. - Wine opener & wine glasses. - Iro

name: 4600 SQ FT SEA CLIFF Mansion
summary: Live in a mansion in the Sea Cliff neighborhood of San Francisco! Walking distance to China beach and Lincoln Park. Stunning views of the SF bay and Golden Gate Bridge. Do not miss the hike to Lands End and have a drink at the mouth of the Pacific Ocean at the famous Cliff House!  This will be a uniquely San Francisco adventure without the "hustle and bustle" of the downtown area.  Enjoy our beautiful private garden and classic  living room area.
space: This is a very large home in San Francisco's venerable Sea Cliff neighborhood. Many of these estates are worth millions of dollars! Robin William's house was a block down from this home.  The house is classically (maybe a little too classic) decorated and the main feature is a large and beautiful living room, great room to relax and have your favorite cocktail.  This is not your ordinary space - if you need an extra bed there are two rooms (office and gym) we can ADD a very nice inflatable bed. With this extra bed you can sleep with 4 couples - make sure the youngest of the couples or kids get the inflatable mattress ;)  This is a happy family home hope it brings its guests the same happiness!

name: Cozy private bedroom with a queen size bed
summary: A cozy private bedroom with two single beds and laptop desk in a newly remodeled three bedroom. Walking distance to Ocean Beach, Golden Gate, and Lands end.

name: Two Suite SF Dream Retreat w/Golden Gate Views
summary: Your Two Suite Retreat with Golden Gate Bridge views await!  This newly renovated masterpiece will inspire you to dream in ways you've never dreamed before.  You will not find another property like this one in the world. Casa al Mare is located in San Francisco's exclusive Sea Cliff neighborhood.  Experience commanding views of the Golden Gate Bridge, the Marin Headlands and life on the bay. Your front yard?  Lands End, China and Baker Beach!
space: Your dreamy double suite is located on the third floor of Casa al Mare.  Soak up unique views of the Golden Gate Bridge and the Marin Headlands from all three third floor spaces:  your two bedrooms + your loo with a view! Newly Renovated Home - Inside & Out Originally designed by international award-winning architect, Joseph Esherick, Casa al Mare is newly renovated, top-to-bottom by architectural designer extraordinaire, Stephen Barlow and co-owner, Jennifer Carolyn King. Perhaps you've heard of Sea Ranch just north of San Francisco? Joseph Esherick was responsible for designing Sea Ranch and the Monterey Bay Aquarium. Meticulous effort has gone into honoring Esherick's original design while updating every inch of the home, inside and out. Stephen Barlow was the lead architect on Casa al Mare. Mr. Barlow worked for fifteen years as the lead architect for world-renowned interior designer, John Saladino. This is Jennifer and Stephen's second creation together. (The first is an Africa-in

name: Panorama Pacific View - Pet Friendly
summary: Incredible panoramic views of the ocean abound from this bright 3 bedroom 2 bath flat.  Light enters through the floor-to-ceiling glass windows from the living room, dining room and kitchen.
space: RATES BASED ON 30 NIGHT MINIMUM STAY Discounts may be available October 1 to March 31. Please send an inquiry prior to submitting a reservation request so that we can confirm availability and submit a Special Offer inclusive of all fees. See Additional Fees and Rentals Terms sections below. Incredible panoramic views of the ocean abound from this bright 3 bedroom 2 bath flat.  Light enters through the floor-to-ceiling glass windows from the living room, dining room and kitchen.  Living room has a sliding glass door leading to the ocean facing deck, wood burning fireplace, and leather sofa. Hardwood floors, numerous closets and diverse storage space throughout.  All bedrooms are large and have a queen bed with plentiful closet space.  You can gaze at the wonderful view while preparing meals in the updated fully stocked kitchen that has great counter space, numerous cupboards, and dishwasher.  Washer and Dryer are available in the garage. Sutro Park is 1/2 block away; Land¹s End hiking t

name: Lovely SF Bdrm/Bath near the Beach.
summary: Use this sweet bedroom/bath as your base while you attend business meetings, music festivals, and other events. Golden Gate Park is a few blocks away for Hardly Strictly Bluegrass Festival - 4-9 October.  Accommodates 1 person or a couple. NOTE: NO smoking inside or anywhere near house in front/back. If you are a smoker, this is not a fit for you. Quiet- garden in back. Few blocks to Land's End ocean hiking trail, Ocean Beach, Cliff House, Golden Gate Park. 24/7 Muni Bus a few blocks away.
space: Use as base for sightseeing, travel up and down the coast, or a fun weekend in a gorgeous city.

name: SPECTACULAR FLAT BY OCEAN 30 day minimum
summary: My place is a short walk to Ocean Beach, Sutro Baths, Lands End, and great hiking trails. You’ll love it because of the stunning sunsets and gorgeous landscapes. The flat is cozy with comfy beds and everything needed for a long stay. My flat is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
space: The lower flat shares the garden patio with the upper unit. Guests are encouraged to use the lounge chairs for sunning.

name: Sublime Ocean Views
summary: Our Ocean Beach Vista is a tastefully designed one-bedroom apartment with special views of the San Francisco coastline.  The property is located on a hillside that offers protection from the wind and an expansive vista of the Pacific Ocean.  The space is well conceived and efficient to maximize comfort and usability.  As you enter the property you will find a living room with sliding glass doors opening onto a large deck overlooking the ocean. This property is totally handicap accessible.

name: Specular 4 BR, GG Bridge Views, 1min Walk to Beach
summary: Specular 4 br House w/ GG Bridge Views, 1 min from Beach. Avail, 6/22 - 8/31/19. **30 Day Min Stay* Located in exclusive Sea Cliff neighborhood, newly built residence  w/ views of the Ocean & GG Bridge, 3 levels of living space @ 3,500sf.  Ideal family home: 4 bds (w/2 ensuite masters), 3.5 baths, gourmet kitchen, elevator, floor-to-ceiling windows, large deck, outdoor gourmet kitchen, hot tub. Beautiful blend of classic & contemporary offering modern amenities w/ impeccable finished-carpentry.
space: All

name: Ocean Front Condo Steps To Shoreline
summary: Wake up each morning to the waves crashing on the Pacific Coast! A rare find, this modern, sky-light-filled beautiful large luxury furnished ocean front condo is located on San Francisco’s very own Great Hwy with full frontal tranquil ocean views- only steps to the Ocean Beach water’s edge. Your closest neighbor to the west lives in Hawaii! Walking/bike paths, Java Beach Cafe, Outlanders Restaurant, Beach Chalet, and of course Golden Gate Park are just a short walk from the condo!

name: Modern Studio w/Quiet Courtyard + Private Entrance
summary: Centrally located in a quiet alley of Downtown SF-close to all technology co., theaters, and art museums, this place offers a real urban life with privacy and comfort of a courtyard house. Enjoy your stay at this colorful and newly-built space.
space: SAN FRANCISCO SHORT-TERM RESIDENTIAL RENTAL REGISTRATION NO : STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Possession of a San Francisco Short-Term Rental Registration Certificate certifies that the registration certificate holder has agreed to comply with the terms of the SF Short-term Residential Rental Ordinance (SF administrative Code Section 41A). This ordinance does not require an inspection of the unit by the City for potential Building, Housing, Fire, or other Code violations. This is a newly-constructed 225 sqft space with your own full modern kitchen and private bathroom with shower. Fresh bed-linen is provided as well as towels, soap, shampoo and a hairdryer. The space has its own private entrance from the street through an interior courtyard. It is also fully equipped with radiant heat floor and internet access. The kitchen will be equipped with cooking ware and utensil. Cereal, juice, tea and coffee will also be provided.   Centrally located in a quiet alley of Western South of Mar

name: Freshly Remodeled Two Bedroom Home
summary: This house was one of the first projects developed by the architect of the new bay bridge. Private access to the upper two levels you are free to come and go as you please.  I live onsite on the bottom floor and am available at all times.
space: I and my Bulldog Potato live on the bottom floor of the rental so as long as I am around I would be happy to share some of the gems I have discovered about the area in the 11 years I have lived here.  Can be reached anytime on mobile or email.  Please disclose a bit of information about yourself and the other guests as well as reason for the stay prior to booking.  Fully remodeled and updated for modern city living this 2BD, 1BA 700 sq foot partial home includes: - Newly remodeled space - Configurable Kitchen Table seating for 6 - Brand new appliances , Quartz countertops - Walnut Bamboo solid hardwood floor  - Custom Made Redwood bar and head board - Work Desk - Sleeps 4 - (2 Queen beds, twin air mattress available) - Fully equipped kitchen with gas range  - Wireless Internet  - Central Heating but the space regulates itself nicely - Cookware, flatware, linens, sheets, towels, utensils all provided  - Beautiful open floor plan with lots of light. It's SOMA so we have sun most of the t

name: SoMa Garden Apartment
summary: A charming, spacious 2 bedroom, 1 bath flat with its own private garden oasis in a 1926 mediterranean-style house. Close to Design District, Hall of Justice, AT&T Park, Moscone Center, SoMa niteclubs, Caltrans Station. 15 min. ride to airport (when traffic is light)
space: High ceilings, lots of space and charm. This is a wonderful oasis in the city.  Small, private backyard.  Full kitchen and dining area. Large living room.

name: Near Moscone Center, Privacy with Style - the SoMa Loft
summary: SoMa Second Home - the SoMa Loft - is a private, airy and bright SoMa loft style apartment. Unwind amongst the globally inspired decor, while the sun streams in through the giant windows, or head into the shared courtyard for a nap in the sun.
space: Total privacy in two levels space (business friendly with all the necessary amenities): - entry level:  laundry, kitchen, powder-room, dining area and living room with fireplace - upper level (mezzanine): bedroom and master bathroom - an extra guest fee will be charged for the 3rd guest (a queen size self inflating air mattress and linen plus towel set will be supplied) - maximum occupancy is 3 people (parents with 2 children - total of 4 guests - will be accommodated!) - smoke free.

name: Excellent Peaceful Studio Condo
summary: A block away from Airbnb and Adobe Headquarter office building
space: I am renting a studio condo located in Soma near Potrero hill which is also known as "Design District". It is very close (within 5 min walking distance) to Adobe, Zinga, Airbnb HQ and SF Design Center. It is also within a walking distance to the Moscone Center and Financial District. The place is in a large and modern condominium complex which was built in 2008. The building management team maintains the whole complex very well, so it is always super clean and the landscape in the courtyard located on the 2nd level is very well-kept.  My unit is in the building that is located on the center of the courtyard of the complex and it is on the 3rd floor. The elevator will take you up to the 2nd level from the lobby. You need to go through a courtyard and then use a short stairway with about 13 steps to get to my unit. The place is spacious, clean and quiet (no street noise since it is facing the courtyard). It's fully furnished and has full kitchen, bathroom and washer/dryer. There's a DVD

name: South Beach/SOMA Loft, (Private bedroom and bath)
summary: Private guest room and  guest bath in a South Beach loft. Excellent location for touring or business travel. One block from ATT Park. Waterfront access, The Embarcadero, Chase Center SFMOMA. Moscone Center, Caltrain, Muni and the Ferry building are all within a short walk. Many, many restaurants, bars & clubs are nearby. Dog-friendly with one mellow canine in residence. (An adult professional also lives here, too.) Guests are welcome to use the common area as well as the shared roof deck.
space: This is one of the original live/work lofts dating to the first Internet boom.  20` (6m) ceilings make for an airy, open feel. The neighborhood is favored by tech workers with many restaurants, clubs and bars catering to the digerati. Groceries, dry cleaning and pretty much any other business that caters to this crowd is close by. Sidewalks are often busy, particularly during a work day or an event at ATT stadium.  Public transit systems are all close by. City of San Francisco registration #STR-1904

name: Luxury Harry Potter themed Room in Downtown SF
summary: Come enjoy a night of wonder at this magical Harry Potter getaway! Enjoy the amenities of a brand new apartment building just steps away from Civic Center while nerding out in this muggle friendly Hogwarts set up. The private room sleeps up to 5 people (2 on the bottom full sized bunk, 1 on the top twin bunk, 2 on the air mattress + couch) and has its own dedicated bathroom, shower, and dressing area. You are also welcome to enjoy the gym, business center, and terrace located on the 2nd floor.
space: The apartment is on the top floor of the Ava building right off of Civic Center near 9th and Market. If you can't tell, I'm a huge Harry Potter fan but don't let that intimidate you if you just need a place to stay. In keeping with Airbnb's #weaccept campaign, I welcome all muggles, squibs, wizards, witches, warlocks, elves, goblins, centaurs, mermaids, and even the occasional werewolf. I do not however accommodate trolls of any kind, so be sure and register all of our guests through the platform so they are included in the review process. name: Private Garden, Room and Bath in the Heart of SF
summary: This private room and bath sit off of a stunning Italian garden in the heart of SOMA.  The room is at the back of the house accessed through the garage. A quiet respite from the bustle of the city. Wifi, TV, Coffee Pot, microwave & hair dryer are in the room.  There is no kitchen.  Close to Moscone Center, Downtown & ATT Park
space: The space is actually a library filled with books on travel, art and hidden gems.

name: Art filled nook in SOMA
summary: This room is an art filed private room off of the second floor.  Your bathroom is right next door to the bedroom. I live on the premises on the first floor. I have a kitchen for your use, but no coffee pot or microwave.  The kitchen privileges do not include cooking full meals, it is just for making tea or warming leftovers. Cat petting is free
space: New features: completely remodeled BEautiful Tile Bathroom New and VERY comfortable Queen size Bed.

name: Moscone Center Downtown SoMa Union Square
summary: We are centrally located at 3rd and Folsom  the perfect place for people who have a conference at the Moscone Center; we are literally across the street.  We are within walking distance of Bloomingdales and the shops on Union Square.  SFMOMA, the Contemporary Jewish Museum, and MOAD are close by.  If you're taking a vacation  we have a pool, jacuzzi, gym and  library/quiet area all for you to enjoy.
space: We have a backyard as big as our apartment you're welcome to use. This is where we have an  aviary full of exotic birds.  We have two small adorable dogs, Chico the MinPin & Champ the chihuahua. We have snacks and drinks in your room as well as toiletries in case you forgot something. We want your stay with us to be serene and enjoyable. If you have any special needs let us known in advance & we'll do our best to accommodate. All in all we are the place you want to stay, while visiting SF.

name: Couch in sunny Soma Loft
summary: This high-end Loft is 742 sq feet and has a fully equipped kitchen with new appliances.  Whether you are here for work or pleasure, you will be able to relax and enjoy your stay in a highly desirable and most convenient neighborhoods!
space: SAN FRANCISCO SHORT-TERM RESIDENTIAL RENTAL REGISTRATION NUMBER: STR-(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Possession of a San Francisco Short-Term Rental Registration Certificate certifies that the registration certificate holder has agreed to comply with the terms of the San Francisco Short-Term Residential Rental Ordinance (San Francisco Administrative Code 41A).  This ordinance does not require an inspection of the unit by the City for potential Building, Housing, Fire, or other Code violations. This high-end Loft is 742 sq feet, has a full sized sofa bed and has a fully equipped kitchen with new appliances.  Whether you are here for work or pleasure, you will be able to relax and enjoy your stay in a highly desirable and most convenient neighborhoods! There is no parking in the building, but dozens of metered parking right out front that are fairly cheap ($0.50 to $1.50/hr depending on time of day) and free overnight. name: Modern Room with Private Bath close to Everything!
summary: Private room with private bath in a modern 2BD/2BA apartment building (Ava 55) with excellent amenities in the heart of SF, right off Market Street.  There is a BART/Muni stop on the same block. Venture up north on Market toward the Bay for the more touristy spots along Embarcadero or venture down south on Mission/Valencia for a more local experience!  Lots of good restaurants, cafes, bars, museums, theaters, and shopping within a few blocks!
space: The Apartment: It is a 2BD/2BA on the ninth floor of a modern building, with in-unit washer/dryer, and a full kitchen. I am renting out one of the bedrooms permanently. The Room: Sleep on a Queen size Leesa Bed!

name: Ensuite in Instagram Dream in the Clouds, 270°View
summary: This is a thoughtfully designed private en-suite in a 2BR urban retreat in SF with 270 degree views of the city from the living room and balcony. Perfect for business travelers, couples, & tourists looking for a personal touch in a sanctuary away from home.
space: "This is what Pinterest and Instagram dreams are made of." - Luther (guest) Follow this apartment on IG: @the_pinterest_dream Welcome to my urban retreat in the clouds! This listing is for the private ensuite master bedroom in a newly-built 2BR corner unit, with spectacular 270 degree views of San Francisco from up high. Enjoy a mix of privacy in a private, studio-sized ensuite alongside the comforts of an artfully designed, shared living room & kitchen with the host.  The location is very central and ideal for sightseeing, just minutes walking-distance away from City Hall, Asian Art Museum, public transportation, and Hayes Valley district. The sweeping views of San Francisco from this apartment are really something special, and if you're up for it, the sunrise on the balcony will leave you in awe. You'll feel like you're floating in the clouds while in my apartment. Amenities include: - This apartment is fully powered by ArcadiaPower renewable wind energy - Housekeeping service on Mon

name: Great Room in the Heart of SF
summary: Welcome to SF and South of Market (SOMA) neighborhood! The flat is a classic Edwardian that is in great condition and well kept. The interior is well done and the room is fully furnished for your convenience.
space: Welcome to SF and the South of Market (SOMA) neighborhood! The flat is a classic Edwardian that is in great condition and well kept. The interior is well done and the room is furnished with a queen size bed, love seat, TV w/ cable, dressers and you have plenty of clean towels and sheets. Enjoy your stay here in SF! It is a classic San Franciscan Edwardian style building. It's on a quiet alley and close to everything - Union Square, shopping, bars and nightlife. The apartment is nicely furnished and there is weekly maid service to ensure it is always clean and tidy.   Great spot if you are attending a conference at Moscone - I/O, WWDC, Dreamforce, Oracle World etc. Guest(s) will have full access to the apartment including the living and dining rooms, kitchen and laundry room (washer/dryer). There is also a hair dryer and extra toiletries if you forgot something. TV has cable, HBO and Netflix and the WiFi is very fast. I will be happy to help with any suggestions in the area and provide

name: Amazing SOMA Victorian  Corporate
summary: This Amazing Victorian is located in the heart of San Francisco's South of Market's trendy neighborhood.  Perfect for Corporate or leisure stays, with all public transportation within steps/minutes of your front door.  A true SF experience!
space: This amazing SOMA victorian house is centrally located in SOMA, perfect for your corporate stay.  Perfectly located only blocks from ATT Park and minutes from the 101 and 280 freeways makes this a commuters dream, with CalTrain and Muni Metro stations steps from your new apartment. Lots of coffee shops, restaurants and other amazing things to do abound around the house.  Convenience of Safeway, Whole Foods, Costco and Trader Joes are blocks away. Close to the Civic Center, Moscone Center, and many other San Francisco attractions.  Great location with easy access to public transportation.   Built in 1902, this Victorian was recently remodeled. The floors are original hardwood heart pine! There are 3 bedrooms, two with Full sized beds, and the third with a Queen sized bed.  The bathroom is a shower/tub combo. Big full kitchen, is ready to go with everything you might need.  Relax in the backyard patio, enjoying a cup of coffee, the sun or BBQ'ing.  Washing machine and dryer are in the un

name: Market Street Guest Room
summary: This clean and comfortable private guest room shares access to kitchen and bath with your friendly host. Queen bed, morning light, kitchen, WiFi, Netflix, HBO, Hulu-Plus. GREAT LOCATION!  Near F-line/BART/Muni, Union Square, Castro,  Moscone Center, city sights, dining, and entertainment. The room is 144 sq ft in a large unit on the 2nd of 4 floors in a 48 unit 1909 Edwardian style building.  The Hub neighborhood is an eclectic and bustling intersection of SF Neighborhoods.  Laundry available
space: SF Short Term Residential Rental Registration No.: STR (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) THE GUEST ROOM Tastefully decorated and recently painted, the room is furnished with a comfortable queen size bed, stuffed chair, table with two chairs, nightstand, two two-drawer chests, luggage and garment stands, coat rack, with mirror and other wall hangings.  Two large windows provide morning sunlight.  There are three lamps plus an overhead, with one of the lamps and an alarm clock plugged into an uninterrupted power supply, a fan, hairdryer, and garment iron are provided for your comfort and convenience. The television displays programing through an internet connected Roku box TM Netflix, Hulu Plus, HBO, Amazon Prime Video, and Pandora Music Services and others are available for your enjoyment.  A DVD player is also available.  No broadcast or cable television services are provided. A locked supply cabinet is also in the room. Your room will be ready with fresh linens and towels prior to your

name: SHARE Spacious Loft: Moscone, Ball Park & Downtown
summary: Please note that this is a SHARED space.  Centrally located capacious home away from home with soaring ceilings and tall windows. Top floor loft with a private patio provides astonishing views of the SF skyline.
space: This Loft is great if you are attending a conference at the Moscone Center or wanting to stay in proximity to many attractions or going to the Giants game at ORACLE Ball Park.  It is also conveniently located near the freeway and public transportation (Muni bus, CalTrain, & BART) SHARE the LOFT: Host resides upstairs and guest(s) have access of the living:sleeping space. There are two comfortable queen size convertible sofas.  There is also a room divider that allows privacy. Guest(s) has full access to large private bathroom downstairs, kitchen and patio. One small dog lives here for those who may be allergic. No smoking allowed inside the Loft. Professionally cleaned before every guest.  LOCATION: Great, central location and all within easy 10-15 minutes walking distance (SoMa has Walker's Paradise score of 97) to excellent Restaurants, Nightlife, Coffee Shops, Shopping Center, Ferry Building, Movie Theaters, Galleries, Parks, and much more. name: Live smart Live Cheap Live Comfortable DISCOUNT25%
summary: This modern CONVERTED bedroom in a 2bed/2bath , in a brand new building, has everything you need to experience in San Francisco: a courtyard and a roof deck, each sporting grills and fire pits; a well-equipped gym; A/C (very rare in SF); tub; and large in-unit washer and dryer. DISCOUNT ALREADY APPLIED FROM NOV-JAN from 25%-50% Located across from Airbnb HQ in an Airbnb Friendly Building, my apartment is at the intersection of Soma, the Mission, and Potrero Hill. The perfect for SF adventure!
space: Laid out in an open floor plan, my apartment offers everything you need for a comfortable stay. The fully equipped kitchen sports new stainless steel appliances (including a large dishwasher, stove, fridge, and microwave) and plenty of dishes, glasses of all sorts, and silverware. An enormous washer and dryer (with detergent provided) allows you to pack less. The space has a full-sized memory foam bed with lamps, bedside tables, shoe rack. Linens, towels, and toiletries all are provided. And, best of all, central heat and air conditioning! -Its a CONVERTED bedroom in a 2 bedroom/ 2 bath (other airbnb guests book this property (other 1 or 2 rooms)) divided by the living space using beautiful heavy curtains (no door/locks) whereas, totally private.

name: Small Bedroom. 1 night rent is ok.
summary: It's a private room in a three bedroom townhouse. Washer and dryer in unit. There is very limited street parking. The bus runs every 15min to the transbay terminal. There are a lot of Uber/Lyft drivers on the island so riding into SF proper is fast and cheep. Carpool costs about $7.50. We have a back yard.

name: 1 Bed/1 Bath Market St Retreat, Castro w/ SF Views
summary: Enjoy your stay in a private bedroom & bathroom in this beautiful 2 BD/2 BA 1906 Craftsman home (1100 sq. ft or 110 km2) in the Castro/Twin Peaks area w/ breathtaking views of the San Francisco & Oakland skylines.  The Market Street Retreat is a great spot for couples, solo adventurers, & business travelers who enjoy sharing a home with their hosts. This airbnb is not a great spot for smokers or folks who struggle with climbing 49 steps, and it is not suitable to more than 2 guests.
space: Enjoy your private bedroom and bathroom in this 1,100 square ft 2 BDR / 2 BTH home in the Castro / Twin Peaks part of San Francisco. Enjoy gorgeous views of the San Francisco skyline, San Francisco Bay, the Castro, the Bay Bridge, Corona Heights, Buena Vista Heights. Oakland Port, and the East Bay. On a clear day, you can even see Mount Diablo! The 49 steps up to the front door pay off big time with an incredible view of the city. Watch the sunrise from our private deck and enjoy the panoramic city view while you enjoy your meal from the dining room area.  The home is tastefully decorated with a mix of modern and classic pieces, with large (by San Francisco standards) living and dining areas. All of the artwork in the home is the work of Ryan's mother or grandfather. GUEST BEDROOM - Your Crate & Barrel queen bed has cozy sheets and a selection of comfortable pillows.  - A large dresser and closet space give you space to unpack and settle in. - Large windows allow plenty of light when y

name: Vistas & Zen above SF/ Twin Peaks
summary: For most question about your stay, parking, amenities and so on you can find answers in the FAQ Section in my profile.  - - Summary - - Private separate part of a Mid-Century modern house on the highest residential street in SF. Sweeping views from the Pacific Ocean to Alcatraz to Downtown to the East Bay. Quiet street, plenty of parking. One of the safest neighborhoods in the city,  security cameras monitor outside of the house. High speed Wi-Fi, W/D.
space: The house you will stay in is a Mid-Century Modern with many Japanese inspired details throughout.  The house is located by the foot of an architectual landmark, Sutro Tower. 2 minutes easy walk  will take you to Twin Peaks Vista Point.  It's centrally located and boarded by the Castro, Haight-Ashbury, Noe Valley, Cole Valley, Buena Vista, Glen Park, West Portal, UCSF and Golden Gate Park.

name: Room in Elegant, Private, Serene House with Beautiful Furnishings
summary: Drink a morning coffee while luxuriating in your private bedroom suite set in an Art Deco home. This cozy oasis features a separate entrance, a remodeled en suite bathroom with luxurious amenities, and access to vibrant neighborhoods nearby.
space: Enjoy your own private room and en suite bath with its own entrance.  Come and go as you please, with complete privacy.  The room is fully furnished with a lovely queen sized bed with a down comforter and lots of pillows.  Quality sheets and towels, and a calm, clean and tranquil location make this a wonderful place to start your San Francisco adventure.

name: Modern (Two Beds & Private Bath)
summary: Enjoy the million-dollar view from Upper Market! Your private room includes 1 Queen Bed, 1 Twin Bed, & Private Bathroom! Dream away on your very own Memory Foam Mattress! Free Parking! (Yes I know, it is almost impossible to find in San Francisco) One of the safest neighborhood in the City! Just minutes from Castro, Mission, & Cole Valley Districts.
space: Modern boutique hotel feel at 1/2 the cost. The private room and bathroom is totally just yours during the duration of your stay. Guests are more than welcome to take advantage of the shared kitchen and living room space.

name: Entire studio with private bath ÷ free street park
summary: Home is located just West of famous Twin Peaks area where many TV series and several movies were filmed. Well positioned in a forest like area right in the middle of the city.  Quiet and convenient location.  Stay in a tastefully decorated private studio with a private access and private bath. Short walk to some of the best views of the city (Clarendon and Twin Peaks).  Studio is  well equipped with everything you need during your visit to S.F.  A peaceful patio available per request.
space: This studio is a size of a hotel suite, with a private bath.  If you decide to rent a car, there is plenty of street parking available.  Nice, quite, residential neighborhood.  10-15 min. walk to the transportation hub at the Forest HIll station which can take you pretty much everywhere in the city.

name: Large Home w Garden nr Cole Vly/Castro- Easy Park
summary: Spacious (1000 sq.ft or 93 sq. m) quiet, private and clean home. Tastefully furnished, uncluttered lots of windows and light. Centrally located in the Upper Market neighborhood and well connected to public transit on a quiet street. Walkable to Cole Valley, Haight Ashbury and the Castro, and close to UCSF. Enjoy your privacy in the space and terraced garden with view. Very easy parking.
space: Very Spacious and on the top floor of a 2 story home (no one above you so it's really quiet) with lots of natural light from living room bay windows. There are hardwood floors, one large bedroom, living room, dining room, fully equipped kitchen and a private terraced backyard which has an amazing view of the downtown and the bay. It's on a charming curvy street in a quiet neighborhood called Upper Market.  Relax in the living room with lots of comfortable seating (even with the extra bed open) and enjoy tons of viewing options with the easy to use Amazon Fire Stick TV (like Apple TV). Fast reliable high speed WIFI.  The bedroom is very large and has a queen size bed, desk and chair, walk in closet with lots of hangars and plenty of space for your things.  The living room has a queen size American Leather Comfort Sleeper sofa which has a high density foam mattress with no bars or springs that offers a great nights sleep.  Luxury high thread count Egyptian cotton linens, cashmere throw a

name: Private room, bath & entrance
Serene Japanese-Inspired Retreat with Views & Free Parking
summary: Wake up rejuvenated in the privacy of this quiet room set in an updated mid-century home. Enjoy panoramic nature and ocean views from the bright Japanese-inspired living space surrounded by original art and tansu furnishings. FREE street parking.  For same day bookings, please allow 3 hours for Host to prepare for your arrival.
space: Our home as an overall Asian/Japanese aescetic.  Guests love how calm and relaxing the home feels.  To make your visit special, we love taking care of details and think you will appreciate it too.  From cleanliness to new luxury bedding and mattress, plush, fluffy towels, and bathrobes, to abundant snacks.  I have been told by numerous Guests how much they love the bed and enjoy the comfortable mattress and soft sheets.   There is a closet for long and short hanging clothes, several Japanese tansus with drawers for storage, extra bedding with your choice of allergin "fill" or feathers to meet your comfort needs.  We also provide a double surge protector with two extra fast USB charging stations.  This surge protector is on a long cord and can be moved around for your convenience.  It is not uncommon for two Guests to put the surge protector on the bed while both using computers or devices at the same time. Many Business Travelers enjoy sitting on the bed and working in their bedroom.

name: Private studio with bathroom + free street parking
summary: Beautiful spacious downstairs room of a single family home in Twin Peaks with private entrance and private bathroom. Free street parking available with no restrictions. 20 minute walking distance to Forest Hill Metro Station - the gateway to Castro, Mission & Downtown San Francisco. Short walk to Twin Peaks Summit, the best view in the City!  Close to UCSF Parnassus campus. Owners live upstairs. No access to kitchen facilities. Laundry facilities available.
space: You will have access to a beautiful newly renovated en-suite room which has its own entrance. Laundry utilities are accessible via the joining utility room. Access to shared backyard and patio. There is a small fridge and microwave in the room. Coffee is supplied. Towels are supplied. There is a T.V. and a Roku player with access to Netflix & other streaming services.

name: Quiet Suite with Separate Entrance and Living Room
summary: The best part of this perfect, spacious alternative to an expensive SF hotel? A separate entrance and living room!  This is a bright, large one-bedroom suite in the first floor of a quiet home with easy access to top San Francisco attractions.  Based in the heart of the city just above the Castro area, the suite is just 100 feet from two bus lines making it easy to get everywhere.  If you love privacy and comfort, this is the place for you.
space: Why spend the money for a cramped, expensive hotel in San Francisco when you can get a clean, bright suite for less?  This suite was formerly a one-bedroom apartment with its own private exterior entrance.  It includes a very large master bedroom with queen size bed with high thread count sheets.  The modern bathroom connects the bedroom with the living room and features a shower without tub.  The large living room includes a new Crate and Barrel pull-out full couch, flat screen TV and desk for writing those postcards.    There are no kitchen facilities onsite (the city made us remove the efficiency kitchen from the apartment when we purchased the home).  But, there is a small refrigerator, coffee maker and hot water pot.  We have on-demand hot water for the shower, so you will never fear running out. There is a private entrance at the front of the home into this suite, so you won't have to interact with the owners upstairs, although we are quite nice. This suite is not suitable for ch

name: Serene and Modern Studio (with FREE Parking)
summary: Welcome to our recently remodeled contemporary studio with a private entrance and backyard. There is an en-suite designer bathroom with rain shower experience, free street parking and an easy self-check-in. This home is located in the charming Midtown Terrace neighborhood, which is in the geographical center of SF. Easy access via public transportation or Uber/Lyft to all parts of SF and even areas outside SF. We are a short walking distance from Twin Peaks and multiple hiking trails.
space: The space has a warm and contemporary feel to it. There is one queen size bed (sleeps 2) and one queen size sofa-bed (sleeps 2). There is a small refrigerator, microwave and coffee/tea maker. We also usually stock a few breakfast items for our guests to enjoy and start their day on the right note. The place is ideal for 1 or 2 couples. Our home is also kid friendly,  particularly because of the private backyard and nearby Midtown Terrace Playground.

name: Twin peaks - JJ's Homes
summary: Beautiful ocean , hills and sky sunset views home  in the heart of SF . New modern, sunny, bright & comfortable, 2 bedrooms, 1bath with a big desk   in charming quaint safe and friendly neighborhood. Plenty of street parking available 24/7 it is a great benefits . short walk downhill  to a small shopping area which offers supermarket, drugstore, restaurant, cafe, bakery, bank, etc. step a way to hiking trails get top of Twin Peaks Landmark offers 360 degrees of panoramic views.
space: New clean modern space in a single family house,  located in the geographical center of 7 by 7 mile of San Francisco . One of the safest neighborhood in the city. A short walk to Twin peaks reveals the panoramic city view.  The area surrounded by a lot of natural grown trees and greens. It is very quite and relaxing living in the middle of busy city.  Two bedrooms with two queen beds, living room have a queen Crate & Barrel sleeper couch.supper comfortable One full tub bathroom. living /dining combo. Fit max of 6 people. Access is through a separate entrance. Space attach to a big deck . No homes in the front or behind . You can enjoy the view, fresh air out door greens and much more.

name: Ground Floor Studio with Garage Parking
summary: This is the ground floor in-law unit that can be booked separately or in conjunction with the two bedroom unit upstairs. This unit has private access to its own bedroom, full bath, kitchenette and garage parking for 1 vehicle. It also has direct access to the shared upstairs backyard.
space: The perfect place for a single person or couple to enjoy San Francisco. Enjoy the Brazilian Hardwood floors, recessed lights with dimmers, large empty closet for all your belongings, luxury bathroom with Carrera marble, double head shower with Kohler fixtures, Japanese Toto washlet toilet, and Philippe Stark sink. Free HD Cable with DVR and HBO. Free wifi with laptop provided. Huge sunny patio with lounge chaises, dining table and zen rock garden. Free garage parking for 1 available makes your stay all the more convenient. Make this modern Twin Peaks studio your private sanctuary during your trip to San Francisco. It's a safe, modern and serene, 400-square-foot apartment equipped with top-notch amenities throughout: --46" flat-screen HDTV with cable, DVR, HBO, DVD player --central heating, stainless steel electric fireplace --brazilian walnut hard-wood floors --8-foot ceilings with recessed lights, touch dimmers --large marble and frameless glass bathroom with dual head Kohler spa show

name: Bright, quiet getaway in the middle of SF.
summary: Private room and bathroom with access to the tranquil deck and forest like backyard. Backyard looks out to sutro tower and twin peaks. Very quiet, residential neighborhood located in the geographic center of SF with plenty of free street parking. The 36 line bus stop is one block away and Forest Hill Muni station is one mile away (though it is an uphill walk back). We are a married couple, both teachers, who live upstairs with two small dogs who bark but are otherwise friendly.
space: Private room and attached private bathroom on the ground/garage level of a single family home. Access to shared backyard. No kitchen or laundry available for your use.

name: bright cozy room amazing view
summary: Private room with a king size bed, 42" HDTV w/ Fire TV stick, a desk / laptop workspace setup w/ external monitor, Air Purifier along with a full closet and dresser. Bathroom with full tub/shower along with full kitchen with stovetop/oven, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave, coffee maker, etc.  and separate living room.  Would be a nice place to stay in the city!
space: Spacious and sunny unit with great panoramic views of the SF skyline. Close to Noe Valley and Dolores Heights neighborhoods. Walking distance to public transportation lines to anywhere you want to go in SF.

name: City Views, Rejuvenation & Easy Parking at a Stylish Oasis
summary: Sip coffee on the balcony and watch the sunrise over the city at an urban hideaway overlooking downtown and the Bay Bridge. The marble corner fireplace, rustic wooden kitchen, and travel photo gallery wall add character to this light-filled space.
space: Stay just atop a hill with amazing city and bay views!  2 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment with spacious, comfortable accommodations for up to six. Easy parking and well connected with public transit and a short walk to the Castro/Cole Valley/Haight neighborhoods.  Quiet area yet close enough to all your heart desires.  One bedroom has a queen-size bed, the other a California King, and there is a pull-out queen-size bed in the living room for 5-6 guests.

name: Country Living in the Heart of the City!
summary: Beautiful bedroom and private half bath (WC and wash basin) in luxurious home located in the center of San Francisco. Expansive Bay views and convenient to public transport. No car needed but if you have one parking is free and unrestricted.  Our home is a short walk to a supermarket, Starbucks, Bakery and the subway. The Castro, Haight/Ashbury, Noe Valley, Glen Park and West Portal neighborhoods are around a five minute drive away.  We have an adorable Cockapoo, JoJo, who loves everybody.
space: Our home has a lovely living and dining room , gourmet kitchen, gorgeous outdoor terrace,  and laundry facilities.   Your guest room has a very comfortable queen bed, 600 count Egyptian cotton sheets, dresser and large closet. It is bright and cheerful during the day but has heavy drapes and wood blinds to darken it during the day for naps. 100mbs WiFI and a combo outlet with three USB ports assure you can stay well connected if need be. You will have exclusive use of a charming half bath and share a full bath with both tub and separate shower stall.

name: Explore twin peak in SF 2 private rooms
summary: Beautiful new remodeled 2 Private Rooms 1 private bath in SF near Twin Peak.  Very quite and safe location. Host has been living here for years and the house is truly beautiful.   No kitchen but microwave, k cup coffee machine with free coffee and tea, toaster are included.  Lots of privacy but we do not allow any party or gathering because we have young age kid and baby in the house.  However, we will respect your privacy.
space: locations: 1) 5 mins to twin peaks:  Cannot miss the beautiful sunrise view and down town view 2) 7 mins driving distance to golden gate park 3) supermarkets are few mins driving distance away 4) Stonetown Galleria is 9 mins driving distance 5) San Francisco State University is 9 mins driving distance 6) 19 minutes driving distance to Golden gate bridge 7) 17 mins driving distance to San Francisco Downtown

name: The Speakeasy on Market Street
summary: Come stay in a steam punk inspired speakeasy with a vintage bar (liquor not included ;-). From tin ceilings to Edison bulbs, leather sofas, and wood paneled walls, this is a one of a kind abode with a gorgeous view of downtown San Francisco.
space: My wife and I spent the last year remodeling the vintage bar on the 1st floor of our 1936 Spanish revival home. We've transformed the space into a victorian/steam punk inspired bar complete with Edison bulbs, a big beautiful metal queen bed, red leather floors in the bedroom, restored original hard wood floors and more! There are unique details around every corner, and we continue to evolve our creation day in and day out. Come stay in this truly unique, and vintage San Francisco speakeasy.  Things you should know: We live in the house on the floors above.  We have a dog, she's not allowed downstairs but she does shed.  If you have strong allergies to dogs you may want to reconsider.  Occasionally she barks during the day, but not at night, she's a rather sound sleeper.

name: Twin Peaks charm
summary: Private 2-bedroom top floor of a single family house with sweeping views of San Francisco bay set in a quiet neighborhood with plenty of free street parking. Access is through a separate entrance. Just a walk away to the top of Twin Peaks. A perfect combination of quiet living and walking distance to public transportation (Forest Hill Muni station). One bedroom with a queen size bed, second bedroom with two twin size beds. You’ll love it because of the views, the ambiance, and the location.

name: Skyview SF. Entire House with a Sunset View.
summary: Upscale Single House, 3 bedrooms, 2 baths with a stunning view of the ocean and hills from the deck & sun room, etc. Located in the heart of San Francisco. A short walk to Twin Peaks Landmark of 360 degrees city view such as Golden Gate Bridge, Bay Bridge, San Mateo Bridge, Ocean, Downtown SF, etc.  The neighborhood is very quiet, safe and relaxing with plenty of street parking. A few blocks from Starbucks, Walgreen, supermarket, gas station and more. It is definitely a dream vacation's place.
space: There are plenty of street parkings around the neighborhood, and one reserve parking spot right in front of the house, blocking garage “V”. There is a bus stop at half a block. In addition, if you need to rent a vehicle then you can rent it through (Website hidden by Airbnb) and use the link below to get $25 off your first trip.  (Website hidden by Airbnb)

name: Modern Minimalist Condo with Great City Views
summary: Relax by the cozy fireplace of this bright, top-floor condo. The apartment is centrally located and offers up sweeping views of San Francisco from the spacious and bright living room. Enjoy easy access to public transport or walk to Noe Valley.
space: Our home is naturally bright, airy, and quiet. The main living area is perfect for delicious dinners after a day exploring the city or sitting back and relaxing next to the cozy gas fireplace — all while enjoying the impressive views of the Bay Bridge and downtown skyline. Each bedroom is large with a new king-sized Leesa mattress in the master and a comfortable queen in the second room. We also have a comfortable foam mattress for a fifth guest. Hall bathroom was recently remodeled and brand new master bath conveniently located off the bedroom. There is desk workspace in one of the bedrooms if you need to get work done.  1300 square feet / 121 square meters — large for SF!

name: Quiet & spacious 2 bedroom unit; easy parking
summary: Modern 2 bdr in the geographic center of SF, with easy access to downtown (via Muni KLMT lines - station is 20 min walk or 4 minute Lyft ride), and 10-15 minute drive to Cole/Noe Valleys, Mission, Castro, Haight.  Park directly in front of the house with no day/time limits (rare!).  Very quiet neighborhood w/peaceful back deck looking over a terraced backyard garden.  Total privacy.  Perfect for family, colleagues, or friends who need two bedrooms but don't want to pay for two hotel rooms.
space: The space is newly renovated and decorated in mid-century modern style and has all the creature comforts to make your stay enjoyable.  The kitchen has all the tools needed for making gourmet meal. The kitchen looks out onto the backyard, which is a tiered slope planted with lots of SF native species and flowering trees/bushes frequented by hummingbirds.  The living room features a decorative fireplace, 43 inch TV (internet only, no cable - but you can use my Amazon/ Netflix account), large comfy sofa/chair, and plenty of light especially in the afternoon. The bedrooms have new mattresses / bedding - Saatva mattress in the main bedroom.  The bathroom is separate from both bedrooms and has a giant shower with a "rain" style showerhead.  The dining area features table that can expand to fit 8 people for a meal at home with friends.  There is a crib in the second bedroom, toddler books/ toys, toddler bath tub, and possibly umbrella stroller (ask ahead). Perfect for traveling with young kid

name: TwinPeaks Castro 3BR2BA Views House
summary: Unique fully detached modern home with Bay and downtown views! This home features Great room, spacious kitchen and dining area, designer lighting, dining room, living room with fireplace. First floor features master bedroom with bathroom and a laundry. Second floor has 2 bedrooms, bathroom,  patios, garden and deck.  Castro, Upper Market, Twin Peaks center of the city location provides a convenient access to commute in all direction. Pets negotiable. Must climb stairs. Call for special deals!
space: I rent my two-story house with breathtaking views of San Francisco downtown, Eastbay and Bay bridge. This property features 3 comfortable bedrooms with furniture, closet space and 2 bathrooms. It was completely rebuilt in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and therefore has an open and modern feel. As you enter, the high quality of the remodel is apparent - from the tile designs in the bathroom to the beautiful hardwood floors throughout. Off the foyer on the first floor is a large master suite with its own beautiful full bath with whirlpool and large dressing area, walk-in closet. Even from the quiet sanctuary of this master suite, the downtown and Bay views will astound you. After ascending the staircase, you enter a large open room consisting of the living room, dining room and kitchen. As your eyes are directed out the five large double-paned wood windows, you are struck by the view immediately - the downtown San Francisco skyline and the Bay unfold right before you! Do not miss the L

name: Stunning View Home Above SF!

The full kitchen has high-end stainless steel appliances including a microwave, convection oven, dishwasher, French-door style refrigerator, hot water (tea) kettle, and a Keurig (K-cup) coffee maker (coffee and tea included). To round out the experience, our home features a 13’ x 26’ deck that includes lush plants, a conversation fire pit that seats 6, and a 104º+ hot tub… all with unobstructed views of downtown San Francisco, the Castro, and Buena Vista Park! The VIEW overlooks almost the entire west side of San Francisco out over the Pacific  Ocean —- enjoy beautiful sunsets and some times enjoy the San Francisco fog filling the air :-) In hopes you will come and enjoy an adventure back in time,  experiencing some of older San Francisco. Below is a detailed description of your areas: On your Bedroom Level: - A private 500 sq ft bedroom with a Queen bed and a Double bed, a desk and living room area, captain's chairs, and the view overlooks western San Francisco out to the Pacific Ocean . Each piece of furniture is from a different decade of the 1900's --- the linens are new :-) When the home was first built in the 1920's this room was called the  "Mens' Ballroom." — Adjacent to the above area, the old 'Men's Ballroom" area ,  is the "Shabby Chic" 1920's all wood bunk bedroom --- not your regular bu

name: Jungle Room: Breakfast + Parking + 3 Bathrooms
summary: Breakfast, cleaning of  3 bathrooms, washing sheets/towels, toiletries available Free parking  6 blocks away from subway  30-40' everywhere, 15 minutes from airport by car NO: shoes, the plastic bags provided  to cover your shoes in case of rain are next to racks and it is your responsibility to protect them against the rain. No lock home, no cooking, no parties, no pets and no young children.  Even though we have more than 5 listings we ONLY use 5 listings maximum at ANY given time!!!
space: We live in the safest neighborhood in town. We are 700 meters away from our main subway station and a few blocks away from several bus stops that can take you anywhere in town. summary: West Portal is a San Francisco neighborhood that is charming, safe and centrally located. Convenient to Downtown, the Golden Gate Bridge and Golden Gate Park by public transportation. Our place is completely remodeled and tastefully decorated with good sunlight and a view of the garden. Our place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids).
space: This is a private one bedroom suite that is on the lower level of our home with a private entrance. There is a full size refrigerator, toaster oven, microwave and coffee maker but no stove/cook-top or kitchen sink.

name: Modern garden-view studio apartment w/free parking
summary: Our garden-view studio/suite has all the modern finishes and conveniences you expect in San Francisco. We are close to BART (subway), Muni (light rail) and several bus lines. Plenty of free on-street parking if you choose explore the city or surrounding area by car. The unit has a private entrance to your quiet refuge. You have access to our sunny garden patio & washer/dryer. The space is ideal for a business traveler. Hosts love to travel extensively and are happy to serve as a resource.
space: This ground-level suite has all the modern finishes and conveniences you expect in San Francisco. Features include a king-size bed, plush and cozy loveseat, desk and chair, granite countertop, refrigerator/freezer, microwave/convection oven, induction cooktop, plush wall-to-wall carpet, wifi, recessed lights, mounted flat-screen tv with cable and Apple TV, heated bathroom floor and rain shower with great pressure! This is an ideal space and location for a business traveler, a couple looking to get away for a romantic weekend in the City, or someone coming to visit UCSF's Parnassus campus.

name: Modern suite with private entrance & bathroom
summary: STR(phone number hidden) Private entrance, bathroom, and garden access. Parking is available with advance notice.  Half a block from shops, restaurants, a movie theater and the West Portal Station where you can catch a train to the Castro in 5 minutes, or downtown in 15.  Sleeps 2. No kitchen, but there is a coffee maker, a small microwave and a mini fridge.
space: This is a modern, light filled room with a garden view, full bathroom, and a sitting area with a surround sound equipped TV. You also have access to the garden. This is a separate unit within the house, so you have total privacy as you come and go. There is a mini fridge, microwave and coffee maker for your use. We live upstairs and you will hear us walking around above you.

name: MAJESTIC VIEWS Historic Home SERENITY & PARKING
summary: VIEWS,  SERENITY, PRIVACY,FREE PARKING - People from the world over have enjoyed staying here ! This home is one of the first built in this established neighborhood on one of SF's famous hills,Mt Davidson. By car it takes 10 mins to 101 & 280 freeways then 15-20 mins to Downtown or the Peninsula, 15 min by car to GG Bridge or walk to public transport then take 15-20 minutes to downtown area.
space: SUMMARY If the walls of my family home could talk  what wondrous stories would be told. My home tells stories of old San Francisco, provides serenity, space and an incredible VIEW of the west side of San Francisco all the way to the Pacific Ocean —-or  sometimes enjoy the San Francisco fog filling the air :-)  * This large private Master Bedroom has a California King bed & 8 windows with majestic views that are from everywhere in the room and over the western side out to the Pacific Ocean coast line of San Francisco. And an attached  ensuite  private bathroom with shower & large vanity sink area . The bedroom’s wallpaper, and the bathroom’s gold wallpaper,  in this area are what I call the upgraded ---  they are from the 1980's  :-)   *WiFi /  Internet * Use of an beloved older style kitchen (no deep frying or large cookings) Coffee is enjoyed by using either our KEURIG or the combo CUISINART  coffee grinder & maker combined :-) *Plenty of FREE PARKING both day & night * Uber & LYFT ar

name: Serene Private Studio in Mount Davidson Home
summary: Enjoy the charm of this unique and quiet San Francisco neighborhood from a stylish apartment. This charming guest room is set in a chic contemporary house and features an en suite bathroom, full kitchenette, and a private keypad entry to the home.
space: The completely renovated studio unit features: -A private entrance with key pad -Compact 180ft sq (17m sq) of fully furnished living space -Comfortably fits two -Comfortable high queen bed -Free WiFi -Flat screen TV with netflix (no cable) -Fully equipped kitchen -Modern bathroom -Hair dryer -Linens, toiletries, and kitchen utensils are provided for your comfort and convenience -Plenty of free street parking -We are seconds from a path to Mount Davidson, where you can hike to the top and enjoy sweeping views of the city.  -Walking distance to groceries, Starbucks & restaurants -20 min. drive to/from SFO, easy access to 280 and 101 freeways -1 mile from Glen Park Bart station -two blocks from 48 Quintara bus line that can easily take you to UCSF, Presidio, and around town.  -5 minutes to Twin Peaks We are happy to answer any questions and help you plan your perfect San Francisco stay! summary: Stretch out on the mocha couch with its quirky mermaid cushions and plan the day's adventures at a serene abode built in 1894. Victorian features blend seamlessly with contemporary flair at this hip hideaway tucked away on a secluded street.
space: Built in 1894, this generous space is an SF original.   Perfect for an extended stay in San Francisco, this flat is your own one bedroom furnished rental with cable, internet access, a desk for working, full kitchen, and extra beds. We have what you need to make yourself comfortable in your new home away from home!

name: Modern Zen in the Lower Haight
summary: Welcome to the Lower Haight! My neighborhood and the surrounding areas are filled with cafes, restaurants, bars, shops, and salons. Spend the day walking around and sampling local flavor, or grab a blanket and spend an afternoon in one of the nearby parks... Alamo Square Park, Duboce Park, Dolores Park, or Golden Gate Park.
space: Located in one of San Francisco’s most bohemian and central neighborhoods, I offer a large sunny room with a very comfortable queen bed and shared bathroom.  There is a flight of stairs to climb as my home is on the second floor of a 1924 building.  My home is located on Page Street which is one block from the trendy shops, restaurants, cafes, art galleries and salons of the Lower Haight. It is walking distance to beautiful Alamo Square Park (home of the fabled “Painted Ladies” Victorian homes), Hayes Valley, Castro, Mission, NOPA, the Panhandle, Golden Gate Park, Upper Haight, and Civic Center. Public transportation is only steps away with the public bus lines (MUNI) and Metro service to Downtown, BART, and Ocean Beach. Freeway access is a short drive to both north and south-bound directions. summary: A wonderful home in the best part of SF's Lower Haight district. Waller Street is quiet  but just steps away from all the bustle and cultural activity of this vibrant neighborhood. We are located in Eureka Valley, the sun belt of San Francisco. After six years of hosting, we have changed our minimum stay to three nights.  It is a lot of work maintaining our home and we have decided that every two nights is just too much work.  If you feel that we should make an exception for you, just ask?
space: We are in the Garden District of the Lower Haight. We have been voted the number neighborhood by the new techie community. We now accept Instant Booking.

summary: The  large front room of a 1898 Victorian flat with all the classic details. The bed is a very comfortable memory foam convertible couch. The bathrooms are shared with us. We have 2 cats and a seasonal garden. Located 2 blocks from Alamo Square Park. Please do not book with us if you’re allergic to cats.
space: This is a classic San Francisco Victorian full flat. The bedroom has a period mantle piece, original crown molding and medallions and a huge bay window looking out onto Golden Gate Avenue. The period (old, but clean) full tile bathroom is 20 steps down the hall from your bedroom door. Continental breakfast is served in the formal dining room with period built-ins and non-working fireplace.

name: Stylish Lower Haight Victorian Room
space: For Rent:  Furnished room, that gets great morning sun in the front half of a Lower Haight 3- bedroom victorian apartment. Victorian detail throughout, built 1898. This is a 14'x11' Victorian style room that includes a comfortable Queen size bed, computer table, night stand with lamp, softwood floors and armoire. This apartment has a separate bathroom and toilet, both are shared. The apartment has forced air heat throughout, spacious kitchen with, washer/dryer, wi-fi, Bed linens and towels are included. Back access to patio and small garden area.  The flat is located on Webster Street between Germania and Waller Streets in the fashionable Lower Haight district. It's located two blocks from all Muni underground lines, and bus lines that provide easy access to downtown  and connections to other city locations. name: Beautiful Little Room in Victorian
summary: For single guests only, please. This  room is beautiful and with a very comfortable bed, but it is my smallest room. It’s best suited for shorter stays though it works for a week for many.  The house is an 1881 Italianate Victorian in uniquely original condition due to a very short list of prior owners. I know many of it's stories. I'm nice, and the house is gorgeous, but you will also enjoy it's central location in San Francisco. Come be my guest.
space: There is no place like this in the world. The room itself is tiny, but beautiful. Only suited for one guest.  Original wallpaper and gaslights. Short walk to the symphony, opera, sf jazz center, city hall, Hayes Valley shopping and dining, Japantown, The Castro, The Haight, and The Painted Ladies. The Independent, The Fillmore, and The Golden Gate Theater are also a short walk.  The bathroom is shared with as many as two other guests.  Roam about the house freely. Play the grand piano. There are occasionally live performances in the parlor...Guests get free tickets to anything happening during their stay.  Im friendly, but respectful of privacy. Im happy to show you some local attractions, or make myself scarce...its your vacation. If you would like a coffee companion or a guided tour of the area, I would be more than happy to spend the time with you. I will be home to greet you and give you an orientation to the house. space: The room is located on the first floor of our home. It's the best of both worlds, the privacy of a hotel room with an owner who's traveled extensively, is more than happy to answer any questions you have about our beautiful city, and direct you to good restaurants and sightseeing options!

The apartment is on the bottom floor/basement of a Victorian House off of Fillmore Street, one of the chic San Francisco neighborhoods close to parks, restaurants, wine bars and coffee shops, boutiques, markets, and many bus lines (1, 2, 3, 22, and 38) and downtown San Francisco. Pets - please ask. :)

summary: Come enjoy this newly updated in-law in the center of the city, just a half block from historic Alamo Square Park and its "Painted Ladies".  You'll love the clean, Scandinavian design and being walking distance from several destination neighborhoods.
space: Welcome to my private 1 Bedroom, 1 Bathroom in-law apartment, centrally located in San Francisco and just steps away from Alamo Square Park and the famous Painted Ladies (as seen in countless movies and television series — including Full House). Whether you are visiting for business or pleasure, this unit is perfect for one to two guests looking for a more local experience in the City.  This bright and cozy unit located in the back of the building's garage enjoys a private entrance  and features a queen size bed, bathroom, full refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, closet, desk workspace (and iMac for guest use), TV with Comcast Xfinity cable access with HBO, and Comcast wifi.  What it may lack in size, it more than makes up in charm! Located on the home’s lower level, you may occasionally hear our neighbors in the morning and evening. We ask all of our guests to be respectful of our neighbors: Please refrain from loud noises, music or TV after 10:00PM. Maximum stay 21 days.
